pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM ra ma hA rad ne/ rad na sa~M b+ha be/ rad na ki ra ne/ rad na mA le/

bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M t+yA Ta/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam par bcom par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib

pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sarba
A ba ra Na/ bi nA sha ni/ ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/ /bskyod/ rab tu bskyod/ yang

dag par rab tu bskyod do/ /bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas smad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo ba rnams

dang ldan pa ste/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya/ /de

yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po/ /phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing / zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni/ /mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya/ /lho yi phyogs su rin chen bri/ /

nub phyogs chu skyes pad ma la/ /byang phyogs su ni gdon mi za/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /

rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil mo dkrung bzhugs bri/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri/ /sgo ba dag kyang khros pa

la/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ b+ha ga ban e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas gtso bo byon pa dang / /mdor na mchod pa byas

nas kyang / /'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams/ /'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ rdo rje ti ri ti ri bcings la/ /lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /yang na me tog phreng ba ste/ /

de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /oM pra tIts+tsha badzra hU~M/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra ha sa ud g+ha Ta ya hU~M/ de nas 'di

bstan par bya ste/ oM badzra pa sh+ya ho/ /de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ oM pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ karma

a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM bud d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rata na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ oM pad ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ karma

ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM rata na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM trAM trAM trAM trAM/ oM badzra paT+Ta a ba baM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM bud d+ha mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra mu drA a

b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM rata na mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad mamu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ karma mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M oM trAM hrIHaH/ badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH/ badzra tsakra a

b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M b+h+ru~M/ oM badzra tsakra a d+hi pa ti s+t+wAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM oM oM/ trAM trAM trAM/ hrIHhrIHhrIH/ aHaHaH/ badzra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rata na d+hA ra Ni a

b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ karma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM rata na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH

oM karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ pradz+nyo pA ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M AH de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /oM b+h+ruM badzra A yu She hU~M AH de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub

pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser

gyi mar snod sar par bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa 'am/ du ba 'am/
me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ me sgron nam/ 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de 'am/ mar sar ram/ til mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag

gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu bsgrubs te/ nang par sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma yod kyi

bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do/ /mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldob skyen/ lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro/ /

lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po

bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyis shod cig dang / ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /

de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste/ byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung

gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM dr-i/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /

oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /rnam

thos bu dge'i lag pa na/ /be con ne'u le thogs pa dang / /rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi can ldan par bri/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin

chen chu bo 'bab par bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni/ /pi bang len pa brtson pa dang / /mdzes shing kha dog ljang khu ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral

gri lag na thogs par bri/ /nub phyogs su ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor ba la/ /mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar/ /sgo'i phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo ba

rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas/ /sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang / /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /

cho ga bzhin du arga dbul/ /de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis/ /slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /bram ze la sogs de bzhin te/ /me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs/ /

oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pra tIts+tsha twaM ma hota ta ma/ /gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni/ /de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med/ /de nas grwa na bzhag pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis ni dbang

bskur te/ /dang po phyag na rdo rje yis/ /phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de la sogs pa go rims kyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po yin na che bar 'gyur/ /

'dzam bu'i gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog /lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / /lan bzhir gzhug par byas na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar bya/ /bdag

cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ /bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / /pho brang 'khor du bcas pa yi/ /rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi/ /de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang / /de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi/ 'jigs dang mu ge
la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa rnams ni gzhom par bgyi/ /rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi bar bgyi/ /phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis
'joms/ /mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing / /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re dang bsam pa kun bgyi ste/ /ji ste nges pa ma lags na/ /phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur/ /de

nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rnams
dbul bar bgyi'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs so/ /legs kyis phul cig /de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM iM/ oM a/
oM ya/ oM ri/ oM ba/ yaM/ oM ku/ oM a/ oM bra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag /phyogs skyong rang

gi phyogs gnas su/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang / /phag gi gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste/ /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas spyan drangs de kun la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid zhugs

nas kyang / /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs
gnas rnams/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te/

dbang bskur ba thob pa 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang ba de dag /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi

phru ma kun gzhom par bgyi/ dus dus su char pa dbab par bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis

kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / mi 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres mi
'jigs par bgyi/ srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal

po chen po ba ru nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi/ kun du bsrung bar bgyi/ 'bru rnams

bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/ thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gis 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad bskyed par

bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi
sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang / 'bru thams cad legs par

'byor par bgyi/ rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang / rus kyi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa bsrung

bar bgyi/ glang dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa la yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang byed
ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang / rgyal po de dag gi bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams

'di dang pha rol tu bskyab pa dang / phan gdags pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang /

mtshams gcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs kyi mtshams gcad pa dang / rdo rje ra bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams bre bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams
cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub na yang bgegs
ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams

cad dang bcas par mchis la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstab par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de
nas sa 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyis

su byung ba'am/ lan gnyis su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad du don thams cad grub par

bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las dus thams cad du yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad dang / 'khor rgyu skar du bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/
legs so legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ gza' chen po rnams shod cig de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM A/
oM so/ oM aM/ oM bu/ oM brI/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o/ /

ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o/ /pa ba sangs ni mdun du la/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon par gza' lhag bri bar bya/ /me yi phyogs su mig dmar dang / /rlung gi phyogs

su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan phyogs su spen pa'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /

rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te/ /oM badzra ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gra ha sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gra ha pra tIts+tsha sa
ma ye hU~M/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags btab pa'i/ /bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag

gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la rtag par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams

cad bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus dang / zla tshigs dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis
kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi gcog ste/ dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /grong

khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gnas thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe yang des bdag cag

mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang

de dag thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbul lo/ /klu chen po rnams legs kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig /de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
oM phu/ oM pha/ oM phU/ oM phA/ oM phI/ oM phe/ oM oM phai/ oM phau/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad la/ /kha dog dkar po bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /

phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs pa yi/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /kar ko Ta dang ku li ka /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /pad ma chu lha de bzhin du/ /mdor

na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar bar bri/ /sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas par bri/ /bum pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang / /bshos mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang

rtsir bcas/ /byas pa rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs/ /sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug /phud ces bya dang lhan cig tu/ /dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod de/ /de nas bu ni rgyal po dang / /rgyal
rigs thams cad rab bcug nas/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ /spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams
gal te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa rnams la bslus par gyur na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la bslus par gyur cig /de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye mas bsregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun du 'bar bas bdag

cag gi mgo bkas par gyur cig /rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyi/ byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi/ de'i yul du dug
ma mchis par bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par gzhom par bgyi/ rgyal po'i bka' dang /
rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yis/ /dbu la sbrul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas su/ /phud ces bya ba

'bum bzlas la/ /de nas dug blangs phud ces ni/ /bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang / /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng bas dgang / /de la phud ces bya ba bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud ces bya ba'i
rlung gis gtor/ /lpags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i/ /dug rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drangs/ /da nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis

kyang kun phyin na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis skrag pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skrag pas lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag /rnam par skrag /rab tu skrag ste/ kha sbub tu 'gyel nas gos dang
bral te/ sems kyang stor nas kun du 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'jigs
par byed pa chen po legs so legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed pa bdag nyid dang / lha'i bud med thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig /de nas 'jigs par byed pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra

phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM b+hai ra ba b+hI swA hA/ oM b+hA swA hA/ oM b+hI swA hA/ oM b+hU swA hA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+hau swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM b+haMHswA hA/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jigs

byed chen po ni brgyad po de dag bdag gi ngag nyan/ de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa/ /bris nas dbus su rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro chen 'jig rten gsum las ni/ /rnam rgyal zhes
bya gzhag par bya/ /de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'i/ /drag po chen po khros pa ni/ /'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /bud med

rnams dang ldan pa la/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par/ /ci bde bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /bkug ste mgo yi thod pa ni/ /

khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang / /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor der ni gzhag par bya/ /
de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i/ /mchog gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bum pa 'am mgo yi thod pa ni/ /de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste/ /bud med khyim 'am mtshan
gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang / /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas/ /mi 'jigs

par ni mgo thod par/ /khrag mchog bkang ste ar+g+ha dbul/ /de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can bud med kyi/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa/ /brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /

de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dran byed cing / /sha 'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu nas rab tu grub 'gyur nas/ /

ci 'dod ces ni smras nas kyang / /mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /bde chen hU~M gi tshul gyis gsol/ /khu ba bro ba'i btung ba dang / /rdzas dang ral gri 'khor lo dang / /

rtse gsum pa dang mtho ris dang / /mi dang sa 'og rgyal po dang / /gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin dang / /gnod sbyin dbang phyug srin po nyid/ /rig 'dzin nyid dang rig 'dzin gyi/ /'khor los sgyur dang 'jig rten ni/ /gsum

gyi bdag dang bka' nyan dang / /rang gi 'khor dang bud med kyi/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ci dga' bar yang sbyin par byed/ /byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa
la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rang gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /oM A/ oM b+hi/ oM ru/ oM i/
ga /bri/ oM ka /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thogs

bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa bri bya ste/ /g.yon par lag na 'khor lo thogs/ /g.yas par dbang po rang gi ni/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams/ /'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin
te/ /bya dang bum pa gang bar bzhag /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen gzhag /de nas zhugs nas lha rnams ni/ /mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya/ /dzaHhU~M baMhoHlha thams

cad/ /dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas 'ongs par mthong ba dang / /dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /oM pra tIts+tsha trA~M ma hA

satwa badzra d+hA ra A dz+nyA ya ha ha ha ho/ /me tog cho ga bzhin du dor/ /mig dbye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i/ /dngos
grub rab tu sbyin par bya/ /'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gnyis sam/ /dang po bsnyen pa byas nas kyang / /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams/ /de dag sgrub pas bsgrub bya ste/ /mtshan gcig la sogs gnas

sam ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang ngam/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na/ /nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs

nas/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /de ni ci bder sbyin bya yis/ /bzang pos myur du soms te smros/ /gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir/ /lha la mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /

lha rdzas khu ba bro btung dang / /mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ril bu rdzas dang rgyal la sogs/ /yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad
rnam par sbyong ngo / /mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par dben
pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par

bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyi bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /

de'i pha rol gyi dgra kun gzhom par bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / rgyal srid rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong

'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal srid thob pa rnams ni rgyal srid rgyas par bgyi'o/ /gling gcig pa dang / gling gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang /

mi'i gnas dang / sa'i 'og dang / 'khor los sgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dod nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/

rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dgod rab tu dgod/ yang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig

rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu dam par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags pa lung bstan du
gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i 'chi
bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la
phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa legs

so legs so/ /gang gi slad du tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe bsring bar bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis nyen pa rnams gang gis dus ma lags par 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang /

ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song gis rgyud thams cad las ci nas kyang rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde blag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyis

nas myur du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang / mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi tA A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM hrIHswA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM b+h+rU~M swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM kruM

swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM trAM swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o/ /oM hrIM swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/

de yi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag ste/ b+h+ru~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rje ste/

hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ kruM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ trA~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi

'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ hrIM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa rnams bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang / brgyad 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go /
bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag ste/ sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar

gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de

bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/ mngon sum du mthong nas de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mnyam par gzhag na de'i

tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ rata na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ b+ha Sh+wa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma ti kra ma ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra A ta ma

ko\u0f85haM zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ /de nas phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA ya hU~M b+h+ru~M/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M/ oM rata na rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M trAM/ /oM pad ma pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIH/ karma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M kru~M/ de nas dam

tshig dang / bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang / /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin pa yang mi blang zhing / /brdzun du

smra bar bya ma yin/ /pha rol bud med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya ste/ /de yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing / /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la/ /rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams

la lta smos ci dgos/ /ji ste glen pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma rnams/ /gom pas 'gom par

mi bya'o/ /glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos min ldan dang sdig spyod dang / /rtag tu
sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse ba'i/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni sngags kyis bsad/ /'jungs pa rnams ni nor blangs la/ /sems can phongs la sbyin par bya/ /

bla ma la ni mchod pa dang / /de ltar dam tshig bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor phyir dang dam tshig can/ /phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /mchod phyir mi yi dbang po 'am/ /phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go/ /sems can

rnams la phan spyod pas/ /rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor/ /srog chags srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pas ni bsgrub

pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas/ /thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i

dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+na badzra su sid d+ha ye oM badzra tiSh+Tha hU~M/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba karma ni ku ru bud d+hA nA ma hU~M/ de nas bla ma bla

ma'i phyir/ /khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /nor dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang / /stan dang gzhon pa de bzhin te/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang

sring mo tsha mo dang / /gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni/ /phan par bsams phyir bla mar dbul/ /de nas byang chub bar du ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang / /'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams/ /gang 'dod pa

dag bsgrub 'dod pas/ /dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan la/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams

thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du/ /sgrub

pa po ni bsgyur bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas nga rgyal

bskyed nas kyang / /mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub byas na/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag

'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / gzhan yang dman zhing kho

re chung ba phyag dar ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan gyi skye bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs na de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs

pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga la zhus pa de ni legs so legs so/ /lha'i bu rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su

yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la yang de'i yon tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang

yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur kyang grangs su yang mi chog /bgrang bar yang mi chog /dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pos kyang mi bzod do/ /
dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag

gis dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa la sogs par spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems

can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag cag

gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ kyai lha'i bu rnams sems can de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig dang / des sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral
ba rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kyai lha'i bu rnams ngan song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming la yang dbang bskur cig /gzugs brnyan

la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /mchod rten la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /chung ngu na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun

pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa 'am/ bran la yang dbang bskur cig / zhag bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na gdon mi za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ 'bum phrag gsum 'am/ 'bum phrag bzhi nas 'bum phrag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par

thar bar 'gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi/ /hom khung tha ma bar ma mchog /khru gang khru do khru bzhi pa'i/ /zlum po nyid du byas nas ni/ /de yi ming yang

yungs kar gyis/ /brgya phrag stong du bsregs byas na/ /ngan song kun las rnam par thar/ /de yi sha dang rus pa dang / /skra dang thal ba la sogs pas/ /cho ga de dang 'dra bar ni/ /sbyin sreg byas nas ngan song yang / /kun las

rnam par thar bar 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar 'bar bri/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang / /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /

de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /gtso bo ri mo lugs

ma'ang rung / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag /bya dang bum pa bkang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos rab dkar gzhag /mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkar po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas

gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /nga song rgyud na gnas pa yi/ /sems can rjes su dran byed cing / /sdig pa'i sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi can/ /'bras yos yungs kar

bsres pa dang / /de yi rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na ming nas smos te bya/ /de ni bde 'gror skyes nas kyang / /mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te/ /khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par/ /byas nas

hom khung gru bzhi pa/ /kun du mu ran ldan par bya/ /de dbus pad ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po ldan par bri/ /'khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran rnams la chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yis/ /so so'i

phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang / /lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya/ /gos rnams ser por bsgyur nas kyang / /mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa'i phyir/ /

rgyas pa yi ni las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel/ /de nas phan phyir nges par yang / /dbang du bya ba'i las byas na/ /hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la/ /khru

gang pa 'am khru do pa/ /khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su/ /pad ma dmar po bris nas kyang / /de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu yang mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog

dmar por bri/ /sngags rdzogs pas ni rtag par yang / /phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya/ /sems can de yang dran byas te/ /dmar por gyur pa'i gos gyon la/ /me tog dmar ram pad ma 'am/ /'bras bu dmar ram tshon

bskus pa'i/ /mar dang gur kum bsres pa dang / /tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis/ /sbyin sreg byas na lha la sogs/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mngon spyod kyang ni

brtsam bya ste/ /phyed dang gsum 'am khru gsum 'am/ /de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya/ /gru gsum pa dang ldan par ni/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i/ /rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang / /

mgo ni rdo rje rtse gsum dang / /dgra sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor/ /phyi rol du yang rim gsum du/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya/ /bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang / /bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag /sha dang khrag gis
bkang ba yi/ /mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag /de yi lus can sdig sogs dang / /bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ /gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsgyur/ /

de nas de yi sdig bcom lus/ /bgegs dang phral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris 'jig rten mi yi nang / /khams gsum pa na ci bder spyod/ /go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /tshe 'di'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste/ /de nas gang

gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun/ /snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya/ /des ni sems can thams cad la'ang / /myur du bde skyid myong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs

pa lha rnams yid mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di

'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i

blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/ yul dang phyogs dang / rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams mang du

'byor par bgyi/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / zhi ba rnams su bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba

lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ grong dang grong khyer du btsugs la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong
khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang / gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam/ bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang du 'di rab
tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang
po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de

mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad

pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang bde ba thams cad

bgyi'o/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod par bgyi'o/ /

bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /phyag na rdo rje lags par
'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams chos la rim gro bya bar de ltar dam tshig bcas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni legs so
legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig / // bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi

snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM badzra b+h+ruM hU~M badzra pA Ni dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha hU~M oM hU~M a/ oM badzra hU~M phaT/ oM driD+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra hU~M sa/ oM badzra hU~M a/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma

bzhin bris la/ /dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang ngam bde ba che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la/ /g.yas su phyag na rin chen bsnams/ /phyag na pad ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang

phyogs phyag na rgya gram bsnams/ /phyi rol du ni kun bskor cing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /byams

pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs/ /thub rnams de yi phyi rol bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ /tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma lha rnams dang / /rgyal po bzhi

po rnams dang ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /de yi phyi rol dmyal kun dang / /'dod chags la sogs byol song 'dri/ /sgo sgor gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /sgo ba stobs kyi dam pa rnams/ /dri rnams lnga

yi chus bkang ba/ /gser gyi bum pa 'od can dang / /gtor ma dang ni lha bshos dang / /me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang / /bla re dang ni rnga mchog dang / /dril bu rdo rje

nor bu dang / /do shal nyi zla la sogs brgyan/ /'dod can rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dgang ngo / /de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni/ /spyan drang bdag nyid 'jug par bya/ /bdag nyid kyis ni
dbang yang bskur/ /sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang / /bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs la/ /rig skyes skyon dang bral ba dang / /ser sna ma lus spangs gyur cing / /yon tan mang por ldan gyur pa/ /

gtong dang tshul khrims mang du thos/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems/ /dga' dang btang snyoms gnas pa dang / /stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems/ /smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i/ /slob ma dam pa sngags 'di

yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra hU~M dzaH/ badzra sa ma ya pra be sha hU~M/ oM badzra pA Ni pra tIts+tsha badzra sa twa ma hA su ka hU~M/ ha ha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ me tog gi phreng ba

dor nas gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM ci ste khyod kyis su yang rung ba la smras na ni phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas khyod

kyi mgo bkas par 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra sa ma ya D+ha hU~M a/ de nas 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra tsak+ShuHpa sha ho/ /A dz+nyA pa ya ti pan+na mok+Sha ya ma ni hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na

rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni swa yAn te a nu raka to a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba badzra

a b+hi She ka ta hU~M A/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She ka ta oM hU~M/ oM rata na a b+hi shiny+tsa sarba rad na a b+hi She ka ta oM trAM/ oM pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta oM hrIH/ karma a b+hi

shiny+tsa sarba karma a b+hi She ka ta oM A/ /de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' mnod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA a b+hi She ka ta oM kan te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+Na badzra pra sid d+ha ye hU~M/ de nas

las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no/ /bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus su ni/ /kun du bzang ngam bde ba che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang / /snying
gar hU~M zhes bya bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing / /kun tu bzang por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /hU~M las sangs rgyas gzugs

gyur na/ /phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor rnam bsgoms te/ /snying ga'i dbus su phaT ces pa/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams

na/ /khro bo stobs chen nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje brtan par bdag bsgyur la/ /snying gar oM zhes bya ba yis/ /bskor ba'i hU~M dang trAM ldan pa'i/ /bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rjer bsgoms la snying gi ni/ /dbus

su pad mo zhes bya ba/ /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /phyag na pad mo mnyam par 'gyur/ /'khor lo rgya gram hU~M ldan par/ /a zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang / /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /rdo rje

las dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bshad bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de ltar dbang dang mngon spyod rnams/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba yin/ /rdo rje

sems dpar bdag bsgyur la/ /zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing / /cho ga shes pas nang par nyid/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis de lus la/ /'phro bar gyur par rnam bsgoms te/ /
rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis/ /nyes pa thams cad sel byed pa/ /'di ni sems can phan dga' bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya/ /kun du bzang po'i sku chen nam/ /bde ba chen por bsams
nas kyang / /nang par re re 'od byed na/ /snga ma bzhin du las byas te/ /nang par sngar ni sems can rnams/ /sdig can sems ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'bar ba yi/ /rin chen 'dzin du

bsams nas ni/ /bza' ba legs byas nyi ma yi/ /gung la rgyas pa'i las shis te/ /rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin/ /'od kyis lus la rab

tu dgang / /sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni/ /pad mo 'dra bar byas nas kyang / /pad ma 'dzin par bdag bsgyur la/ /dag dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis lus bkang nas/ /

thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /'dren pa kun du bzang po yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rab tu bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyas pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no/ /dpal gyi rnam rgyal de bzhin du/ /longs spyod dbang
phyug dpal mnyam med/ /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid dang / /mdog sdug shin tu 'bar ba bya/ /bzhad cing rmad du mdzad pas ni/ /dga' mgu rangs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /pad mo bzhad pas chos kun ni/ /rtogs mdzad
sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mnyes 'gyur lha bran smos ci dgos/ /gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshogs mchog rnams/ /rnon pos gcod pa nyid du mdzad/ /gdon dang yi dgas 'dre rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin
po bka' nyan dang / /gza' mchog brgyad ni ma rungs rnams/ /'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad/ /lkugs dang lkugs pa ma yin dang / /glen rnams mi smra smra bar mdzad/ /lce la dzam zhes bya ba yis/ /

ma rungs rnams kyang lkugs par mdzad/ /rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang / /sems can don mdzad thams cad ston/ /hA~M zhes bya bas 'phro mdzad cing / /rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i so yis

ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang / /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs kun/ /za byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos/ /ma rungs snying gar dam du ni/ /bam zhes bya ba bsams nas kyang / /dug dang rims dang gdon la sogs/ /
rdo rje bsdams pas bcing bar mdzad/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg las rnams kyis/ /dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par mdzad/ /'od zer bsil bas dngos po la/ /rgyas par gyur pas sgom byed cing / /zhi ba'i lha

yi rnal 'byor dang / /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi bar bya/ /rang gi lus ni gser bcos dang / /nyi ma gsal shar dge 'dra bar/ /bsams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ /'od zer sprin gyis dgang bar bya/ /pad mo sems

dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /hrIH'dra 'od zer btang ba yis/ /snying la kun du skor byed cing / /'dod pa kun gyi dbang du byed/ /rdo rje hU~M gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /khros nas rdo rje mtshon cha'i char/ /sdig spyod lus la dbab
byas na/ /de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
the tshom thams cad gcod pa ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i brtag pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do/ /lag pa gnyis mdun
du bzhag la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te/ hU~M zhes bya ba dang / a zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lag pa gnyis kyi
thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis bkang zhing 'phro bar byas te/ mthe bo gnyis la oM zhes bya ba bsam/ mdzub mo gnyis la hU~M zhes bya ba gzhag /gung mo gnyis la trAM zhes
bya ba gzhag /srin lag gnyis la hrIHzhes bya ba gzhag /mthe'u chung gnyis la a zhes bya ba gzhag /de ltar yi ge rnams gzhag pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par
mos pa bskyed de/ chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang / bdag dang yang rjes su mthun par dran par byas te/ lag pa gnyis pad ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas oM zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang /

a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hU~M zhes bya ba dang / hrI zhes bya ba gnyis pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya/ trA~M zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las

thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig go/ de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang / de las rab tu 'khor lo 'dra ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o/ /de nyid las khar bzhag pa ni sgra'i ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so de nyid las gnyis su byas nas

las kyir byas na las kyi'o/ /g.yon pa mgo thod thogs 'dra dang / /g.yas pa mdung thung rtse gsum dang / /g.yon pa pad mo kha 'dzums dang / /g.yas pa oM zhes bya bar gzhag /g.yon pa 'khor lo bde gsum dang / /a dang
oM gnyis rtse sprad la/ /lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can/ /oM dang hU~M gnyis gzhur byas la/ /lhag ma mdar byas mda' can gyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khor lor bya/ /'od ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal/ /thal mo

dam sbyar sor mo 'phro/ /gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs/ /de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste/ /mchu la tshig 'byung 'dra bar gzhag /pa ba sangs ni bde ldan pa/ /spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin par bya/ /ban glang

sna ni chu srin 'dra/ /shes bya rgyu skar me stag 'dra/ /de nyid bskor na glog phreng gi/ bla 'og gzhag na sprin phyag rgya/ /'di dag ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag nyid do/ /de nyid las srin lag gnyis

bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba bcings te/ srin lag

pad ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni pad ma las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba dang / hrI zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las pad mo

'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid nang du bkug pa ni khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no/ /de nyid las shin tu bsdams

pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o/ /brkyang ba ni gzi can no/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis lcags kyur byas pa ni 'gugs pa'o/ /de nyid mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o/ /hU~M dang oM zhes bya

ba gnyis sbyar ba ni dgyes pa'i 'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing

'dzum par mdzad pa'i ya mtshan no/ /thal mo pad mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad ma'i 'o/ /A zhes bya ba dang / oM zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ /gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o/ /

snga ma las oM zhes bya ba gnyis khar bzhag pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/ mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /de nyid bsdus mdud sbrul mgor 'gyur/ /kun tu gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra/ /

srin po yi ni khrag 'phrog pa/ /lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste/ /dbyug tor ldan pa gnod sbyin no/ /bum par gzhag pa nor gyi ste/ /mthe bo sre mo'i sna 'drar bya/ /mgo yi thod pa nag po'i ste/ /'bring gi ri ti
lag brkyang ba/ /pi bang g.yon thogs dri za'i 'o/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba/ /gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin rje'i 'o/ /rno la khro dang dbang bsgyur ba/ /mthe'u chung ral gri mdzub zhags pa/ /

rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /lag las skye ba skyes par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du/ /pad ma'i phyag rgya bkra shis te/ /klu rnams shes bya uta pa la/ /de

ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal pa/ /bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol/ /gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste/ /ar+g+ha dbul ba rgyu skar rnams/ /de dag kun gyi sems sgrub pa'o/ /mgo bo

thod pa khar bzhag pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni 'phra men ma'i/ /mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yir bshad/ /de dag kun kyang thun mong du/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /thal mo brkyang bar bshad

pa ste/ /yang na thal mo pad mor bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /a zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang / /hU~M dang a

gnyis gshibs te bsgreng / /oM zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'i/ /phyag rgya snang ba byed par dgongs/ /de las a zhes bya ba bcings/ /oM zhes bya ba nang du gzhug /oM zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar/ /oM yang a

dang 'dra bar bya/ /trAM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni/ /A dang oM gnyis lu gu rgyud/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya/ /trA~M zhes bya ba

gshibs nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin no/ /de ltar hU~M zhes bya ba gshibs/ /lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar bya/ /rta mgrin phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /de yang las rnams kun la gsungs/ /spyan gyi mig dang 'dra

bar bshad/ /mA ma kI yi rdo rje 'dra/ /dkar mo pad ma nyid du bshad/ /uta pa la ni sgrol mar dgongs/ /sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra

dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa/ hU~M/ dza/ ho/ d+hu/ trang / rang / bri/ hA| hrIH d+hI/ kruM/ b+haM/ kaM/ raM/ k+Sha/ saM/ /oM bud d+ha lo tsa ne hU~M/ oM badzra mA ma kI trAM/ oM badzra paN+Da

re de hi de hi sid d+hi bo d+hi na lo kota ta ram ba swA hA/ oM badzra tA re tut+tA re tu re hU~M hU~M hU~M swA swA swA swA hA/ zhi ba'i brdung ba/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham

ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ sham ba ta/ rgyas pa'i brdung ba/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/

g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ dbang gi brdung ba/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu

ma/ mngon spyod kyi brdung ba/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha tw-i/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ de nas lha rnams kun dga' nas/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag

'tshal te/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir/ /gsol ba 'debs pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sku bor te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas gnyis su med par mnyam pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo me yi rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM badzra satwa kro d+ha a na lArka ma hA badzra kro d+ha dra ba dra ba/ bi dra

ba bi dra ba/ sarbA bA ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ra ha ra prA NAn hU~M phaT/ oM trai lokyA lo ka kA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM trai lokya d+ha ma ka hU~M phaT/ oM trai lokya nA sha na hU~M phaT/ oM trai lokya ban d+ha ka hU~M

phaT/ oM a mr-i tai hU~M phaT/ oM kA la daN+Da hU~M phaT/ oM ka ni d+hu ni hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHhU~M phaT/ oM kA la a gu sha hU~M phaT/ oM kA la pA sha hU~M phaT/ oM kA la ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM kA la rAk+Sha sa hU~M phaT/

oM ka la rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/ oM ka la daN+Da hU~M phaT/ oM kA la rA tri hU~M phaT/ oM kA la yak+Shi Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor mi zad pa/ /che ba'i mchog ste rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /lha rdzas 'bar ba'i phreng
bas dkrigs/ /shin tu 'bar zhing cher 'bar ba/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /'jig rten gsum snang la sogs khro bo kun/ /ma rungs snying kar mnan
nas sdigs byed cing / /zhal ni shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan/ sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan la/ /stag lpags kyi ni smad g.yogs bgos/ /rgyu ma thogs shing
dbu mtha' yas/ /mgo thod shas gang phyag na thogs/ /de ltar bris nas phyi rol du/ /srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag par bya/ /sgo ba rnams ni ji bzhin du/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i lag mtshan can/ /de nas

bdud rtsis gang ba yi/ /bum pa bcu drug gzhag par bya/ /bdug pa me tog dri zhim dang / /mar me dang ni bro snod dang / /kha zas bkang ba'i gtor ma dang / /bza' dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes/ /mgo thod
gang bar gyur pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang / /mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas 'jug /phyag rgya de dang de yis ni/ /sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig stsol/ /

de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang / /de nyid dran byed bsnyen par bya/ /de ni nges par dngos grub ste/ /yud tsam 'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur/ /

dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang / /rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam tshig brjod/ /de nas mchod de langs nas kyang / /tshogs spyan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /tshul du gnas nas

'byung bar bya/ /de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni/ /lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a na lArka s+phu ta ra tA pra tIts+tsha hUM~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha na ni rak+Sha hU~M

phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha pA sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ra ti sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M phaT/ 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang

bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de/ bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /de nas snying gar nyi ma bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing / /de gnyis gcig tu

bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su/ /gsod pa yin par bshad mod kyi/ /zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams/ /de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
ting 'dzin gnas/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing / /mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs/ /de bzhin de dag thams cad ni/ /thabs la sogs pas 'joms byed pa/ /
khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar/ /gsad pa'i las la bsam par bya/ /khros par gyur pa'i rgod ma'i khas/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing / /de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par/ /bsams na nges par
brlag par 'gyur/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing / /'od zer 'byung ba mang po yis/ /khyab par gyur par rnam bsams la/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la

sogs/ /'od zer des ni phyung nas kyang / /de yi nad rgas gnod pa rnams/ /zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor/ /de nas hU~M gi tshig bzhag la/ /rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing / /haM gi 'khor los go char bya/ /'od zer

chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de yi ming smos shing / /bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya/ /de nas khung bu gsum la rnam cig ni/ /zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la/ /khru gang tsam 'am yang na khru do pa/ /

mi rgyal mchog rnams kyi ni gnyis su bsgyur/ /de yi sa rnams rnam par sbyang byas te/ /'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse ltar gyur pa gcig /'od zer dkar po phreng bskor

gzi can gzhag /phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste/ /rigs brgya la sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing / /rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan rnams/ /phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogs su/ /lha

chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang / /'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya/ /dri zhim chus bkang mdog 'od dkar gyur la/ /dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyas/ /dkar gsum gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang / /

bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni bla re dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la sogs gzhag /nang re ga pur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa/ /tsan+dan la sogs pa yi byug pas byug /kha ni

shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya 'am/ /yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan/ /gos la sogs dkar phreng ba dkar gyis brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /

nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang / /til mar dang ni til nyid dang / /yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang / /'bras chen nas dang gro rnams dang / /me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams/ /ga pur dang ni bsres nas kyang / /tsan dan dkar

pos bsgos pa dang / /'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la/ /de dag khung bu'i khyad par las/ /rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog /sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste/ /

tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes/ /shin tu chung na sor brgyad de/ /bud shing zho dang ldan pa la/ /dri chus bskus par shes par bya/ /bud shing de las byung ba'i me/ /sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas ni/ /pad ma dkar po zhal

'dra dge/ /pad ma nor bu ril ba thogs/ /lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa/ /pad ma dkar po'i stan steng 'dug /de lta'i me lha bkug nas kyang / /ar+g+ha blangs te dbul bar bya/ /de nas zla rgyas dkar po la/ /

bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te/ /pad ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /bsams nas steng du bzhag par bya/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas kyang / /bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste/ /de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni/ /

shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya/ /nang par sngar ni gtsang 'gyur zhing / /shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la/ /bdud rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin sreg bya/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'/ /lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di/ /dang

por me lha brtag byas la/ /khro bo de ni de lus su/ /spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsams/ /de nas dang po khro bo la/ /bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum/ /de nas me lha nyid

la gsum/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de nas lha rnams re re la/ /de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul/ /de yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung / /de nas dang po khro bo yi/ /sngags kyis yam shing sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas

gcig tu bsres nas kyang / /bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu/ /brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya/ /de yi
lus la dbang bskur zhing / /mnyam par bzhag pas bsrungs nas kyang / /mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni/ /lha rnams thams cad gshegs par gsol/ /'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang / /'grub 'gyur 'di

la the tshom med/ /ci ste de ni sdig can nam/ /gal te mnyam par ma bzhag pas/ /de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /de nas de bzhin byas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /

zhi ba'i las so/ /'bras bur ldan pa'i nags tshal lam/ /yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am/ /rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste/ /khru do yang na khru bzhi pa 'am/ /de ltar mchog

ni khru brgyad de/ /chung mchog bar ma rnams las gcig /rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin/ /mdor na hom khung bya ba ni/ /stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil 'khor ni/ /chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de/ /bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid/ /

mchog la bcu drug yang na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya/ /mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam/ /sum cu gnyis su bya ba yin/ /phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed/ /pad ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor

dbus su rin chen dang / /pad ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya/ /de yi dbus su brko ba ni/ /legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad/ /khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa/ /yang na dpal bskyed pad ma 'dra/ /mdor na 'jim pa ser
po yis/ /de bzhin khung mchog brkos nas ni/ /gur kum la sogs bskus nas kyang / /de yi dbus su bris nas ni/ /tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang / /gser 'od 'dra bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas tshon ni

dmar ser gyis/ /rin chen pad ma la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya/ /rim gnyis yang na rim bzhi 'am/ /yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par/ /der ni sgo ba de dag nyid/ /phyag

rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya/ /bum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing / /dri chus rab tu bkang ba la/ /shin tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam/ /sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste/ /dkri ba'i dar ni ser po la/ /kha rgyan yal

ga me tog can/ /dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang / /phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang / /bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan/ /bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang / /me tog la sogs ser

pos brgyan/ /byang phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi/ /nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran zhing / /lha yi yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan/ /btso ma gser gyi 'od dang 'dra/ /de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra/ /gnod sbyin dang

ni 'dzam b+ha la/ /gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing / /yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad pa/ /mdor na de yi 'od zer gyis/ /nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /de nas rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/ /lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos/ /

rgyas par bya phyir de ming nas/ /smos te brgya phrag brgya rtsa brgyad/ /yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste/ /byang phyogs su ni seng ge yi/ /gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang / /

pad ma nyi zla gdan steng na/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog /rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni/ /phyag ni mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang / /rin chen

char yang 'bebs brtson zhing / /'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis/ /de la shin tu khyab byed bsam/ /dung dang pi bang cang te'u dang / /sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de yi

'og tu las brtsam mo/ /khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang / /yam shing bud shing khyad par dbye/ /mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang / /chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin/ /bar ma khru dor shes par bya/ /

khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te/ /me tog 'bras bur bcas rigs kyi/ /ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug /'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang / /me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni/ /

phal cher dpal gyi 'bras bur ldan/ /me lha gser dang 'dra ba la/ /phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin/ /pad ma gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa/ /spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin sreg bya/ /de yi lus su khro rgyal po/ /byin

can legs par bcug nas ni/ /sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal du/ /sbyin sreg yongs su brtag bya ste/ /'bum mam nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang / /don ni nges par rab tu 'grub/ /'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam/ /
longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis/ /de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya/ /de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /rgyas pa'i las so// //

dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang / /chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya/ /chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje chags pa de las byung / /khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir/ /pad ma sems dpa' rtag
tu chags/ /de bas 'dis ni de dag ni/ /las 'grub par ni bshad pa yin/ /chags dang 'thun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis/ /btso blag can nam zla mtshan can/ /khyim du chags

pa'i las rnams bya/ /yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung / /phyag na pad ma gnas nyid du/ /rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang / /pad ma uta
pal rdzing bu dang / /ban du ka yi me tog gnas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni/ /yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa/ /der ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam/ /de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams/ /byas nas de yi

dbus su yang / /hom khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /khru gang yang na khru do 'am/ /de ltar khru ni bzhi bar bya/ /gzhu 'dra ba 'am pad mo 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ /mda' 'dra zla ba kham 'dra dang / /de ltar pad ma'i

'dab ma 'dra/ /zheng du chu yi phyed kyi tshad/ /zheng gi phyed kyi tshad tsam du/ /hom khung zabs su brko bar bya/ /mu khyud sor ni bzhi par bya/ /nyis 'gyur ba ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /tha ma mchog gi khyad par las/ /yam

shing so sor shes par bya/ /yang na yam shing sreg shing ni/ /tshad ni zhi ba'i las su gsungs/ /shin tu dmar ba'i tsan dan nam/ /yang na shing dmar gzhan yang rung / /me tog 'bras bu dmar po 'am/ /btsag

dang tsan dan rgya skyags sogs/ /leb rgan rtsi dang gur gum gyis/ /mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni/ /yam shing la yang bskus nas ni/ /yungs kar kha dog dmar po dang / /btsag dang mtshal yang de bzhin du/ /

zangs kyi phye dang yungs kar dang / /skye tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru/ /la phug yungs rdog de bzhin te/ /khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams/ /bsreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang / /
sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i/ /khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /ba dang ra las bzhos pa yi/ /bshigs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang / /mar dang til mar
rnams kyis dgang / /ga pur la sogs bsgos nas kyang / /bdud rtsis btab ste gzhag par bya/ /de nas hom khung dmar po la/ /byi ru'i sdong po 'dra bar yang / /bsams nas spos dmar la sogs dang / /gur
kum dmar pos byug par bya/ /de nas kha dog dmar po yis/ /stug po nyid du bsku bar bya/ /gur gum ser pos bsres pa yi/ /tshon gyis ri mo bri ba ni/ /hom khung nang du pad ma bri/ /de yi steng du mda'

bcas gzhu/ /rtag tu hom khung khor yug tu/ /pad ma nyid ni bri bar bya/ /gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid/ /khor yug tu ni mda' nyid bri/ /gzhu yi phyi rol pad ma nyid/ /bris nas de yi steng du mda'/ /de yi phyi rol rdo

rje dang / /lcags kyu mdar bcas gzhu bris la/ /lho phyogs rgyal mtshan rin chen dang / /gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /pad ma ral gri 'khor lo rnams/ /nub phyogs nyid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje mche

ba go cha mchog /byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams su ni spos la sogs/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri bya zhing / /me tog dmar po la sogs pas/ /shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de/ /dpal ldan gos dang phreng ba
dang / /dmar po'i dri ni bskus nas kyang / /rtag tu thub pa nub bltas la/ /dmar thag ma chad las bya ste/ /pad ma dmar po'i gdan bsams la/ /rab chags phyag na pad ma bsnams/ /g.yon du rdo rje
chags pa la/ /g.yas su bde ba chen po ste/ /bsams na de yi dbus su ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag /rdo rje gzhu dang g.yon 'gying ma/ /me tog dmar rgyan rab dgyes ma/ /dri dmar la sogs rab
mchod de/ /mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du/ /pad ma dmar dang dbyig bsnams pa'i/ /me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang / /de yi lus su khro rgyal po/ /legs par bcug ste gzhag par bya/ /'od zer chags pas
bsgyur nas ni/ /de'i lus rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa bcings pas bkug nas ni/ /spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag /de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas/ /las byas pa ni gang yin pa/ /des ni lha

yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi dang lha min smos ci dgos/ /las rnams zin par gyur pa dang / /chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni/ /de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang / /de ni bsrungs nas gtang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod
pa yis/ /lha rnams mchod de gshegs par gsol/ /de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas/ /dbang gi las so/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha/ /phyag 'tshal yang dang

yang du ni/ /rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi/ mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dga' ba'i bsam pas bstod byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes

dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje'i yan lag rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje'i shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje

mtshon cha rdo rje che/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ /rdo rje rnon po rno ba che/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /rdo rje pad ma byang chub che/ /byang chub sangs rgyas rang byung ba/ /rdo rje'i rgya chen rgya chen te/ /rdo rje'i sgyu ma rnam

sbyong ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje pad ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsrung ba che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed/ /rdo rje ro langs ro langs che/ /rdo rje srin po za ba po/ /rdo rje

gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gdon te gdon che'i mchog /'jigs byed dga' byed drag po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' bsgrub pas legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba

dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od stug pas na stug pa che/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs

mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mchog /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyi skor/ /ha la ha la nag po che/ /sgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod

pa che/ /rnyog pa'i dus ngan rnam sbyong ba/ /skad cig g.yo ba the tshom gcod/ /glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro/ /rdo rje me ste ma rungs 'dul/ /drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa/ /nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs

par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo du ma 'od bzhin 'phro/ /phyag rnams du ma mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal la sku yang stong / /'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil pa la/ /sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /

ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma gtogs 'dod rdo rje can/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing

dul la dga' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun du bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams dam pas rnam par brgyan/ /khams gsum

bdag nyid khyab pa po/ /thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtso/ /gang gis 'di bris bklags gyur tam/ /rtag tu de don 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad

ces bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo / /de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting gar+b+ha

dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //dge'o/ zhus dag / @#/ /dur khrod dag dang shan pa

yi/ /khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba/ /thab khung tha ma bar ma mchog /phyed dang gsum 'am khru gsum 'am/ /khru dgu pa ni byas pa las/ /stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te/ /gru gsum

pa'am mdung rtse 'dra/ /lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni/ /bskus pas thab khung nag por bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri/ /mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang / /rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan/ /de yi phyi rol mu

khyud la/ /dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri/ /de yi phyi rol keng rus te/ /bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dud sprin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog /mi ro'i steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang / /gzar bu

phreng ba ril bar ldan/ /de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas/ /lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis sreg /shin tu gdug cing tsher mar bcas/ /sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang / /sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang / /rus phye dug dang ke

tshe dang / /dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i/ /rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni/ /bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum sregs nas/ /de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang / /gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams/ /
