de 'am mar gsar pa 'am/ til mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho 'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar

bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro/ /tha mas ni

dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/ /mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag
'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

gnang bar zhu/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so shod cig dang / ngas rjes su yi rang zhing rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal

po rnam thos kyi bu ngal bsos pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po rang gi snying ga nas phyung la/ oM bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung

gis de kho na bzhin rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM d+h+r-i/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM b+hi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na

bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas
bri/ /de yi g.yon pa'i logs su ni/ /ngal bso rnam thos bu dge yi/ /lag na be con ne 'u le/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi brjid
ldan pa bri/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni/ /pi wang sgrogs par yang dag brtson/ /mdzes cing kha dog ljang gu nyid/ /rgyan

rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas su dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri/ /nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongs su bskor/ /mig ni

dmar zhing shin tu 'bur/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug /'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing / /de nas rgyal

po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga bzhin/ /de nas slob ma rgyal rigs sam/ /rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang / /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /sngags shes pa

yi sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug /oM badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pra tIts+tsha twa~M ma hod ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de/ /'di yis 'grub 'gyur

gzhan du min/ /de nas grwa na gnas pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te/ /dang po phyag na rdo rje'i 'o/ /phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya/ /de la sogs pa'i go rim bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas/ /
rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur/ /'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi po yi bdag po mchog /lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / /lan bzhir rab tu zhugs

na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang / /'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang / /yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi/ /rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste/ /

de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang / /de yi pha rol sde dang nad/ /'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang / /yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi/ /ngal bsos pos ni rgyas par bgyid/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid/ /phyugs dang gnyen
bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ /mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed/ /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re ba kun dang bsam pa kun/ /bgyi ste

gal te ma nges na/ /phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin/ /de nas phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i

slad du rang rang gi snying po rab tu dbul lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs so/ /de legs par smros shig /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM iM/

oM a/ oM ya/ oM oM r-i/ oM ba~M/ oM ya~M/ oM ku/ oM aM/ oM bA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs kyi

char/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis/ /nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas de kun spyan drangs la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang / /slob

ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyogs skyong la sogs sngags bzlas pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /sgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas

rnams/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba

'dzin pa dang gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o/ /dus dang dus su

char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal

po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de dang /

rgyal po chen po yi bu dang / bram ze 'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i

'jigs pa med par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po

de dang / yul thams cad kun nas so sor bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /klu yi nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /me tog
dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems

can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs su bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal

po chen po lus ngan pos/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad bcu dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems

can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi'o/ /rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / gnag

gi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /glang dang / ba dang / bung bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa yang bsrung bar

bgyi'o/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang /

bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol du yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa yongs su spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcing ba

dang / sa gzhi bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje yi gur yang bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyi mtshan

ma nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /dge ba dang mi dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ bsgrub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam
mkha' la spyod cing nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i
blon po dang / bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs lam la gnas pa thams cad la bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa mchis te/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba kun nas bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyi gnas

thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mi yi bdag po dang / rje rigs dang / bram ze dang / rmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyi dus thams cad du don bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /
'jigs pa thams cad las kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ legs so legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po
rnams shod cig /de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM a/ oM so/ oM a~M/ oM bu/ oM br-i/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag
gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o/ /mtha' rnams su ni phyag rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bri'o/ /de yi mdun

du pa ba sangs/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya/ /me yi gnas su mig dmar nyid/ /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid/ /

srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste/ /rdo rje

lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /oM badzra ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gra ha sa ma ye hU~M/ oM badzra gra ha pra ti ts+tsha hU~M/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags
ni sngags pa yis/ bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ de nas gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po dag gis/ bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun du dus thams cad du de kho na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /

de rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnams so/ /tshes dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / 'jug phod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po'i bka' mi bcag cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe na yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi
'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams 'bul
lo/ /klu chen po rnams legs so legs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig /de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM phu/ oM phu/ oM pha~M/
oM phu/ oM phI/ oM phe/ oM pho/ oM phau/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /kha dog dkar po legs par bri/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhugs pa/ /phyag na
rdo rje rab tu nag /sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka bdun/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /
pad ma chu bdag de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri/ /sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yi/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri/ /bum pa brgyad rnams gzhag bya ste/ /
gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang / /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bcos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang ngo / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni/ /sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug /phud ces bya
ba lhan cig ste/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod do/ /de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal rigs ni/ /de dag thams cad bcug nas su/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming
tsam bzung bas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par
'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la bslus
par gyur cig /de yi tshe bdag bye tshan gyis sregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun du 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig /rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang /
bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /me tog thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka'
rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can/ /klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas ni/ /phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas/ /de nas dug
gis zin pa la/ /phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs/ /bsams nas de la phud yig bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud kyi rlung gis pags pa sha / rus
gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug /mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis kyang kun sel na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos
ci dgos/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
gis 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs pas lha dang klu la sogs pa kun du skrag rnam par skrag ste kha bub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te sems stor nas kun du 'phyan pa dag la phan gdags
pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'jigs byed chen po legs so legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang

nyid dang lha yi bu mo thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig /de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM b+he ra ba b+hai ra swA hA/ \u0f00 b+ha swA hA/ oM b+hi swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/

\u0f00 b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+hau swA hA/ oM b+ha~M swA hA/ \u0f00 b+haHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po ni/ /brgyad po de dag gdam ngag nyan/ /de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs
brgyad bri/ /dbus su phyag na rdo rje ni/ /khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag /de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa/ /'jigs byed rnams kyi bdag po che/ /'jigs byed ma dang

bcas pa bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang rnams thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par/ /ci bde bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de
bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni/ /khrag gis gang bas mchod nas su/ /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis
bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /mchog gis slob ma rnam
gzhug bya/ /thod pa dang ni bum pa yang / /brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las rnams sbyin par bya/ /ma mo'i khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul
bzhin du ni mchod byas nas/ /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs par byed pa'i sgras/ /bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te/ /mi 'jigs pa ni thod pa ru/ /khrag mchog bkang ba'i arga dbul/ /

de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can ma mo ni/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed ni/ /brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dran byed cing / /sha

'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu zhing rab tu 'grub gyur nas/ /ci 'dod smros shig ces bya ba/ /mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa rnams

sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni/ /ral gri 'khor lo rtse gsum dang / /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang / /gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid dang / /brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin dbang / /srin po nyid dang

rig 'dzin nyid/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba nyid/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid/ /bka' nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam/ /ma mo'i tshogs rnams ster bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ji ltar

'dod pa blang bar bya/ /hU~M gi rnam par mngon phyogs shing / /byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang na rang gi rtogs pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te
byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /oM A~M/ oM bi/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM/ oM ga /oM bri/ a~M ka /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor

bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri/ /g.yon du lag na 'khor lo can/ /

g.yas na dbang po rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams/ /chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag /
stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen yang / /de nas 'jug bya lha rnams yin/ /mkhas pas kun nas spyan drang zhing / /dzaHhU~M ba~M hos lha thams cad/ /pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas de rnams

gshegs bltas nas/ /dga' ba chen po mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /phyag rgya slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ oM prA tIts+tsha ma hA sa twa~M badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA ya hU~M ha ha ha ho/ me tog ji lta bzhin du dor/ /mig

phye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi/ /bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya/ /'bum phrag gcig gam 'bum phrag gnyis/ /sngon
du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni/ /de rnams sgrub pa po yis 'grub/ /mtshan ma gcig pa la sogs su 'am/ /yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang
ngam/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub/ /de nas nam phyed na ni lha/ /'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci/ /ji ltar bde zhing phan pa

ni/ /sbyin zhes nges par go bar byed/ /bzang po myur du soms te smros/ /gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas sngags shes dngos grub dang / /mchog gi lha la gsol ba gdab/ /lha rdzas bcud dang bcud len dang / /mi

snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ri lu rgyal srid rdzas la sogs/ /yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha rnams kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ngo / /mtho ris kyi lam bstan
par bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i

lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /byang chub

sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong

brdal dang ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang phyogs dang grong 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po yang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po thob pa'i rgyal po che bar bgyi'o/ /gling gcig

dang gling gnyis dang gling gsum dang / gling bzhi dang / bde 'gro dang / sa stengs dang / sa 'og gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / khyab 'jug nyid dang / dbang

phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ rab tu g.yos

yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dga' rab tu dga'/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/ brtse rab tu brtse/ yang dag par rab tu brtse zhing

ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba du ma yang 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu mthong ngo / /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu lung
bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang sngon sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad

pa 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'joms par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun

du dga' zhing ba spu langs shing phyag btsal nas legs so zhes bya ba rab tu phul te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so legs so/ /gang gis tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe ring bar
'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag gis zin pa rnams dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams ngan song las ji ltar grol ba dang / 'khor ba'i

'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde ba'i thabs kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur zhing myur ba nyid du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
ba gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yu pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+hA ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM badzri swA hA/

nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM b+h+ru~M swA hA/ snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM krA~M swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM trA~M swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o/ /oM hrIHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /

de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba

bzhag ste/ b+h+ru~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste/ badzri zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yon du ni khro bo ste/ kra~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas su nam mkha'i snying po ste/ trA~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /

rgyab tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la reg par bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor
los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go/ las thams cad pas mngon par bsngags pa yang ngo / /bdug pa la sogs gzhago/ mchod pa'i dang po can sgo skyong thams cad nyid kyang ngo / /de nas sngags pa

yang dag par 'jug pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang bcas pa 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /rig pa yang bde bar gshegs pa'i g.yon gyi logs su bri'o/ /de nas

bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ dkyil mo dkrung gis 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog so sor 'thob bo/ /gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di

bskyed par bya ste/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ rata na d+ha ra/ pad ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya~M a na ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M zhes pa'o/ /de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /\u0f00 sarba ta

thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas phreng ba de mgo la bcings la dbang bskur/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa d+hA ra A dz+nyA pa ya hU~M b+h+ru~M/ oM badzrA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M b+h+ru~M/ oM rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M trA~M/ oM pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa

hU~M hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH /de nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa yong mi spong / /srog chags rnams ni gsad

mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang nyid/ /brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /pha rol bud med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya zhing / /grib ma 'ang 'gom par mi bya'o/ /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung zhing / /mtshan
ma slob dpon spangs pa yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams la yang ga la zhig /gal te rmongs pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mchod rnying lha yi grib ma
dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma yang / /gom pas bgom par mi bya'o/ /blun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod
la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te bsad par bya/ /chos mi ldan dang bsreg pa dag /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse ba 'am/ /sngags pas sngags

kyis gzhom par bya/ /'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang / /sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin/ /bla ma mchod pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / /de bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la/ /mchod
pa'i don phyir bsams pa yis/ /nor 'phrog 'jungs pa'i nor yang 'ong / /sems can rnams la phan dga' bas/ /dam tshig dang ni bla ma'i rdzas/ /sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/ /rtag tu brdzun ni

smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pa'i bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med kyang bsten bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pas/ /thams cad spyod cing

kun byas kyang / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying rje ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a dz+nyA te dA s+yA mi gr-i h+Na badzra su sid d+ha ye/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha hU~M/ 'dis rdo rje lag

tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin no/ /oM sarba karma Ni ku ru bud d+hA nA~M hU~M/ de nas bla ma bla mar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyi lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /rta dang bzhon pa nyid dang ni/ /bran gyi

mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni/ /phan pa'i bsam pas bla ma dbul/ /de nas dngos grub sangs rgyas

dang / /byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni/ /'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rig ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan

la/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsam nas dam tshig phyag rgya

yang / /bsam bzhin de bzhin de nyid kyang / /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du/ /sgrub pa po yis yongs su bsgyur/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /gong 'og go rim ji bzhin du/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha

chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs

rigs dang / gzhan yang dman pa phyag dar ba dang / mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas dang / skye bo'i gnas kyi rigs su skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so/ /lha'i tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs

shing dbang bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la yang de'i phan

yon bshad par spro ba med de/ gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur yang grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi phung

po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzod do/ /gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs pa spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag

la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ kye lha'i bu dag de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /bcug nas kyang dbang skur cig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig /de nas sems can de dag tshe ring bar

'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral ba bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig /gzugs brnyan

la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /tha na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa dang / bran la yang dbang skur cig /zhag
bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bas/ nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te/ 'bum phrag gnyis dang / 'bum phrag

gsum dang / 'bum phrag bzhi dang / 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bar du bzlas na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta ci smos/ lha'i bu rnams zhi ba'i thab

khung zlum po tha ma dang bar ma dang mchog khru gang dang khru do 'am/ khru bzhi pa byas nas de'i ming gis yungs kar dkar po rnams brgya phrag stong du sregs na ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sha dang / rus pa

dang / skra dang / thal ba la sogs pa la cho ga de bzhin nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /

'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams

ni phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten 'khor rnams kyang / /gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag /bum pa bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos
shin tu dkar/ /mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkar po'i gos ni gyon nas su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi/ /sems can de

rjes dran byed cing / /sdig pa sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /rgyud dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de yi rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na ming tsam gyis

kyang bya/ /de nas bde 'gror skyes nas su/ /mkhas pas rgyas par bya ba ni/ /khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru brgyad par/ /byas nas thab khung khru bzhi pa/ /kun du mu ran dang ldan pa/ /

de dbus pad ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po can bri zhing / /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran la ni chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yi/ /dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang / /
lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya/ /na bza' ser por gyon byas nas/ /mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa yi/ /don du rgyas pa'i las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /gzi

brjid skal ba bzang po 'phel/ /de nas de la phan pa yi/ /dbang du bya ba'i las bya ste/ /thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba/ /khru gang ba 'am khru do pa/ /khru bzhi byas la de dbus su/ /chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus

su mdar bcas pa'i/ /gzhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu ni mdar bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri/ /sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang / /phyi rol de yi lha yi bya/ /sems can de ni dran byas la/ /na bza' dmar

po gyon pa yi/ /me tog dmar zhing pad ma yang / /'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa/ /mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang / /tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma dang / /sbyin bsreg byas nas lha la sogs/ /thams cad de yi dbang du

'gyur/ /de yi gdon rnams rnam gzhom phyir/ /mngon spyod yang dag brtsam par bya/ /khru do phyed bcas khru gsum 'am/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru dgu pa/ /zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum

pa yis mu ran bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la/ /dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams/ /rdo rje dgra sta rtse gcig gis/ /phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya/ /rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin brgyan/ /bum pa gtor ma bum

pa yang / /zhal zas mang po gzhag par bya/ /sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi/ /thod pa rnams kyang kun du yang / /de nas gos nag bgos shing khros/ /rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /lus can de yi sdig las

sogs/ /de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing / /bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid/ /ji snyed khams gsum 'jig rten spyod/ /myur du go rims 'di nyid kyis/ /tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la

bya/ /de nas gang gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang / /snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin bya/ /des ni sems can rnams la yang / /myur du bde skyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs

pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang phan yon dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po

'di 'dri ba dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyid pa lta ci smos/ gang yang

rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjes su slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / skye bo'i gnas dang / 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sogs pa yang bsrung

bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi'o/ /bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o/ /'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o/ /gang zhig

brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o/ /glang po che'i steng du gzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa

thams cad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas par shes par bgyi'o/ /gang na

'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun du bzang por re ba thams cad yongs

su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /

gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir rab tu spyod pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /mngag gzhug pa nyid du gnas

par bgyi'o/ /bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o/ /dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gis mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /

phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun du bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legs so

legs par bsgrubs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM b+h+ru~M dru~M badzra pA Ni dr-i D+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M/ oM hU~M a/ oM badzra

hU~M phaT/ oM dr-i D+he badzra hU~M/ oM badzra hU~M sa/ oM badzra hU~M a/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang po bde ba

che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /g.yas su phyag na rin chen spyan/ /phyag na pad ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri/ /phyi rol du ni zlum por skor/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rol

sems dpa' rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang / /byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni/ /kun dga' bo sogs thub pa bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor

ba'i/ /tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang rgyu skar nyi zla dang / /rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri/ /phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs/ /klu la

sogs pa dud 'gro'i dpe/ /sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du/ /sgo skyong stobs kyi dam pa rnams/ /dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la/ /rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang / /dkyil 'khor

'gal ba ma yin no/ /lnga pa de rjes bdun pa dang / /nya gang ba ni khyad par du/ /bsngags te phyag na pad ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o/ /gang yang drag po'i las rnams la/ /de ni nag po la yang bri/ /khro bo

rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang / /zla ba nya ba khyad par du/ /rgyal po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bsngags/ /gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing / /shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste/ /

phyogs kyi cha ni brtag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni/ /yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas/ /'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi/ /rjes mthun rang gi slob

nyid kyi/ slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad/ /de nas nang par rab sngar langs/ /legs bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang / /blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro/ /dkyil 'khor

phyogs nyid shin tu yang / /nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyes/ /khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi/ /dri yi chu yis bsangs pa yi/ /dbus su rigs rnams snying po yis/ /lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid/ /dkyil 'khor

gyi ni gtso bo yi/ /sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya/ /sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dri yis byas nas su/ /dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du/ /lhag pa de nas bzlas pa bya/ /de rjes lha rnams nyid

kyi yang / /byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /snying pos skal ba ji lta ba/ /dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa/ /byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing / /mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo / /de nas tsan dan la sogs pa/ /bsres

pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags/ /de la dbul ba'i me tog dang / /bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin/ /so shing u dum ba ra dang / /a shwad tha sogs rma med cing / /shin tu phra min sbom pa min/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni/ /

dri yi chu yis rab bkrus shing / /me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcing / /dri bzangs la sogs byugs shing bdug /lag pas reg na snying po ni/ /mang po yang ni bzlas bya zhing / /rigs nyid kyis ni lan bdun nam/ /slob ma
rnams kyis tshad gzhal bas/ /so shing la sogs yang dag gzung / /gcig la sogs pas go rim bzhin/ /rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya/ /de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis/ /slob ma srung ba brtan byas

nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni mar byugs pa'i/ /yam shing rnams ni mar dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang / /mar gyi sreg blugs bsreg bya zhing / /zho zan gyi yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir/ /

de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin phyir/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cing / /sdig pa zhi bar bya phyir ram/ /de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas/ /cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya/ /de yis ji ltar nus pa yis/ /de bzhin sdom pa

gzung bar bya/ /de rnams cho ga 'di yin te/ /gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni/ /mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la/ /lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya/ /bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin/ /de yi rjes la byang chub

sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed bya zhing / /bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran bya/ /de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i/ /chu yis spyi bor bsang gtor bya/ /mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas/ /

rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /lag pas dri bzangs sbags pa la/ /'jigs pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis/ /lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig /

rta mgrin chu skyes rigs la ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge bcu/ /sum b+ha zhes bya rdo rje'i rigs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /yi ge hU~M bzhi rnams dang ldan/ /las kun rab tu spros pa la'o/ /rigs gsum

rnams la thun mong ba/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba pa yi bdag pos gsungs/ /las ni thams cad pa yi sngags/ /spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas/ /bsang gtor

yang bya de nyid kyis/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /'bru la sogs pa thams cad ldan/ /cung zad cung zad gang du blugs/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags/ /cho ga bzhin
du lhag gnas bya/ /dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin/ /me tog kyang ni gzhug par bya/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /mkhas pas yang dag yongs su bzlas/ /de yis

dbang bskur bya ba yin/ /slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni/ /thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la/ /de nas so shing sbyin par bya/ /slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin/ /gzung zhing shar du kha

bltas te/ /phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'/ /ma gas par ni 'chos nas su/ /logs ma yin par 'dor bya ste/ /so shing mdun du dor byas pa/ /gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung / /de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya/ /gang zhig steng du

bltas pa yang / /de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan/ /dngos grub 'bring du yongs su grags/ /byang du bstan na thad ka nyid/ /rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa/ /so shing dor ba rgya lam na/ /gang tshe 'og tu kha bltas pa/ /de tshe sa

'og dngos grub ni/ /'byung ba 'di la the tshom med/ /slob ma nye bar reg pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du gzung byas la/ /thams cad las phyed sngags kyis ni/ /bla mas dri bzangs chu sbyin no/ /re re la yang btung ba'i phyir/ /

khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas blo ldan langs nas su/ /'di dag kun du spyad par bya/ /de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/ /lag pas spos ni bteg nas su/ /blo ldan gus pas lha rnams la/ /gsol ba gdab

cing gus gnas bya/ /dang por sngags ni snyan gsan dbab/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /de yi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no/ /bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khyod

la 'dud/ /slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rje yi/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la/ /bka' drin mdzad par

rigs lags so/ /'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang / /'byung po rdzu 'phrul che gang dang / /

sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams/ /bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba dang / /che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang nyid 'byung ba bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod
kyis/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /rjes su brtse ba nyer bzung nas/ /dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni/ /nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs/ /de skad smras te tshig gang zhig /bcom ldan 'das la

phyag 'tshal nas/ /bstod pa'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas/ /de dag gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /chags bral so sor ldan pa yi/ /slob ma rnams la chos bshad bya/ /blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te/ /dge ba'i gnyid

kyis nyal du gzhug /de nas snga dro nyid du ni/ /mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong ba dri/ /gang tshe dge ba 'am mi dge ba/ /dogs med nyin bar thos nas su/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni/ /rigs bdun rnams kyi dam

tshig bskyang / /de nas bu khyod dam tshig dang / /sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa/ /dad pas bla ma'i bka' yang bskyang / /khyed kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin mi blang 'dod log dang / /dngos grub 'dod
pas mi bya'o/ /chang mi btung zhing sha la sogs/ /bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid/ /sems can kun la gnod mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum yang mi spang zhing / /dus rnams kun du byang chub sems/ /snying
po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /gang las sdig 'gyur de las 'da'/ /de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang / /grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya/ /
phyag rgya'i rnam pa 'ang de bzhin nyid/ / sngags dang lha la mi smad cing / /gdon gyi las rnams mi bya'o/ /mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya/ /mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang / /som nyi yid gnyis
mi bya ste/ /rgyud dang lha sogs la de bzhin/ /dad pa brtan pas dam bcas nas/ /sarba bid+yA kyis dbang de bzhin/ /bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin/ /

de nas lag tu rdo rje dang / /dril bu sbyin bya de rjes la/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun/ /gzung nas 'khor los sgyur ba yis/ /rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur
zhing / /sngags bsgrub 'dod pa'i slob ma la/ /rjes su gnang ba nyan du gzhug /de nas bstod pas mgo bo yis/ /phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas/ /bla ma la ni dbul bya ste/ /rin chen gter dang

'bru dang dbyig /gser dang bzhon pa khyim dang gdan/ /bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang / /bud med rnams ni dbul bya zhing / /grong dang grong khyer ci bzhed rnams/ /rang gi sems ni rab dang bas/ /yon rnams

nges par dbul bya zhing / /dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la/ /mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya/ /tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang / /'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur te/ /
lha yi bde ba lta ci smos/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang / /de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /de phyir slob dpon smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun

dang sring mo dang / /gang yang smad par mi bya zhing / /'khon par yang ni mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams/ /dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya/ /de lta bu sogs gnod

byed la'ang / /de lta nyid do de byas na/ /kun rig gis gsungs dngos grub 'thob/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /dngos grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang / lha dang

bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs te/ bri gzhi la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing g.yas su de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong

ba'i rgyal po dang / g.yon du shAkya thub pa dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad ma can dang / shAkya thub pa'i 'og na

phyag na rdo rje dang / de dag gi dbus su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis a ru ra'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o/ /rta mgrin dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa

'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbus su lo tsa na dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o/ /de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu

srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yongs su gang bar bri zhing bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras

bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /'og nyid du sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dud par bri'o/ /de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste/ spyan dbye ba byas nas mchod pas mchod

par bya'o/ /de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub bo/ /gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o/ /bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / /dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra nyid/ /dge slong bram ze bu mo dang / /'bras bu
mthong na dngos grub ni/ /mchog 'bring tha ma myur du 'grub/ /de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang / /sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing / /'jig rten gsum ni
rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas su/ /bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas/ /ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba/ /'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ /de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /

sngags kyang chad lhag bskang bya ste/ /brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya/ /de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ /mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas/ /mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas

pa bya/ /de nas gal te gtso bo 'am/ sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na/ /de tshe snod 'dod ji lta bar/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis/ /dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol/ /

phyag byas nas ni dngos grub ni/ /mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la/ /rang rang skal ba phul nas su/ /de nas rtag tu bdag nyid spyad/ /de rnams med na shes rab can/ /blangs nas rang nyid

spyad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan brtson zhing / /bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/ /legs par bsgrubs na thams cad byed/ /gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdong la sogs/ /tshig tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du/ /zhi ba'i las
la sogs pa ni/ /thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur

pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa

chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du nyon cig /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi/ /bum pa rnams kyis

snga ma bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing / /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni/ /kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur/ /sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che/ /de yang gnas gtsang

lhar skyes nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos dgro thos/ /phyir mi bzlog pa'i sa la gnas/ /rim gyis byang chub mngon sum byed/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming / /gur gum gyis ni bris nas su/ /ngan song gsum gyi

'jig chen las/ /sems can rnams ni thar ba'i phyir/ /sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /lha yi

gzugs su brtags nas su/ /mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni/ /snying ga de yi phyogs bris nas/ /lha mnyam par ni sems skyed de/ /khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya/ /de yi ming

dang spel ba'i sngags/ /gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni/ /'bum ni yongs su rdzogs par bya/ /mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya/ /de ltar byas na de nges par/ /

dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin yi dgas byol song las/ /grol te lha rigs rnams su skyes/ /de yi ming dang spel nas ni/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas/ /gal te brgya phrag stong yang

tshang / /bye ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya/ /lha rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi ming nas spel ba yi/ /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /sbyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni/ /
chen po'i sdig pa las grol 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi/ /gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /yungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras/ /ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan/ /de bskus yam shing de srid

du/ /cho ga ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges par yang / /lha rigs rnams su skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma nye bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang / /yang na thab khung nang du ni/ /dkar po g.yas

skor 'bar ba dang / /gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med/ /'phro ba bsdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang / /glog bzhin dri ma med 'od brtan/ /me rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na me lha bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin kho nar

ston 'gyur te/ /zla ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o/ /mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la/ /de nas dmyal sogs rnam grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /

khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin thab khung rko/ /rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa'
rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten la sogs phyi nas bri/ /de nas bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag /bza' dang bca' ba zhal zas dang / /me tog phreng

sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni/ /mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga shes pas de bris nas/ /lha yi tshogs ni

spyan drangs te/ /sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis/ /arga la sogs phul nas ni/ /mdor bsdus mchod pa byas nas su/ /lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga bur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos

la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /dri yi chu ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chan spos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs su bzlas/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gis sngags

kyis btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za la sogs su gnas pa'i/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas su/ /chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni/ /sngags bzlas dri yis byug

par bya/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng ba la sogs mchod/ /gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du/ /sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya/ /snying ga mgrin pa kha phyogs

su/ /sarba bid+yA kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis/ /rna ba dku dang dpus mo bol/ /sna yi rtse mo long bu dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi

gnas dang ni/ /de ltar gzhan du 'ang gnas yi ge/ /mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag /de dag ngan song yongs sbyang phyir/ /stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag /de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni/ /mngon par bsngags pa'i

gos kyis g.yogs/ /de nas byin za yang dag rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla ba kun da bzhin du zhi ba'i yid/ /dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag /de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i

mchod pa bya/ /de nas dang po de yi sbyin sreg ni/ /rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni/ /yongs brtags nas ni rgyal ba las/ /sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang / /bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /

de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po yi/ /bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag /de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs la/ /yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum mchod/ /phyag na rdo rje pad ma zhags pa bsnams/ /

rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi dbu rgyan can/ /bsam par bya zhing yang dag bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po brgya phrag stong ngam ni/ /ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya/ /

yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni/ /de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya/ /de nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang / /ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la/ /sbyong

ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te/ /gong bu byas nas gar bur dril/ /sa dang legs par bsres byas la/ /sku gzugs mchod rten ltar bsam zhing / /lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa

brgyad/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la/ /'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum ma~M/ /dri spos ngad ldan 'od snang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa sna

tshogs pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / /me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang / /dung dang rnga dang gling bu dang / /pi bang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mtshan ma de/ /sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba/ /de tshe 'bum
phrag brgya stong bzlas/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya/ /de mthar cho ga shes pa yis/ /mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas/ /de

nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong / /lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni/ /de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /byams dang snying

rje ldan pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /gal te de yang med gyur na/ /de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis bya/ /de yi ming tsam bris nas su/ /mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang / /sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas su/ /

sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/ /gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /ming spel sngags ni mngon btab nas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor/ /de ltar byas na sdig pa can/ /yin yang

ngan song rnams las ni/ /rnam par thar bar gyur nas kyang / /dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus

bsam gtan shes rab rgyu/ /rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan/ /'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni/ /'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos/ /'di la the tshom med pa yin/ /gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang

med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gi gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi

brten pa dang / /'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du blta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams

la de lta bu'i shes rab dang thabs med na grol ba med do zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad

do/ /mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do/ /brgya byin gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du byas so/ /'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to/ /dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog
la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa

sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu pa ti nI la ka Na Tha u ma pri ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis

mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med dang mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par cung zad 'dud par bya'o/ /'di ni phyugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o/ /khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa/ mdog nag po phyag

bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu ma rma bya la zhon pa/

zhal drug pa/ dmar po g.yas pa dag na shaka ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur shes par bya'o/ /mi smra ba rdo rje ngang pa zhon pa/ gser mdog can zhal

bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po zhon pa/ phyag

g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo yang shing rta zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na

pad ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do/ /rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o/ /

rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje ska rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje tshogs bdag glang

sna glang po che zhon pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa mdog dkar po'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis

kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ljang khu/ bya ku li ka'i shing rta la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta

bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shaka ti 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje

dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o/ /rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal pa la zhon pa/ mdog dkar po'o/ /phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri

'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khar bu zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje

gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po ri dgas la zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas dar 'dzin

pa'o/ /mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o/ /rdo rje me'i pho nya mo ra skyes la zhon pa mdog dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag

na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed pho nya ma sngon po ro langs la zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa/ sngon po phag gi gdong pa can/ g.yas pas rdo rje

'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje nag mo bran mo ro langs kyi bzhon pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo'o/ /rdo rje log 'dren phran bra

ba byi ba zhon pa/ mdog dkar po/ glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o/ /rdo rje srul mo

bran mo mdog sngon mo g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba zhon pa'o/ /klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa gdengs ka brgyad pa/ mdog dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje chu srin ma bran 'phrul mo chu srin zhon pa/ mdog dkar mo/ gdengs ka brgyad ma/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs mdog ma ljang khu g.yas pas rdo rje
'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo mdog dkar ser g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas pi wang g.yas

pas rdo rje ma'o/ /bgrod ka mdog ljang gu seng ge la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa

dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon

du bltas pa'o/ /de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti r-in+ti r-is dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go/ yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la skor ba bdun dang dung

dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hU~M bzhi pa nyid

kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo / /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang / /gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang / /mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya/ /'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams/ /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid/ oM badzra uta g+ha TA ya sa ma ya pra be sha hU~M zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya yang 'di yin te/

rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te/ /mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung / /legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ /sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin zhes pa'o/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun

las byas pa 'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs

pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas pa/ phyir kun du lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen mos

byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti r-in+ti r-is yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badzra ud ka hU~M zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon

par bsngags pa byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go/ 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag

go/ /de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo / /byi ru de bzhin sa le sbram/ /dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni/ /rin chen kun te sing hi dang / /byA g+h+ri gi re be be re/ /

sman kun til nas sran ma sha /'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste/ /sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o/ /de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang

yongs su bzlas te sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis gtsug tor bcing ba dang / sgo skyong gis gdong bcing ba dang / rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyis slob dpon gyis khro bo te r-in+ti ris me tog sngon

po'i phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badzra sa ma ya pra be shA mi zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas

bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa bkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya

dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / phreng ba dang / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal

nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang / rdo rje brtul shugs kyang bzung la/ me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang / yi ge

hU~M gis gzeng bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang smos la/ slar yang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste/ hU~M ka ra badzra ha~M zhes pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan brjod par bya zhing rnam par snang

mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo/ /badzro ha~M zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la rdo rje

rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badzra d+hA tu a ha~M zhes pa'o/ /de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu'i bdag nyid dbab pa'o/ /badzra g+han g+ha

N+To ha~M zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badzra a be sha kro d+hA ha~M zhes bsgom mo/ /de lta bus rdo rjer bsgrubs pa yin no/ /de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtogs par byed

cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste/ oM badzra sa mA ya dzaH /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do/ /de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang / rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod do/ /de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa

mchog go/ de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge hU~M bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi

phyag rgya rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M a ha~M/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro//

de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/ rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung / /dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags/ /khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa/ /de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya/ /lag ngar rdo rje kun du bsnol/ /

mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid/ /mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang / /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal zhes/ /de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing / /nor bu nyid ni bar ma bskum/ /mnyams la dbu ma pad ma nyid/ /gung mo mdzub

mo gnyis sdigs mdzub/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang / /g.yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o/ /de dag nyid sbyar yi ge hU~M/ /legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang / /mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du/ /snying gar

nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum/ /lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang / /mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can/ /mdzub mo sen mo kun du rig /g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang / /gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid/ /kha las rab mchog

thon pa yi/ /mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang / /mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang / /mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdams/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyings sba bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta

ste/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su/ /snying gar yang na mthe bong mnyam/ /legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma/ /thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung / /gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin/ /thal

mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong mnyams te nges par bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang ba byug pa yi/ /mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang / /mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings/ /mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing / /

rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid ces pa'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la hU~M gi rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste/

rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad rin chen hU~M mdzad/ chos kyi hU~M mdzad/ las kyi hU~M mdzad kyi gnas su yang ngo / /de nas rin chen hU~M mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/

oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sarba rata na hrIHhU~M phaT/ oM badzra hrIHSh+Ti kro d+ha duSh+Ta mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pA ya pa d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya gzhan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par blta'o/ /

de nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad klog par bya'o/ /gzhan rnams rdo rje hU~M mdzad du 'gyur

ba rigs pa yang ma yin te/ rgyud thams cad du hU~M mdzad nges par bstan par yang ma yin no/ /de'i rjes su de kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bkod de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod do/ /de rnams

kyang hU~M yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can/ trA~M yig rdo rje'i snying po yi/ /hrIHyi rnam pa rdo rje'i sde'i/ /aHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi/ /hU~M sems dpa' rdo rje ma yi/ /trA~M rin chen rdo rje ma yi/ /hrIHchos kyi rdo rje ma yi/ /aHlas kyi rdo rje ma yi/ /hU~M hU~M/

trA~M trA~M/ hrIHhrIH/ aHaHzhes bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la hU~M/ gzugs mdzes pa la hU~M/ rna ba bde ba la hU~M/ mchod pa thams cad la hU~M/ rab tu dga' ba la hU~M/ dbus su bgrod pa la hU~M/ legs

par gzi mchog la hU~M/ dri bzangs mchog la hU~M/ a ya hi dza hU~M/ a hi hU~M hU~M hi s+pho Ta ba~M hU~M g+haN Ta a aHhU~M/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o/ /de ma thag tu a'i yi ge las snying

kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis byas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo g.yas pas bzung zhing bsgreng ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab
tu ster ro/ /gnyis po de dag gis 'gying pa dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang sems dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas/ /mda'

gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang / /legs so zhes bya snying gar gnas/ /rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba/ /rin chen hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje khro gnyer dang / khro bo dang / rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma rab tu blta/ /g.yon

gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin 'di ni yongs su bzlog /g.yas dang g.yas min rnam par bsnol/ /chos kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma la ral gri 'o/ /mgal me'i

'khor lo bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing / /rdo rje'i gar ni bkrol bas ni/ /'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas/ /las kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje las dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /go cha mthe chung mche

ba mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing / /rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung / /gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor/ /

mthe bo mnyams te nges par gshig /dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis/ /mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mchog dag bsnol/ /

rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems ma dang /

rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyis sbad ste rdo rje dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi skyes pa dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo / /

thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin te/ g.yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rkyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag dang mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o/ /

'di ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid de/ de rnams kyi rig pa ljags rnams la dgod do/ /'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje

bskyed la de rnams 'dri bya'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo / /de nyid

kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong ba'o/ /mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung zhing rdo rje'i rig pa mchog 'di ni rdo rje'i

dpal zhes grags so/ /de las gzhan ni rab bshad bya/ /sgyu ma rdo rje sogs mi can/ /rdo rje bsnams pa brtan byas la/ /g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcing bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun la 'di/ /rdo rje

rnam gnyis dang yang byas/ /mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams su 'ang dgod par bya/ /mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang / /mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos/ /oM gyi rnam pa spyi bor

gnas/ /rdo rje shugs kyi rab tu gnas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'am phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang / /lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du/ /lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas/ /kha las yongs su

bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams so/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang / /phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid/ /g.yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang / /ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son/ /tshogs kyi bdag po

chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang / /de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang / /g.yas pas 'bar ba kun du ston/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar/ /pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /

bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse/ /byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor/ /lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang / /rdo rje g.yas pa 'phrog ma'o/ /bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /de nas u ma la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag

rgya 'byung ste/ /g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ /rtse gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya/ /'di bcing ba yi yang dag pa'i/ /dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ /g.yon pa rdo rje mchog

bsrungs pa/ /cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya/ /'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdam/ /de bzhin bu'i phyag rgya dang / /oM yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid/ /yi ge rna can yongs su gzung / /
