phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni/ /'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid/ /'od zer bsdus pa kho na yang / /dbyug pa khu tshur gzung ba nyid/ /kha las yongs su bskor ba dang / /khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis/ /phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje

bcings/ /ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid/ /rtsibs can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'/ /'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams/ /lag ngar bskum zhing kha phyogs dang / /rgyab nas yongs su bskor ba nyid/ /'od zer 'bar ba grol

ba dang / /mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid/ /pho nya'i dam tshig rnams so/ /gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar/ /bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed/ /lag ngar bsnol dang ma bsnol dang / /de bzhin stobs ni 'phrog pa'o/ /bran mo rnams

kyi dam tshig yin no/ /de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i ljags rnams la sngags bkod la yi ge a las rang gi snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying

gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / bskal pa bzang po pa dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur

ma dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan

nyid can rdo rje la sogs rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phyi'-i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o/ /bum pa gang ba rnams dang / gos zung 'bum dang / stong

phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ re re la re re 'am/ thun mong ba 'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang / zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan bcings pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang /

dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad yongs su bzlas la/ badzra s+pha ra na kha~M zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo/ /me tog gi shing brgya dang / bzhi 'am ljon shing rnams dang me tog thams cad la rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / oM

badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngag go/ /dri thams cad dang / ngad zhim pa rnams dang / dri ma med pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badzra gan d+he hU~M/ zhes pa 'di dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas

pa yis so/ /ga bur dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan la sogs pa legs par bsres la/ de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badzra d+hU pe hU~M/ zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas spos phor 'bum dang / stong phrag

bcu dang stong dang brgya 'am/ ji ltar rnyed pa la'o/ /sgron ma 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i kong bu stong dang / bcu 'am bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje

me dang / oM badzra A lo ke hU~M zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la/ oM s+pha ra Na kha~M zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o/ /gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/

bcu'i grangs sam/ bkra shis can dang por bya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas te/ a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+harmA NA~M/ A d+ya nuta pan na twA ta zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo

bcu dang / brgya dang / stong dang / stong phrag bcu dang / rol mo 'bum dang gang yang rung ba la yi ge hU~M dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur dag gi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ pi bang

dang / gling bu dang / rnga mu ra dza dang / rnga mu kun+da dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga b+hi ri dang / rnga pa Ta hA dang / rnga kun dzA dang / rnga ti mi la yi stang stabs so/ /rol mo dang / zlos gar dang / gar dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams

kyang yi ge oM gyis mngon par bsngags te'o/ /de bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang / zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa dang / rta dang

glang po che dang / ba lang dang / shing rta rnams 'bul te/ brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo / /rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang / bcas pa rnams kyang badzra s+pha ra Na kha~M Na zhes pa 'dis so/ /oM badzra sa twa su sa~M gra hA ta dang / badzra

rata na ma nut+ta ra~M/ badzra d+harma gA ya naiH/ badzra karma ka rod b+ha ba zhes brjod cing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad po rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor

thams cad mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang ba khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no/ /slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang

legs par mchod la/ khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te/ sgrub

pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ /'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas/ /chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas/ /sran chan bcas shing snum khur la/ /sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni/ /yang a kA ro mu kha~M

zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dang po re
zhig maN Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas spyan drang ngo / /de nas dam tshig bstan no/ /de nas mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ gtor ma dbul lo/ /de nas gshegs su

gsol lo/ /de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing / lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la/ g.yas pa dku'i phyogs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub

mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag

rgya'o/ /de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badzra s+ya di shi di shi badzra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la

mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs

te/ gcig tu sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ag na ye hi e h+ye hi ka pi la dz+wA la dz+wA la da ha da ha shi khi to li bi ru pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par

byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing bsgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gshibs te bsgreng ba snying gar bzung ba

ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ya mA ya swA hA/ bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcas pa

mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing dri'i rnam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas gzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur la

sogs su gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu

lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang

ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i

sngags ni tri tri phu Ta tri tri shi khi to li bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo / /

lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag

rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM swA sa khA khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs

te brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa

ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag

pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te mthe bo zung dag gzhan la brten cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis

rdo rje'i rnam par gzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang

ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni dzu~M dzu~M shi pa swA hA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te

mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs

su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyi sngags ni oM a+'u d+ha~M brah+ma Ne swA hA/ sUr+ya gra hA a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM tsan dra na k+Sha dra a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis

gcig tu sbyar ba te sor mo'i rtse mo rnams bar mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha mo spyan drang ba'i

phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags rnams ni a d+ho pr-i thi byai swA hA/ a su

re b+h+yaHswA hA/ nA ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig /las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsal
cig ces brjod la/ thams cad gshegs su gsol lo/ /yang na dpung bzangs kyi ched du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang
'dab bzang lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang / /gang su sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la/ /bdag gi pus mo sa stengs 'dir btsugs
nas/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri

dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu bsteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil

ma can dang khron par gnas/ /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang par yang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang / /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor

khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar

gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams/ /dgyes shing mgu bas phreng ba byug pa dri/ /bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis/ /gus 'bul snoms mdzod gsol

mdzod 'thung mdzod cig /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par bya/ /dbang po rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ /

gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang / /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams

kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams/ /dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas/ /rang gi skye bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams/ /so sor so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas/ /

rang rang phyogs su legs par byon nas ni/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang / /zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang / /

gsol mdzod snoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de la 'di ni phyi dang nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te/ a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+harmA NA~M A d+ya nuta pan+na twAta

zhes pa'o/ /de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyogs te gnas pa la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod

cing me tog dmar pos nges par bkod la sbyin sreg gi tshogs dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sngags kyis ba'i mar gyis sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags nas rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i

mthar thug par kyang sreg blugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo / /de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil

'khor gyi rang gi gnas su dgod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams

ni gzhug par bgyi/ /'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi

dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi 'da' ba dang /

sngags spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can

kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par

'gyur gyi/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs

shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dam pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba

dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las zlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul

khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / sa rnams la 'bad pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang

mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba yang ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o/ /

de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la slab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge slong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su gzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la

phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /

skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol zhes pa'o/ /de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i
gdong g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go/ /yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang / rjes su yi

rang dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba/ /slob dpon

dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo 'byung ba yi/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o/ /gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa/ /slob dpon chen

po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po

bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad 'byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba

gdab par bya ste/ che ge mo zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /gsang ba yis ni 'khor lo 'dir/ /'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sangs

rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo gros chen po khyod kyis bzung / /byang chub

sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs ni bsdus

pa ni/ /nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab sbyin bya/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /

dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la/ /sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bzhin/ /yang dag nyid du ngas gzung gyis/ /de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang / /'di dag

phas pham par ni bshad/ /mi spang dor bar yang mi bya/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do/ /nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni brjod par bya/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /ltung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur/ /khyod

kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni btung ba rnam par spang / /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs

pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus pas

ni rjes su bskyang / /theg pa dman la dga' mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang / /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyed kyis brnyas pa mi bya zhing / /

phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom pa yang mi bya/ /'di dag dam tshig zhes bshad do/ /de dag ni/ blo gros khyed kyis bsrung bar bya/ /des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya/ /slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson/ /gtso

bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /zhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /gang zhig

sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam sbyin par bya zhing deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba yo ga tsi ta~M uta pA da yA mi zhes pa 'dis/

byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /de yi snying gar snying pos ni/ /rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya/ /su ra ta sa ma ya ta~M hoHbadzra sid+d+hi ya thA su kha~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rdo rje hU~M

mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la/ oM grI

h+Na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M zhes pa 'dis khro bo ti r-in+ti r-I rang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go/ rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas la/ /mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis/ /yid kyi khro bas dga' bya bas/ /khro bo ti r-in+ti r-I dran/

de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ badzra sa ma ya~M pra ti sh+yA mi zhes pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhug go /

nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing / /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo/ /yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyis des

nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma

mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /khyod dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti r-in+ti r-I kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad

ces smras te/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ /gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po lan cig bzlas pa'i chu

rdo rje slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/ /de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /badzra

ud ka ThaHzhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /

khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re zhes pa'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying kar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang / mdzod

spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ hU~M trA~M hrIHaHzhes pa 'di dag gi go rim bzhin du'o/ /sgo dbye ba'i phyag

rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying gar phye la rang gi snying gar yi ge ya~M las yi ge phyung la slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo/ /'di skad ces brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab tu gsol zhes smros cig /de nas myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti r-in+ti r-i bcings la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ 'di de dam tshig rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' zhes byar grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /khyod la de nyid 'bab gyur cig /badzra a be sha AHzhes pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug bcu dang / bdun bcu dang / brgyad bcu dang /

dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing 'di dag brjod de/ oM sum b+ha ni su~M b+ha hU~M/ grih+Na grih+Na hU~M/ grih+NA pa ya

grih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga ban badzra bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ aHaHaHaHaH/ bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug bcu dang / bdun bcu dang / brgyad bcu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar

brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje hU~M gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo/ /slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas

rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan la steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hU~M gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi

tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / hU~M gi rnam pas brdeg bzhin pa dang / de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis hU~M trA~M hrIHaHzhes

bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste/ hU~M badzra A be sha ya aHzhes rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i

tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du dral bar bya'o/ /yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyi me/ /rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dbul ba yis/ /de yi sdig pa thams cad ni/ /

til gyi sbyin sreg des nges bsreg /oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ yi ge hU~M dbus su bsam te/ mdzub mo

dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus kyi sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la de nas yang rdo rje babs pa

de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bya ste/ nges par 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de lta bus kyang gang la bab par ma gyur pa de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o/ /babs na skad cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs par rdzogs par

'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang oM badzra sa twa su sa~M gra hA ta zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu brjod la/ khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o/ /de phebs na rdo rje sems dpa'

khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de yi tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de lta

bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la bru hi badzra zhes pa brjod do/ /de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ /de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te/ pra tIts+tsha hoHzhes bya'o/ /de nas

gang du babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo/ /de nas oM pra ti gr-ih+Na twa~M i ma~M sa twa ma hA ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor bcing ngo / /de nas/ oM de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang / /khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ /rdo rje'i mig ni

bla na med/ /thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur/ /he badzra pA sh+ya zhes pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan no/ /

de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas slob ma snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du 'am/ phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par phyogs pa legs par bris la slob
ma dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskur ro/ /dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ mchod yon

dbul/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrag pa dang / de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad rnams kyis mngon par dga' bas dang po re shig chu'i dbang

bskur ba dang / cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang bskur la yang me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod do/ /

slob ma rnams kyis rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab tu btud la yon gyi mchog phul la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang gzung bar bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ni dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad

kyi phyag rgyas de kho na bzhin du ji ltar nges par bstan pa'i gnas su bzhag la de tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i lus la dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad la sogs pa bkod de slar yang / oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+wA~M a d+hi Shiny+tsA mi dr-i D+ho

me b+ha ba dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHhU~M phaT zhes pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ de nas oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs

la chu'i dbang bskur ba byin no/ /'di yang brjod de 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /dkyil 'khor

can min na mi smra/ /skye bo 'dus pa gnas pa ni/ /dgod dang ma dad pa la min/ /de nas cho ga thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas

gzeng bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ba thams cad lung bstan no/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'byung ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o/ /'di

yi las kyi dngos grub ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang / /tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni/ /ma lus nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchog gi sa rnams bgegs med 'grub/ /dngos grub phran tshegs slar ci zhig /sangs

rgyas nyid kyang sems can nyid/ /rdo rje sems nyid rnyed mi dka'/ /gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang / /gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang / /'chi bdag dang ni bdud sde rnams/ /

'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos rno/ /dngos grub las 'joms de dag ni/ /bdag nyid chen po de la ni/ /mi 'byung skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis/ /nges par dngos grub myur rab 'byung / /lha rnams kyang ni

cher mnyes shing / /skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur/ /yams dang nyer 'tshe skyon la sogs/ /ches lci nges par ring du 'gyur/ /de yi yul du nad dang gdon/ /rims la sogs pa mi 'byung zhing / /mu ge ca co che rnams dang / /pha rol

dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur/ /lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis/ /bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rgyu skar bcas/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul

chen po rnams kyis skyong / /de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas/ /yang dang yang du phyag btsal nas/ /rin chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te/ /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dga' ba'i

bsam pas yang dag bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje

yan lag rdo rje mchog /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon cha che/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ /rdo rje rnon po rnon po che/ /

che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /rdo rje pad ma byang chub che/ /byang chub sangs rgyas rang 'byung ba/ /rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen che/ /rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje pad ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje khro bo gtum po che/ /

rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed/ /rdo rje ro langs ro langs che/ /rdo rje srin po za ba po/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog /

'jigs rung skrag byed ma rungs pa/ /drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid

gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od mthug pa ni mthug pa che/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /

rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /ha la ha la nag po che/ /sgra chen rnam par sgeg pa po/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms

pa po/ /dus kyi g.yo ba gcod pa'i mchog /zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma/ /rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum/ /gtum pa'i rab snang 'joms pa po/ /nyi ma stong gi 'od zer zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo

du ma'i 'od 'phro ba/ /phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong / /'khyil zhing sku yang 'khyil pa lags/ /thugs chos bdag nyid sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /ma rig

'joms pa tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can/ /mdung can rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog byed/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing

dul la dag pa cha/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje legs skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun du bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po/ /

khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa po/ /thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang / /gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang / /rtag tu don ni 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang bde ba thob

pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag

pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po re ben dra de ba'i zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te chag lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong chos

rje dpal gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa// spre lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu btsugs nas smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag

bcwa lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i gdings su tshar bar bgyis so/ /dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas/ /chos rgyal sku drin paN chen sgra bsgyur mchog /
skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad/ /'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang / /rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi/ /man ngag la brten rgya gar
bal po na/ /yongs grags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur/ /sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du/ /gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ /bzod mdzad de dges
'gro ba kun/ /'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig /bkra shis bar gyir cig /dge'o/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum
la bstun pa'i mtshal pa bka' 'gyur las zhus pa dag par byas//
ngan bsod sbyong rgyur spar 'di gtso byas pa'i/ /bka' 'gyur sbar 'di zhus dag legs byed ba/ /shAkya'i dge slong rin chen rnam rgyal ste/ dge bas 'gro kun ngan bsong gnas spang shog /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ su pra tiSh+Tha tan tra sang gra ha/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus

gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas brdungs pa dang / bris pa dang / 'bur du byas pa la sogs
pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing / /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/ /las rnams kun la mkhas pas so/ /sku gzugs
mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ /zhi ba la sogs ro yis ldan/ /tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang / /de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ /yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang / /khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su/ /
sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni/ /cho ga dag dang ldan byas la/ /cho ga dman pas mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis/ /'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che/ /
de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya/ /cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis/ /brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pa/ /des byas bsod nams che ba yin/ /mthong dang mi mthong rnams
su skye/ /sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /de la byin rlabs 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/ /byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na/ /de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing / /ji srid
mchod pa der mi 'os/ /dper na skyes bu la la zhig /rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/ /'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed/ /de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de/ /rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ /
gang zhig mchod cing phyag byed pa/ /dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas/ /sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs/ /de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas/ /chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang / /de yi
las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /skye ba ru ni mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa la ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis gnas pa
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu bzhugs/ /rab tu gnas pa gang na'ang med/ /kun du mkha' ltar gnas pa la/ /cig shos kyis ni rab tu brtags/ /'jig

rten kun rdzob la brten nas/ /rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtag /dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na/ /gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab/ /gzod ma nas ni skye med la/ /ci 'dra ji ltar rab tu gnas/ /dang po'i las can
sems can rnams/ /rtogs pa'i rgyu ru mdzad par zad/ /dang po re shigs yongs su sbyangs par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang / ba dan bsgreng ba rnams su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs pas gsol ba
btab pa'i bla ma spos dang me tog la sogs pa ldan pas tshes dang rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam par gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la

sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel pa yin la/ de dang rab tu 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sa yongs su gzung zhing thig gdab pa dang / rdul tshon gyi las dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la
rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i gter du nor bu 'am/ sor gdub bcug la/ de nas lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma dang por bcug la/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
la sogs pa'i skur bltas la/ lha la mngon par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing / ji ltar 'byor pa'i me tog gi thal mo dang dri chu gtsang mas cho ga bzhin du brtags la/ ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas/
zhal bsil me tog spos sogs ldan/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sngags 'di yis/ /lan gsum bar du brjod par bya'o/ /
oM sa ma ya sta~M sa ma ya sta~M a ha~M/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig /
'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /che ge mo yi don slad du/ /bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni/ /ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs 'di bzhes
shig /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /rjes su brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ /kun gyis 'di la byin brlab cing / /de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ /sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la/ /
de nas rtag par mnyam par brtsam/ /slob ma bsnyung bar gnas pa yis/ /de ltar thams cad spyad byas la/ /sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs/ /bla ma yis ni gang bsgo ba/ /mang tshogs pa
kun bsgrub par bya/ /mchod sbyin 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab/ /gdan la sdom byas mchod yon dang / /mchod pa gtor ma spos me tog /de bzhin du ni mar

me dag /sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar bya/ /sku gzugs mdun du phyag byas la/ /na bza' ser pos g.yog bya zhing / /de nas sngags pas 'dug byas pa/ /de dag bsgrub phyir de la ni/ /de la lan cig gtor bya ba/ /

de dang de la sngags 'dis ni/ /me dang de nas chu las gtor/ oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya bas so/ /de nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste/ /de nas
gnas gsum rnams su bstim/ /oM hU~M AH'i yi ge gsum/ /oM ni spyi bor bstim bya zhing / /snying gar hU~M gi yi ger 'gyur/ /ngag gi phyogs su AHyig go/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya/ /yang na/

gang gi sa bon gang yin pa/ /de yi thugs kar de dgod do/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing / /ci rigs par ni snyan gsan dbab/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs ma 'am/ /rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni/ /sa
'am dung chos de bzhin te/ /yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams/ /mchod yon snod du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bum pa gser las so/ /zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni/ /mchod yon las la rab tu shis/ /gal te

nus pas ma rnyed na/ /ji ltar rnyed pa kun du bya/ /de nas dri yi til mar sogs/ /dur ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang / /bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgra/ /na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod/ /til mar la sogs sngags kyis

ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ bum pa lnga 'am yang na brgyad/ /tsan dan la sogs rnams kyis byug /sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang / /'khor lor byas la mngon par bsngags/ /bu mos bkal

ba'i srad bu 'am/ /yang na ras bal skud pa'ang rung / /tshon chen pos ni bsgyur byas la/ /de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya/ /sman lnga rin chen lnga dang ni/ /me tog 'bras bur ldan pa de/ /me tog yungs kar dang ldan zhing / /
bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes bya dang / /gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi rdzi dang / /bkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni/ /khrus kyi ched tu mngon par bsngags/ /'jam pa'i til

mar dag dang ni/ /u dum ba ra'i lcug ma bzang / /'khar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu/ /bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya/ /dri lnga yis ni de dag byug /sa bon gyis ni de dag byug /slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yis/ /

sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya/ /bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i/ /blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur/ /sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs

kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shek+ta sa ma ya shri ye hU~M/ lugs ma rnams ni yongs su dkru/ /
ri mo rnams ni me long la'o/ /dag byed lngas ni sngon du bya/ /ras sam lag pa dag gis ni/ /blo dang ldan pas sku lus la/ /gur kum mar dang bcas pas bsku/ /gos zung dag kyang sku la gsol/ /blo dang

ldan pas sngags 'di yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /oM badzra d+hi ba sa so swA hA/ oM badzra gan d+he swA hA/ oM badzra A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul/ /phyag
rgya sngags kyis rab bskul la/ /ji ltar 'dod par mngon dbang bskul/ /oM hU~M a~M dzrI~M kha~M/ de ltar cod pan bcing byas la/ /gdan la legs par bzhugs gsol te/ /brtag pa las gsungs tshul gyis so/ /

mdun phyogs su ni ma bub cing / /yo ba min zhing drang ba yis/ /de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod/ /de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar me na bza' sogs 'byor dri/ /de kun

sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra pu Sh+pe AHhU~M zhes bya ba 'di la sogs pas so/ /mchog ni me tog 'di de ni/ /chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes/ /mchog tu dad pas khyed la
'bul/ /ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /mchog tu bdug pa 'di de ni/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /lhan
cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog /mar dang til gyi mar me
'di/ /yang dag ye shes spel bya'i phyir/ /dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ /bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs/ /kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan/ /thams cad ldan pa'i lha yi bshos/ /bdag gis
dbul gyis so sor bzhes/ /de la sogs pa gang yang rung / /cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la/ /de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis/ /rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya/ /der ni gser

gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya/ /zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi prI Na ne swA hA/ de ltar bzlas nas de nas yang / /slob ma rab

tu bcug byas la/ /khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rab gnas par/ /de dag don ni ngas byas te/ /de rnams don ni grub zin gyis/ /ci bde bar ni mchod

par byos/ /de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bar/ /khyod la byas kyis sreg blugs ni/ /stong ngam yang na de yi phyed/ /sngar gsungs bar mas 'bru rnams kyis/ /'o ma can gyi bud shing la/ /sreg khung gru bzhir

sregs blugs bya/ /de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis/ /lhag ma tsA rur phul byas la/ /bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni/ /zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ A gats+tsha ha ri ping ga le te dza te dza

ha lo hi ta k+Sha de hi dA pa ya i dan tsa l+ye kA r+yan ku ru swA hA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis/ /khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya/ /sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i/ /tshad tsam du ni

rab tu brtag /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya/ /oM in drA ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra
byas la yang dag par mchod do/ /gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba/ /de dag bzod pa
mdzad par rigs/ /kun du zhi dang rgyas pa ru/ /yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ lha rnams
kun gyis sku gzugs la/ /bskal pa brgya ru bsrung gnas mdzod/ /dgyes shing yid bzang gyur nas su/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi/ /bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas/ /rang gnas bde bar gshegs su

gsol/ /dpyid zla ra ba 'am dpyid zla 'bring / /dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs la/ /dbyar ra de bzhin dbyar 'bring po/ /nyi ma byang du bltas pa yi/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni gnyis pa'o/ /rim bzhin du bzhin gsum pa

'am/ /gang tshe gza' dang rjes mthun na/ /nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya/ /mi rnams sngon du 'phel bar byed/ /bcwa lnga de bzhin brgyad dang ldan/ /bcu gsum pa'ang de bzhin no/ /gnam stong dang ni de

bzhin du/ /bcu bzhi pa la bya ba min/ /thams cad du ni chu smad dang / /snar ma gro bzhin de bzhin te/ /lag pa snums dang snron dang ni/ /rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no/ /khrums smad kyang ni de bzhin te/ /rgyu skar 'di rnams
thams cad du/ /skye dgu 'phel zhing de yis ni/ /rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed/ /skar ma dbo la rab gnas bya/ /des ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa gang ci'ang rung / /dngos grub me
bzhis ster bar 'gyur/ /lus las shes pa yang dag pa/ /snums sam yang na gro zhin gyis/ /lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni/ /gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed/ /mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston/ /chu stod kyis

ni bu dag gson/ /rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis/ /rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur/ /snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed/ /lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur/ /phur bu lag dang pa ba sangs/ /zla ba
gza' sogs shes bya ste/ /'di rnams gza' ldan las byas na/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge/ /gsum pa drug pa bdun pa dang / /bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba/ /gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad/ /bcu dang bcu

gcig rnams la lag /gnyis dang de bzhin bdun pa dgu/ /re bzhin phur bu bcu gcig la/ /dus sbyor zhi ba la brten nas/ /de la lhag par gnas par bya/ /drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis/ /pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin/ /

de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi/ /stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang / /zhing rnams dge ba gang yin pa/ /dang po lta ba gsum de yin/ /nor 'joms rnams ni spang bar bya/ /

rjes su mthun par byed pa pos/ /skad cig de la yongs grub cing / /rab tu gnas pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /gza' dang rgyu skar der med de/ /
bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med/ /gza' rnams thams cad rjes mthun zhing / /bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid/ /de ru grub par kun gnas shing / /gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyi/ /
dngos grub dag ni ster bar byed/ /yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa/ /skye dang skye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni/ /phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod/ /gang dag de la grogs
byed pa/ /gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya/ /de nas de dag thams cad la/ /dga' bas 'di dag brjod par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med/ /
de phyir bdag la khyed bzod mdzod/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbra bza' bca' dag /gzugs brnyan dag la sbyin par bya/ /bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni/ /zo zhig sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur zhes bya bas so/ /

glang po rta glang shing rta nor/ /yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya/ /de nas de la nan tan gyis/ /longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya/ /gal te lhan cig dgyes 'dod na/ /bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing / /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /bla ma yang

dag mnyes par bya/ /de nas yang dag brtul zhugs can/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma/ /mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la/ /ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang dbul/ /dung dang rol mo'i sgra la sogs/ /bzang po'i glu dang gar rnams

kyis/ /gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis/ /rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul/ /de ltar thams cad byas zin nas/ /gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la/ /phul lam 'bul bar byed pa rnams/ /slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi/ /bzo bo

la ni mi sbyin zhing / /dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te/ /nor rnams thams cad de la dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byug bya ste/ /ba yi lci bas byug bya zhing / /rdul tshon chu bor dor bar bya/ /dri yis yang dag
legs par byug /rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na badzra dang / lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur ba'o/ /zhus so//

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI pa ra mA di nA ma ma hA yA na kal pa rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig dang mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang
ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can

chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba

thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa/ dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad bzhugs shing / bsngags pa/ bstod pa/ nor bu chen po dang / rin po ches spras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu brtags pa/ dar gyi ba dan dang me tog gi phreng ba dang rnga ma dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba

rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs
pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa
dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar

dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
'di yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de n-i 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de n-i 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /thams

cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de n-i 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de n-i 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i

gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam

par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de

ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de ci'-i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag

pa'o/ /badzra hU~M/ /lag na rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas bsgrub pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib pa

thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa yang

byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'dzin pa 'am nyin re bzhin klog pa dang / kha thon du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin

thob pas chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos bcu drug gis de bzhin

gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje dbyings
mtha' dag gis sems pa'i mchog /khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa/ don

thams cad grub pa/ lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin

rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di
smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad nas rjes su mnyes pa brtan
pos mnyes par byas te bkug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i bsnyems po'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs so/ /de nas

phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyis byin
gyis brlabs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /de nyid dang po dam tshig che/ /rdo rje byin brlabs

zhes bya'o/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing bsgo bzhi dang / /khyams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang / /sgo
khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i/ /rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes/ /rtse mo sna tshogs ba dan ni/ /dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod/ /me tog chun 'phyang me long
spras/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru/ /rdo rje thig gis thig btab la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs
par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni bzhag bya ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing / /sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad pad+ma
ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni/ /lugs ma 'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o/ /rang gi snying po kun bzlas te/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /snying po nyid
kyis yang dag dgod/ /rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus/ /bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya/ /tshogs rnams kun du ston pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'
ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar brtson/ /dmar skya dag ni nges par dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su/ /rdo rje kI li kI la ni/ /yan lag kun gyis
yongs 'khyud pa/ /rdo rje'i gzugs can nyi ma'i 'od/ /rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni/ /chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs/ /sngo skya'i mdog can ci rigs par/ /blo dang ldan pas bzhag par bya/ /g.yon
du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni/ /bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa/ /btso ma'i gser dang 'dra bar dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /me tog la sogs
kyis mtshan cing / thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i/ /mchod pa chen po bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams dgod par bya/ /sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du/ /
gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brgyad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor/ /phyi yi dkyil
'khor gnas rnams su/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug bri bya ste/ /mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /'dod pa'i tshangs pa zhi byed mchog /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa

'byung ste/ de la dang po nyid du ci skad bshad pa'i cho ga 'dir zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni/ rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams

cad rig pa dang / las thams cad bsgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i byin kyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad shes pa dang ldan

pa dang / mchod pa thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'-i dbang du 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'-i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / byin gyis brlab par rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ma bslabs par yang thams cad shes par

'gyur ro/ /mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcings la dbang du byas te/ rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas

'jug cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ dang po'i rdo rje'i blta bas bltas te snying po lan gcig brjod nas dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i

phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan gcig byas la phyag byas nas gos dmar po gyon la/ me tog gi phreng ba thogs te gdong dris byugs pa dang rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing skor bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid

'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas kyang yang rnam par sgeg pa dang skor bas gdud cing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub

par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid la dgyes pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro/ /'od zer gyi

rang bzhin gyi zhal lam/ sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol ba 'am dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /

de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi gsod par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /

ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bsgrub par mdzad do/ /de nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur zhing / dpa' bo'i rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying

po bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas/ rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na bdag nyid kyis zla

ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs

pa yang byas nas yang ci ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba bsgrub pa lan gcig bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga'

ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang / bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ /zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du 'grub

par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob ma la cho ga rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te/ phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs

pa'i dam tshig la mos pa de rnams la yang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha gzhan dag la dad pa

rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ci ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang / ro bcud dang gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la ci

ltar shes pa'i gar dang glu dang dgod pa dang bu dang bu mo dang mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste sems can gyi khams ma lus

shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di dang / 'dod pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje sbyor bas rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen

po'o/ /de nas cho ga 'byung ste/ zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la ci ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang po byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod cing ci srid

zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ci lta ba bzhin du bgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ras ris 'dri 'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod

na/ dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la de'i 'og tu ni c-i bder bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang po brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du bri zhing / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis

sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas nas zla ba nya'i mtshan mo thog thag tu ci lta ba bzhin du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag

rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol cing / sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams

stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang thams

cad bri bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas pa bris la/ de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya

chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig pu bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas klags pa tsam gyis 'grub

pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so/ /rdo rje thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba

la ni rang gi snying po bzlas pas so/ /lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni yungs kar la lan cig bzlas pas so/ /gzhan bsrung ba la

ni rdo rje skor bas so/ /thams cad bsrung ba la ni yid kyis lan cig go/ mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni blta ba 'am nyungs kar la sogs pas so/ /sems can thams cad rengs par
bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so/ /sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje btsir bas so/ /sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsums nas bzlas pas so/ /

thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje dral bas so/ /sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so/ /sems can thams cad

za ba la ni ldang zhing myur bar zlos pas so/ /sems can thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas so/ /nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyis bzlas pas so/ /nor dang 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni

rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi bang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad 'bigs pa dang rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i

phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad phyags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so/ /gdug pa'i 'ching ba bstan par bya ba la ni snying brtan por nges par 'tshir bas so/ /ma rungs pa rab tu

bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas so/ /rgyan thams cad dbrog pa ni 'bar ba'i blta bas dbrog pas so/ /thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag pas so/ /mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha

shar du bltas te skor bas so/ /lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas pas so/ /gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so/ /sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la

ni rdo rje pi bang gis so/ /dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so/ /zas dang skom thams cad dang bcud thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje spo bar bya'o/ /dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i

thal mo dang se gol dang glu'i bzlas pas so/ /thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas pas so/ /thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas so/ /thams cad smrar

gzhug pa la ni rdo rje chu yis so/ /thams cad babs nas lan sten pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas so/ /gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgyas so/ /gdon thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni
tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas pas so/ /rims nad thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gdon gyis so/ /rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i blta bas bsal bas so/ /

dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug gi phyag rgyas so/ /dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun pos so/ /dug thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so/ /bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa
thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /phyag rgya thams cad gzhig

pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wA~M kha'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ /ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang

sngags dang / rig pa dang / gsang ba'i gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo yi ge phaT kyis so/ /ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug mar bya ba la ni ma mo'i gnas su 'khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /bdud thams cad kyi

stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo / /'thab pa thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas
so/ /thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o/ /thams cad dgrol ba la ni yi ge mu yis so/ /ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so/ /lcags sgrog

thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so/ /me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel kyis so/ /chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so/ /nam mkha' las zas dang skom dang gos dang rgyan

thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la blta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /nam mkha' las sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nam

mkhar lta zhing bzlas pas so/ /nam mkha' las yi ges 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba'i bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so/ /pra sen thams cad las 'das pa

dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra sen thams cad dbab pas so/ /de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so/ /rna bas thos par

bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so/ /snas mnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so/ /lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas so/ /lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so/ /yid kyis

shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so/ /rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la 'bum bzlas pas so/ /thams

cad g.yog par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so/ /thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi rdo rjes so/ /rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so/ /cho 'phrul

thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so/ /rang gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa

la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje skor bas so/ /klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gnod sbyin thams cad mngag

gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje'i bka' bsgo bas so/ /'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas 'khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgyas so/ /glog

'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so/ /char dbab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o/ /char gcad pa la ni dr-i ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin blug bya'o/ /sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug

pas bdug par bya'o/ /sprin bshig pa la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i spyan gyis so/ /chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so/ /gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod

du chu blug par bya'o/ /gter thams cad brko ba la ni rdo rje 'jor gyis so/ /gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni rdo rje nor gyis so/ /rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /sa'i bdag por bya

ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so/ /dam

tshig thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so/ /ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i

phyag rgyas so/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so/ /rdo rje thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad bsgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i

dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam

par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir

rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi

phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /

lag na rdo rje gang la la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las
yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos

thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /a/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje
sems dpa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor
'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'-i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs pad ma rab tu gnas pa
de'i 'khor lo'-i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i phyogs thams cad du sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa brgyad gzhag gam bri bar bya'o/ /de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gzhug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs

bzhi dang mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ci lta ba bzhin bzhag nas/ bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su dgod par bya zhing / byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams te

ne'u bsing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang / ro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang gser dang rin po che dang / gos la sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'i snod dang / 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas
kyi sku gzugs dgod do/ /de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug go/ zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /

bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis/ /ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis zhes bya'o/ /de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ci lta bas skal ba ci lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/ /dam tshig

chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bsgrub pa ni/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dzum pa dang bcas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o/ /gzhan
thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog bsgrub pa dang / dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa'

bo gcig pu bris te/ 'di'-i mdun du rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub
thams cad grub pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs pas kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ci snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so/ /dkon mchog gsum

mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa la bzlas so/ /sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so/ /chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'-i tshig bzhi po gdon pas
