thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so/ /de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i

tshe ster ba'o/ /'d-i'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya/ /rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la kun du bskor nas snying gar

dgrol bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor dang phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o/ /snying ga dang yid kyis rgyab dang phrag pa dang / spyi bo dang dpral bar gzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha bya ste/ mdud pa byas

nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o/ /snying ga dang dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor gzhag par bya'o/ /dbus ma'i dar mchog go/ /byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbug

pa dang 'jig pa'i gdong gis lta ba'o/ /'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o/ /lta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /dbab pas myur du 'grol

bar bya'o/ /yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste/ dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying kar bstod pa dang

skyed pa dang 'ching ba dang gar byed du bcug pa dang mgrin pa gsal ba dang rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang kha dbub pa dang mgrin pa gsal ba dang bcings pa myur du dkrol ba dang bsrung ba dang byab pa'i las so/ /snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o/ /

nyin re zhing snga rol du lan cig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang snying kar gzhag pa dang phyag rgya la lta ba ste/ nyin re snga rol tu lan cig dbang po thams cad la kun du bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus ma

rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang dbab pa sbyin pa dang 'bar ba'i me stag byed pa dang nye bar len pa dang rlung

gi tshul dang nam mkhar bsgom pa las du ma'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang sen mo brud pa dang mig 'degs pa dang btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying

gar bteg pa dang ltung ba dang slong bar byed pa dang phan tshun rdeg pa dang rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' stong pa dang lcags gnyis kyis dgug pa dang g.yon pa la g.yas pa

bcug pa dang rtse mo bskyod pa dang gdu bur bcing ba dang myur du dgrol ba dang sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang ltung bar byed pa dang 'og nas bteg pa dang g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar

bar byed pa dang 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang tshur 'dren pa dang phar gtang ba dang g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba byed pa'i las

dang snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang snying ka las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so/ /

bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun/ /sems can

thams cad myur grub phyir/ /don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag du ma zhugs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan/ /de dag kyang ni sgrub 'gyur te/ /bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir/ /gang zhig

le lo nyid kyis sam/ /brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshang ba/ /dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang / /slob dpon nyid byin ma brlabs dang / /de dag grub mchog rdo rje che/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /don yod mchog

dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug /dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /bde ba che las yang dag 'byung / /

dag cing shin tu grub pa dang / /'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo / /de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni/ /skal ba ci bzhin snying pos grub/ /rang gi bdag nyid nges

sbyang bya/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs
pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba

dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad kyi

rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no/ /rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba

mchog /rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi/ /chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang / /rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni/ /yongs su mthar thug nus pa min/ /

e ma'o mngon zhan sems can dang / /le lo can dang las kun ldan/ /thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni mthar

thug pa/ /rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa'

byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /thams cad dgongs grub don du ni/ /yongs su mthar
thug byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang / /gang gis khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas/ /bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i/ /dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la

bstan/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir/ /rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te/ /rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med/ /dngos grub 'phel med min pa byin gyis

brlabs/ /bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa/ /myur du dngos grub mchog phyin bdag brtan 'gyur/ /brtan zhing rab bgyis brtan

pas rjes su chags/ /bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas/ /nga yi dang po'i snying po gang sgrub pa/ /de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ster/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa'i rgyud phyi ma yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs gar bstod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing

mchog tu grub pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlab pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa rnams kyang mchog dam pa

grub par byed pa dang mchog tu gsang ba dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'/ /nam mkha' kun

la rab tu gnas/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rab tu gsal/ /dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyan/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /

grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog /dar phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa/ /dra ba me long tog me tog /me tog

chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa

kun gyi gnas/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chen/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog bya ba'i/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni/ /bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /

kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya/ /brtan par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ /nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur/ /sems dpar

byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sangs rgyas de nyid do/ /rdo rje drag po

mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang ste/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs bzang bshad/ /de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ /'dod
dang 'grol ba de nyid de/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid/ /bstan pa sra ba nor chen po/ /rgyu ba sems kyis 'dus byas pa/ /
thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol/ /sems dpa'i dkril dkrung bcas nas ni/ /pad ma'i steng du bzhugs pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs

bcas sna tshogs pa/ /rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor/ /bde ba chen po grub don du/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /ma lus 'dul bya'i don du ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir/ /dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa/ /rgyal

bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po/ /bsod nams kun

gyis cher mthong ba/ /ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /snying po chen po dam yin te/ /gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa 'am/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa'ang / /don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur/ /dngos grub

thams cad rnyed dka' yin/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan/ /dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster/ /rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed/ /thog mtha' med phyir dang por 'byung / /mchog dang po zhes bya

bar bshad/ /tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod dang / /chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar/ /rjes su chags par bgyi'o zhes/ /ci bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug /nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po/ /bskal pa dang por bcom ldan

gsungs/ /hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen gyis thog mar/ /yud kyi 'jig rten gsum

po 'byung / /ci ltar 'gro ba rab grub ces/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris/ /de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin rang 'gro ba ni/ /'byin dang rtsol dang ston pa po/ /byed pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol/ /chags

bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams/ /chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'di ni ci ltar grub par 'gyur/ /de yi tshig de gsan nas ni/ /rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems

de thog ma'i lha/ /khyod ni thabs chen nyid yin no/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /ci srid sems can

rnam rtog pa/ /de srid byang chub srid pa che/ /byang chub sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis/ /de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog /

ci bzhin cho gas bsgrubs pa nyid/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ /bde ba chen po grub phyir dang / /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gtso bos mgon la gsol ba btab/ /bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni/ /'dod

chags chen po bde ba chen/ /snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog /bde chen myur du grub byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bka'

stsal to/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa de/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog /gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad pa'o/ /thog mar dam tshig gsum thob pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas/ /'khor

lo kun gyi cho ga la/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyan 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dngos
grub cho ga thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /mchog gi dang po mtha' yas
mchog /bla na med cing mnyam med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas nas sbyang byas la/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /dngos grub byin brlabs

cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang / /me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis/ /ci snyed pa dang ci 'dod par/ /mchog dang por ni rtag par bya'o/ /mchog gi dang por mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing

bde med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog /thog ma med mchog rtag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas/ /lhag dang ma tshang med kun

gang / /mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' ni/ /'di ni dbu mar rnam brtags pas/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de yis dbus mar rnam brtag nyid/ /de yi dbus su pad ma'i gzugs/ /yu bar bcas pa rab tu bzhag /sna

tshogs pad mas yang dag khebs/ /thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin/ /de nas srad bu gnyis 'gyur du/ /byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste/ /nam mkha' kun gyi tshad yin phyir/ /gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas/ /tshad ni

tshad med pa nyid yin/ /mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin/ /khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag /gzugs rnams

lha mos mchod pa'o/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dam chos mchog ste kun du 'gro/ /rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /

ba dan rtser brtags dril sgra sgrogs/ /me long ye shes rtag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba me long me tog che/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen po

zhes bshad do/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /kun mchog de ni legs bris nas/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /phyogs kun mnyam
pa nyid du bsam/ /de ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin/ /'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster/ /byang sems theg pa

chen po yi/ /mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /der ni sna tshogs pad ma cher/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa

'am/ /byas pa 'am yang na bris pa ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang la sogs/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung dag

gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje snyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /su ra ta s+t+wam zhes brjod cing / /rang snying pos kyang bzhag par bya/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /tshon nam de bzhin phye ma yis/ /go rim dag ni ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje

lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje mchod stod la brtson bya/ /rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri/ /lha mo rdo rje rol mo ni/ /rdo rje can la rab 'khyud pa/ /rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /

rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnyems bris/ /de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dza badzra driSh+Ti sa ya ke phaT hU~M/ oM badzra kI li kI li hU~M/ ba~M` badzri ni sma ra raT/ ho badzra ka me shwa ri taM/ mtshams su rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /dus

kyi mchod pa yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma dang sprin/ /ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /dri ste spyi bor thal sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste/ /de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya/ /oM ma d+hu badzri g+hu~M g+hu~M/ oM badzra

me g+he gu lu gu lu/ oM oM sha rad badzrI/ oM oM/ /oM badzra she shi ri hU~M hU~M`/ sgeg mo bzhad ma glu chen ma/ /gar mdzad ma yi lha mo'i tshogs/ /rdo rje rol mo 'di dag ni/ /phyi rol gyi ni mtshams su bya/ /ha ra ti

badzra mag+ha bi la si ni tra ha/ he ra ti badzra nrir t+yai be ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin dril ma yi/ /badzra a~M gu sha dzaHbadzra pA she hU~M/ badzra

shri kha le ba~M/ badzra g+haN d+d+he hoHdam tshig 'di ni thams cad kyis/ /dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs/ /dngos grub kun la 'grub bar 'gyur/ /gsol ka ba dang g.yog mo yi/ /gtso

mo pho nya bran mo'o/ /de nas kun mchog la sogs pa/ /mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje

can gyi spyan sngar 'dug /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog /bdag po lan gcig yang dag dgug /hU~M ma hA su kha badzra sa twa/ ya hi shI g+h+ram/ ma hA su kha badzra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA lA ya/ pra bu d+ha su ra ta twa a

nu rag to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ b+ha ga bAn nA di na sa twa/ sarba sid d+hi me pra yats+tshe/ e she ta ma tri Sha A be sha ya sa ma yer bad d+ha/ ba shI ka ro me/ i mer mu trA pa daiHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoH'di
yis bcom ldan 'das par ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs/ /bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan/ /dbang du gyur nas rab tu thub/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon

rang lha ni/ /'od zer kun ni ston la sogs/ /mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni/ /rdo rje thal mo kha dbyes dbul/ /bum pa gang dang ci snyed pa'i/ /me tog la
sogs kyis kyang mchod/ /ba dan rtse mor dril brtags pa/ /mtshams kyi char ni bzhag par bya/ /bum pa spos chus gang ba la/ /rdo rjer bcas pas byin brlabs pa/ /lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas/ /de la bde

ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ hU~M ma hA su kha badzra a mo g+ha sa me yo da sad d+ha a b+hi Shinya tsa/ sarba su kha sau man s+yA n+yA da da ku ru ku ru/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la/ bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang

bskur bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba dang bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / /rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs

shing / /rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /rang nyid khrus byas dris legs byugs/ /ci snyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing / /me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo/ /rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / /

rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas/ /gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni/ /de kho na nyid lan cig brjod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /rdo rje

chen po nor che ba/ /ye shes chen po las chen po/ /de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod/ /de nas me tog sil ma ni/ /mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin/ /dang po sha ra la sogs pa bstod pa glu ru lan gcig blang / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan

brgya rtsa brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/ dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che/ /dga' ba chen po'i dga' chen po/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /sems dang
sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ /thams cad thams cad byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas
sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad yi ge hU~M/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal/ // // // /'dod chags chen po bde chen nyid/ /
'dod dang thar pa nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /brtan par rang byung gsal ba ste/ /rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa/ /rgyu ba

rab mchog thob mdzad pa/ /srid pa 'khor ba sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can/ /mda' ldan dang por thams cad gnas/ /snying po phyag rgya sbyor dam tshig /de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos dang las ni khams chen po/ /dam pa'i chos te las mchog bdag /byang chub sems ni rab sbyong mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo khro bo che/ /dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba po/ /'dul mdzad

chen po gdug pa'i mchog /drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa/ /thams cad dag pa pad ma che/ /shes rab thabs te tshul chen po/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che/ /nam
mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don/ /'byung po thams cad gnas chen po/ /'byor pa thams cad gnas 'byor ba/ /dpal dang gtso bo rgyal po ste/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal khyod la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pas khyed la bdag brten bgyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /nyin re nang par rjod byed dam/ /chos kyi

tshig gis lan cig brjod/ /dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod na/ /dang por nyin re dus gsum du/ /bstod na sdig pa las nges grol/ /zhing dag pa ni grub par byed/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal
thams cad sel/ /lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad bskal bzang byed/ /phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed/ /dngos grub don yod yon tan can/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
dam pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni/ /rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod/ /rang gis phyag rgyas lan cig ni/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub/ /de nas lha yi chu dang ni/ /de bzhin sku

mchog gis dbang bskur/ /rang nyid rdo rje phyag rgya la/ /snying po 'di ni blang bar bya/ /de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ hU~M ma hA su kha badzra sa twa a b+hi She ke na hrIHa b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/

sarba badzra ba a d+hi pa ti twAM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba mi d+ha nA ma ma ste b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ /ma hA badzra sa twa/ oM b+hur bu ba swa/ de nas rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /phyag na rdo rje ming 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen slob

dpon du/ /'di nyid du ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par/ /cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /legs par mchod la phyir byung bya/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag /rdo rje
kun gyi gsang rab 'dzin/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub che/ /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che/ /d+ha thams cad mkhyen pa'i
rdo rje che/ /las rnams thams cad dbus la brtag /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus/ /thams
cad rjes chags byed kun mchog /kun rig pa dang kun gyi gnas/ /'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor/ /phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che/ /lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun/ /bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu

byed/ /sems dpa' kun ni rtag tu mthong / /tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan/ /dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

sems dpas gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis brlab cing 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // // de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mchod yon snying gar bskor/ /bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni/ /mgo bos yang dag phyag bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad grub byed yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs

la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'gro ba kun la 'ang grub mdzad brjod/ /de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar/ /rdo rje
gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug / /de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas slob ma bcug nas ni/ /dga'

ba chen po 'di brjod bya/ /rab dgyes rab bde bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje sems bdag deng grub mdzod/ /de nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /spyi bo nas ni myur du 'dor/ /gang du me tog babs gyur te/ /lhag pa'i lhar ni rab grub 'gyur/ /

de nas lha yi chu yis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang rang dbang bskur/ /rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga/ /byin la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra/ badzra a b+hi She ka na s+t+wam/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ ma hA badzra d+hA ra/ he badzra nA ma sid d+ha nA maH/ gang la

rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kyai zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs nas/ ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am/ /gang 'dod rang grub pa de la/ /de

nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid/ /'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad/ /'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa rnams/ /thams cad rang gi go rims ni/ /rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub/ /'di la rab tu

'jug tsam gyis/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa/ /nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing / /bde ba chen po rab grub ster/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /mna' ni dam du bkag nas kyang / /de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /

rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab/ /de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos grub

rdo rje bdud rtsi chu/ /de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ /skye bo 'dug nang gnas pa 'ga'/ /dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab

tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po

bshad par brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni

byed pa yin/ /de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin

tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar bas/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de la rtog pa

thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /

gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rtag / /rgyun du sems can don byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad

bde skyid bsten par gyis/ /de ni 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas khyed kyis bcud dang / kha zas dang gnas pa dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod

pa rnams legs par bstabs pa bas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon me tog stsogs/ /ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing / /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yang dag

par ni mchod de byung / /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang / /glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

de bzhin bdag /yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// // de nas bsgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste/ /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /

dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o/ /'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /srid par gnas shing srid par sangs/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rtag tu sems can kun don byed/ /'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod

stsogs pas/ /dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur/ /'dul bya min pa bsod nams med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam pa kun du mthong stsogs kyis/ /sems can don byed

mi nus so/ /de bas rgyud chen las grub pa/ /sangs rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthong la sogs pa sems can don/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa byed pa yin/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med/ /
nam mkha' mtha' yas sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa 'am/ /bsod nams med pa 'am le lo can/ /de yang kun mchog grub pa yis/ /tshe 'di nyid la

grub par 'asgrub zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /lugs ma 'am ni brkos pa 'am/ /byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi/ /dang po'i sems dpa' brtags nas ni/ /mdun du de ni sgrub par bya/ /nyin re zhing ni dang po ru/ /de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /dang po'i

gsang mchog gis bkug ste/ /phyag rgya chen po rab byin brlab/ /rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po rang / /rdo rje hU~M ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje cha lugs

ci bzhin du/ /mchog gi dang po rab tu dgyes/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni/ /ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrub/ /'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug

grub/ /kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /phun sum tshogs kun bdag thams cad/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /rtag par kun du 'dul ba'o/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde

ba mchog /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ /rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas/ /khams gsum las rgyal sna

tshogs pa/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa/ /kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog /kun rig dngos grub thams cad ster/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed/ /kun mchog dngos

grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che/ /gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing brjod/ /rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa/ /rgyal po rdo rje

'chang chen ltar/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod/ /dngos grub ci ltar 'dod pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ /phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa/ /

rtog pa kun bshad cho ga 'am/ /rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba che rgyal po/ /kun mchog

sa yi dbang pos gsungs/ /de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ phyag rgya chen por mnyam bzhag la/ /rang gi snying pos lan cig sgrub/ /dr-i D+ha su to Sh+ya saM raka ta/ su po sid d+ha ta la gu/ de la ci ltar yi ge hU~M

gi glu blang pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ ri d+hi ta stsogs kyis brgyan ldan/ /ci nus pa dang ci dga' dang / /gaN De la stsogs glu blangs pa'i/ /yi ge hU~M gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud

bshad de/ /gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na/ /de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /rang nyid kyis ni brgya bcings la/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub/ /de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dam tshig

phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod la/ /rang gi snying gar rim bzhin du/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yongs
su mi skyo'i bar bsgrubs na/ /mchod pa kun stsogs las rnams ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /gzhan yang dngos grub
thams cad ni/ /dam pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po don yod par 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i

dngos grub kyi rgyud ni/ nyin re zhing dang por lan cig phyag rgya bsgrub par don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med par bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / dgug

pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so/ /bde ba dang yid bde ba dang phun sum tshogs pa dang dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so/ /tshe

dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang gzi byin chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so/ /dpal chen po dang bskal pa bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas

so/ /stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang / chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i

rnam par 'phrul pas so/ /thams cad du yi ge dang gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa

thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad dang bde ba'i mchog dang lung sgo ba dang lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje

rmad du 'byung bas so/ /gter thams cad dbyung ba dang nor dbrog pa dang rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so/ /yul thams cad dang skye bo dang grong khyer dang /

nags dang chu bor nye bar longs spyod pa sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/ /thams cad las sngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang rin po che dang kha zas dang btung ba dang g.yog 'khor la sogs pa sprul te/ nye bar longs spyod

pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so/ /skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang / snang ba chen po skyed pa dang rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la

ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings gyi dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang btung ba dang rang rtser gzhug pa dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang

du byed pas so/ /dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje la sogs pa mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje

sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing ston pa/ mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang sbom pa dang / du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so/ /'jig

rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang bcings ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba

dang thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so/ /klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so/ /

gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang 'jug pa

dang mchod pa dang bsgrub pa dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so/ /phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang brtan par bya ba dang sgrub pa

la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so/ /dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so/ /las thams cad rab tu sgrub pa la/ rnam par mi 'jig par bya

ba dang brtan par bya ba dang grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so/ /rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so/ /sems dpa' chen po

thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i

de bzhin gshegs pas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /sdig pa thams cad
byas pa 'am/ /rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa 'am/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub bo/ /don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o// //

de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i phrin las

rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /don yod pa dang thogs med pa/ /bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu/ /las kyi rab 'byam 'di dag ni/ /dngos grub skad cig gis grub byed/ /'di lta ste thams cad shin tu bsrung ba

dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang dam tshig dang

dngos grub bcing zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi 'brang ba chen pos so/ /nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa dang slar zlos pa dang rtag pa can dang khyab 'jug gi rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad

med pas so/ /gdung ba thams cad dang gnod byed dang nad dang mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so/ /dug dang sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar ba dang dbab pa dang bcing

ba dang bza' ba dang bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so/ /gdon thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang rab tu gdul ba dang / bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar ba'o/ /thams cad

la bcing ba dang thar ba dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gdon las thar bar bya ba dang shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang tshe sngon par 'phel ba

dang shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so/ /sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang /

bskyod pa dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra se na thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang gsad pa dang ltung bar

bya ba dang bslang ba dang / bslar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so/ /thams cad rengs par bya ba dang rmongs par bya ba dang gnyid log par bya ba dang gsad pa dang bza' bar bya ba la

ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang gzhig par bya ba dang dbang du bya ba dang ltung bar bya ba dang gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so/ /khro bo

thams cad bsal ba dang bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang brtsod pa las rgyal ba dang 'jigs pa las thar ba dang g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /sprin thams cad yang

dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang char chen po dbab pa dang rlung dang char pa dang glog dang ser ba bzlog pa dang dro ba dang grang ba bsal ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya thams cad shin tu

grub pa la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang rtse ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub

thams cad kyis so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa dang klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dang ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so/ /rnam thos sras mnan nas

dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang

dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so/ /mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang bdud la sogs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams

cad bcing ba dang dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyis

dngos grub dam pas so// // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan cig ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab bsgrub byed/ /snying mchog lan cig bzlas nas ni/ /phyag rgya

chen po rab grub bya/ /de yi rjes la nye snying po/ /las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas/ /don yod grub pas las rnams ni/ /kun la shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag

rgya ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang ma mthong ba/ /ma bshad pa la'ang rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog 'dir 'jigs pa yod min te/ /'khor lo med la brgya byin la/ /gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas/ /rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba
yin/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya/ /'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// //dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen

po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'byin pa byed pa bde ba che/ /bde chen can du brtan phyir dang / /sems can

thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med/ /kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te/ /mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo / /mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams
cad/ /'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang / /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs/ /sems

can thams cad ma dag pas/ /rang gi las kyis dag par 'gyur/ /de tshe sems can khams rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka'i phyir/ /rang gi las ni sbyong don du/ /btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin/ /de
nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /sems dpa' chen po bde ba che/ /byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul/ /sems can la phan bsod nams can/ /byang
chub sems ni brtan pa dag /sems can khams ni rgyud 'gyur bas/ /shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid

can gyi thabs/ /byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin/ /khams gsum 'khor
ba'i rgya khyon gyis/ /'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung / /de yi khams gsum gnas pa yis/ /sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la/ /de tshe dag pa grub par 'gyur/ /
de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs

la yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/ /yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+hU kha~M`/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni/ /byang

chub snying por byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa/ /sems can kun la bde don phyir/ /rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor

chen po dam pa ste dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid/ /'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba/ /su ra te sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM sid d+ha mA~M zhes brjod dgod/ /

mdun du bdud las rnam rgyal bar/ /mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri/ /g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ /rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /

g.yon du log par rnam dregs pa/ /sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni badzra sa twa badzra rad na/ badzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te sa twa badzrI/ /rata ne badzrI/ pad mi badzrI/ bi shwa badzrI/

mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / /rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o/ /mtshams rnams su yang lha mo ste/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su'o/ /de bzhin snga ma ci lta bar/ /'khor lo de ni brtag par bya/ /mchod
pa'i thal mo snying kar bcings/ /g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya/ /me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim/ /me tog bcas te snying kar bcing / /bsam pa g.yos pas gdung
bar bya/ /mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya/ /shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes

par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+harmA NA~M At+yA nuta pan na twAd/ de nas cho ga ci bzhin du/ /ston la me tog sil

ma dor/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod/ /de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni/ /thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor
der zhugs pa la ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog /sna tshogs la ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin cho ga ni/ /rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu bzhug /
mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che/ /mchod pa byas nas slar byug bya/ /sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang / /cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs/ /rnam par rgyal ba brnyes
par bri/ /bsgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni/ /de 'dra'i sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis cho ga bzhin/ /bzlas brjod

stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na/ /ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang / /tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen

po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang du gcig bcings nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /brtan pa myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud

ni/ snying kar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod la/ /bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud
las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mtshungs med sems can don byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog /las rnams rab 'byam dam pa ste/ /sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa/ /go rim bzhin du rab bshad

bya/ /'di lta ste nad thams cad dang mya ngan dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang dug dang sbyar ba'i dug dang gshed byed dang / g.yengs byed dang ro langs dang sngags dang sman dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang sdig pa dang rmyi lam

ngan pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang rims dang gdon dang mkha' 'gro ma dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang 'go ba'i nad dang nyes pa dang nyon mongs pa dang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so/ /tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi byin chen po dang mdangs dang stobs dang spro ba dang brtson 'grus dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po

dang bsod nams dang ming dang snyan pa dang grags pa dang dran pa dang blo gros dang brtan pa dang rtog pa dang stobs dang ting nge 'dzin dang phung po dang 'du byed dang sku dang gsung dang thugs 'phel ba la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang ye shes dang stobs dang thabs dang rdo rje dang bsgrub

pa dang gzungs dang sa dang spyod pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang chos dang las dang sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang sku dang gsung dang thugs

dang rdo rje chen po grub pa la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyad pa rdzogs par bya

ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sa dang gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang mngon par byung ba dang dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul
ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang lha las babs pa dang /
'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang 'dul ba la rab tu bzhugs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang mdo sde thams cad ston

par mdzad pa dang rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang rtogs pa thams cad stsol ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sgrub pa

la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so/ /ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis/ /byang chub sems la mngon brten pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod stsogs kyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur/ /

don yod bsod nams dam pa yi/ /las kyi rab 'byam sgrub byed pa/ /cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed/ /rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i/ /sems can kun la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil 'khor

dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o// //
de nas sna tshogs las chen po/ /khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pas/ /gang phyir nyes byas
kyis gdug pa'i/ /rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis/ /zhi bas sems can kun gyi don/ /gdul ba rab tu bsgrub mi nus/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin/ /gang tshe bde
gshegs sems can don/ /dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa/ /de tshe nyid kyi dngos po kun/ /gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab/ /sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab/ /

ut+tiSh+Tha sa ma ya kro d+ha ni sum b+ha dz+wA la badzra hU~M`/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas/ /khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis
ni/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gis legs bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsal ba/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje snyems pa che/ /drag du gsor bas skyod mdzad cing / /'bar

ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro bas sreg pa 'dra/ /'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra/ /dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ de la rdo rje chen po me

dang nyi ma ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te hU~M`/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum/ /thams cad g.yos shing 'gul bar 'gyur/ /lha

chen la sogs lha rnams ni/ /g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun/ /de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro/ /lha la sogs

pa'i srid gsum kun/ /de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad/ /sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dam pa yang ni thugs su chud/ /de
nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni legs par bzhugs/ /spyan 'bar 'jigs su

rung ba ste/ /dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing g.yo/ /kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams/ /phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni 'bar ba
'khrug /rlung bskyod bskal pa'i me lta bur/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ /yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul te/ /
'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor/ /bkug nas sems can kun don dang / /bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas/ /de nas rdo rje

'dzin rgyal pos/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni/ /de rnams la ni thugs rje yis/ /'chi ba slar gso brtan por gzungs/ /oM u tiSh+Tha ma hA a d+hi pa ta badzri ni/ shI g+h+ram uta thA pa ya hU~M`/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba

thams cad bslang ba'o/ /de nas sa gsum bslang ba na/ /thams cad du ni shi ba gso/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bos/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor
byed cing / /nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes/ /sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo/ /de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni zhi ba la/ /gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs/ /

khyed kyis dam tshig ci 'dra ba/ /zhus pa bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba/ /gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin du/ /
nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum pos 'di thos nas/ /tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi/ /'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par brtsams/ /de
rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig /gnod sbyin bsgo bas ci zhig bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas/ /khro

gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas/ /de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod/ /g.yon pa snyems pa rgya bcas pas/ /smin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing / /nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /

drag du khros bcas pas smras so/ /de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus pa las rgyal ba ni 'di yin te/ hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung bas/ /nges rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang / /

dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas/ /rdo rje ming ni byin nas su/ /'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin bzhag /de nas rdo rje chen po mchog /mgon
po yis ni gsol btab pa/ /sems can kun la rjes ston pas/ /rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /
de yi dbus su bzhag bya ba/ /sngon po 'bar ba'i gzugs bzang ba/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad/ /sems dpa' dkyil dkrung gis legs bzhugs/ /bsnyems bcas shas cher

'bar ba la/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrug pa'i/ /rdo rje gsol bar mdzad la brtson/ /de yi dngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang / /ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin ma/ /mtshams

su mda' dang kha T+wA~M` ga /'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa/ /'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni/ /thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu/ /dang po rdo rje phyag rgya

bdag /gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste/ /gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor/ /rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che/ /bzhi par glu mkhan ma la sogs/ /rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyi/ /khro bo rnams
ni lnga pa la/ /drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog /gnod sbyin srin po king ka ra/ /dbang phyug dam pa drag po stsogs/ /gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs
rnams su/ /mdor na ming po gsum la sogs/ /lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad/ /legs par bri ba'am bzhag par bya/ /mtshams su lha mor rab bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus

su'ang / /rdo rje lcags kyu sogs khro bcas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin dang / /cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya/ /khros pas rdo rjes gsor ba dang / /khro gnyer 'dzum dang

bcas pas 'dud/ /de nas khro zhing slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub/ /hU~M mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /snyems dang bcas pas rgyas gdab nyid/ /de bzhin khro bas 'dul ba

la/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dgyes pa yis/ /gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes/ /de nas me tog blangs nas ni/ /khros pas bdag po che la gtor/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /oM ma hA badzra

dz+wA la yA na lArka ya hi dzaHsarba badzra ku la pra be sha ya hU~M/ sarba mu dra~M ga nA ban d+ha na trAT/ sarba sa ma ya~M sA d+ha ya phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn da ha pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru ma hA kro d+ha ag ni badzre Na hU~M phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das khro bo'i/ /rgyal po brtan pa che byon 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun/ /dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad/ /de nas hU~M la sogs pa'i sgra'i/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te

slob ma la sogs la/ /snying kar dbab pa phra ba skye/ /de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi/ /rang gi snying po brjod par bya/ /hU~M hU~M badzra pra ha ra ni phaT/

hU~M badzra shU la yA gri Ni tri ti/ ma ta sa hU~M badzra kro She ts+tshin da ha~M/ /oM badzra a ma la pA she ma Ta/ rdo rje 'gugs pa dang rdo rje mdung dang rdo rje ral gri dang rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i bsrung ba'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya

rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa/ shin tu grub pa stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab par nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra gu h+ya sid d+ha pa ra ma yo gI shwa ri hi/ hU~M badzra tsaN+Da ho kha T+wA~M

ga ma hA badzra ka pA la ya ma ku te ru lu ru luN+Di hU~M badzra nA rA ya Ni dzi/ hU~M badzra pa Ta ke dze/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan cig bzlas te dgod pa 'am bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol
na/ /dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig brjod par bya ste/ sems can mang la bde phyir dang / /bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul las

bsod nams ni/ /'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams

cad dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la/ rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa la bslab par bya ste/

phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang bsad pa dang slar 'tsho bar bya'o/ /gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas 'tsho bar

byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la/ shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed do/ /de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang / /rdo rje tshogs ni kun

gyis kyang / /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas 'dir sgrub bshad bya ste/ /ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni/ /bzles brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /

'bum tshang nas ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod

par/ /'jig rten gsum na legs snang zhing / /cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsgrub pa ni/ 'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am/ /'gro 'am nyal bar byed pa ni/ /ci lta de ltar

'bum bzlas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams

kyi mchod pa dang / /rang gi nye du rnams kyis bsten/ /gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing / /gang la 'jigs pa med par rgyu/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya'i

dam pa bsgrub pa ni/ ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing / /bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni/ /ci srid nyid du khro chen po'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa ni/ /bdag ni thams

cad gsad bya zhes/ /brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni/ /las rnams dam pa bsgrub pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhir ni rab

byed cing / /thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na/ /rdo rje las nyid thob par 'gyur/ /bsgrub pa chen po cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas dngos grub bsgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi/ /las kyi rgyud

ni dam pa rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /'di lta ste thams cad bsreg pa dang bskrad pa dang gzhig pa dang rengs par bya ba dang gnyid log par bya ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang rmongs pa dang / gzhig pa dang bcing ba dang

gzir ba dang dral ba dang brdeg pa dang 'bar ba dang bsgyel ba dang btso ba dang gcad pa dang dgug pa dang phye mar bya ba dang gtor ba dang rnam par gzhom pa dang rims dang dug dang gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang smyo bar bya ba dang bsad

par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis so/ /thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang nges par bkod pa dang bskyod pa dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang glu len du gzhug pa dang brkyal du gzhug pa dang rtser gzhug pa dang ha ha zhes dgod du

gzhug pa dang 'khor ba dang drang ba dang 'od du gzhug pa dang bsgom pa dang nub par bya ba dang dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang nye bar 'degs par bya ba dang bskur ba dang nga ro 'don par bya ba dang ngur gzhug pa dang rang nyid brdeg par bya ba

dang 'ching bar bya ba dang skra 'bal bar bya ba dang zhe 'gras par bya ba dang gos bshu ba dang khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbab pa dang pra se na bsgrub pa

dang bden par smra bar bya ba dang / sgyu ma ston pa dang lan ston pa dang dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang dus ma yin par shing las me tog dang 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang 'bru thams cad yang dag

par ston par bya ba dang rims dang sbyar dug dang gdon dang dug dang mkha' 'gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang phyogs dang mtshams dang dkyil

'khor bcing ba dang shin tu bsrung ba dang yongs su skyob par bya ba dang thar bar bya ba dang bslang ba dang dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang klu gdon

dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang srin po skrag pa dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul ba dang bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang ma mo rnams gdul ba dang gdug pa'i tshogs rnam

par gtor ba dang gdug pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang 'dum pa dang 'jigs pa med pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang nor sbyin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang

lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang skem byed tshar gcad pa dang tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang khyab 'jug gdul ba dang dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang

'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang rdo rje bsgrub pa dang byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dam tshig gis bcing ba dang

dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub gyis so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /lan cig bzlas pas mchog grub pa/ /thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan cig /de yi 'og du khro gnyer gyis/ /

bsgrub bya thams cad dgug pa yin/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni/ /rnam

dag mchog gi chos nyid las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rtsi chen yin/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du/ /rang rigs rin po che bskyed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che/ /thabs med

pas na thabs yin no/ /'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas/ /ma dag sems can khams rnams ni/ /de rnams la ni rab spyod par/ /skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen/ /mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas

kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad/ /'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchog /rang snying bzang po la snyoms zhugs/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos

nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyid thugs su chud par gyur pa'o/ /snyems pas

pad ma g.yon pa ni/ /bzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas/ /ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad/ /ci ltar pad ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /

khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag /'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por gyur/ /de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur/ /de nas sgom pa'i snying po 'di/ /dag par

bsgoms pas bsgom pa na/ /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni/ /pad ma chen po 'chang bar 'gyur/ /gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ni/ /rgyal po che dang mdangs mnyam pa/ /bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i pad mchog gi/ /g.yas pa mchog la rnam par gzigs/ /de nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /pad+ma chen po mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rnams ni 'dul ba'i mchog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul mdzad pa/ /bzhugs pa rab tu bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de la pad+ma dge ba der/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam spyod pa'i/ /tshul gyi

'dul bar mdzad pa na/ /pad ma'i rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba rnaMs kyis gsol ba btab/ /de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po/ /'jig rten dbang

pos bka' stsal pa/ /phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya/ /gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad ma ni/ /g.yon bsnyems tshul gyis

gzigs mdzad pa/ /rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku ni brgyad po bri/ /rang gi ting 'dzin pad ma che'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la
rnam par gzigs/ /'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha/ /zhi ba sred med bu tshangs pa/ /'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad ma can/ /spyi bor 'tsher zhing mgrin 'degs pa/ /

rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya/ /de nas pad ma'i snying po ni/ /sarba ta thA ga ta pad ma dza/ hU~M/ badzra pad ma/ he pad ma/ pad ma ba~M ho pad ma ni rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnams su ni hU~M pad me tsaN

Te shwa ra hU~M`/ he ma hA bi shwa pad ma tsUr Ne sid+ha hU~M`/ maT hrIHpad ma pad ma hU~M a/ ho pad ma a shwa/ kra ma kra ma hU~M dza/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa byas nas ni/ /pad ma chen po me tog bcas/ /ma yengs

yid kyis phyag bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin/ /las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya/ /oM bi sho d+ha ya/ ma nu sa ni/ shud d+ha ma hA satwa/ d+hA tu sa ma sa twa/ rA ga dI pany+tsa ye tsi ta me sarba d+ha meSh+th+ya badzri Ni tsi ta me

sarba d+ha me sh+ya dzi ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni/ /dgyes pas pad ma 'dzin pa grub/ /de nas mdzub mo lcags kyur bcing / /chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drang / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki shwa ra pad ma hasta/

ya hi shI g+h+ra~M me me badzra mu drA a gri sh+ya sa be sa ma yer ba d+ha bi shi ko mi/ dzaHhU~M ba~M` hoH sho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma me/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra s+t+wa~M/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po mchog /'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon/ /'jig

rten kun mchog 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yi/ /ye shes dag ni bslab par bya/ /ting

'dzin snying po 'di yi ni/ /bsgrub pa chen po gdod nas byung / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa 'am/ /gdug pa rnams kyi nang chud pa'am/ /

gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni/ /pad ma chen po yongs su bzung / /dus dang stobs ni ci bzhin du/ /nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis tshe 'di la/ /myur du mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod chags kun gyi bde myur

bar/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mtha' yas mchog /

tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni/ /phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas/ /dngos grub chen po nyid thob bo/ /dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te/ /las ni las mchog phyag rgyas so/ /bsgrub

pa chen po cho ga'i rgyud do// // de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i/ /ting 'dzin las ni 'dren ma dag /dang por ting 'dzin grub pa ni/ /go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa

dang rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang yams dang 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang nyon mongs pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang brtsod pa dang 'thab pa dang byis pa'i gdon dang dmu rgod dang nyon mongs

pa dang ngal ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbul ba dang rgyas pa dang reg na mi bde ba dang bskal ba ngan pa dang nad med pa ma yin pa dang nor rlag pa rnams la ni pad ma chen po zhi bas so/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag

dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang ma zhu ba dang rims dang sbyar ba'i dug dang dug dang mdze dang 'brum bu phra mo dang g.yan pa dang rkang shu dang / skran dang chu'i dmu rdzing dang mtshan bar rdol ba dang sha kra dang zad byed dang khrag zad pa dang

khu ba zad pa dang / nad thams cad dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang gdon dang phra men rnams gso ba la ni/ pad ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ /thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang chos dang cho ga dang / /

gtsug tor dang gtsug phud dang mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor dang sa dang nam mkha' dang rdo rje'i gdan dang khang pa chen po dang rdo rje ra ba dang me 'bar ba dang thal ba'i ra ba dang rdo rje dang ri bo don yod

pa la sogs pa dang srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang phur bus gdab pa dang zas dang btung ba dang gos dang rgyan dang phyag rgya dang bsrung ba la ni pad ma chen po thams cad bsrung bas so/ /tshe thams cad dang stobs dang kha dog

dang gzi brjid dang mdangs dang lang tsho dang brtson 'grus dang spro ba dang nad med pa dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang nor dang 'bru dang dbang phyug dang 'byor pa dang dngos grub dang blo dang rnyed pa dang bkra shis pa

dang ming dang grags pa dang snyan pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dam pa 'grub pa la ni pad ma chen po mchog grub pas so/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib
pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/ /kun dbang rin chen
thams cad 'dzin/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /drag po chen po rab sad mdzad/ /chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas/ /kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung / /nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can/ /

nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin/ /de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni/ /nges par rdo rje can du brjod/ /de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid/ /ljang sngon bai DUr+ya mnyam mdangs/ /rdo rje rin chen bsnams dge ba/ /nam mkha'i
snying por yang dag gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di/ /mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs/ /ting 'dzin la ni rnam gzigs pas/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
sras bcas dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rdo rje rin chen de yis ni/ /kun rig kun gyis dbang bskur dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas/ /shis

pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba badzra sa twa a ti pa ti tra ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing / /legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje rin chen che de las/ /chos kyi
gtso bor byung bar gyur/ /byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /ci rigs par ni kun dbang bskur/ /rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs/ /bde gshegs kun gyis byin
brlabs pas/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog /dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog /nyi ma

zla ba skar ma dang / /gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri/ /de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /bdag nyid thams cad dgyes pa gzhag /dag pa'i bai DUr+ya mdog 'dra/ /'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug /g.yon
pa rin chen thugs kar stod/ /g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba/ /de yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog /bzhi po gzungs bcas dam pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang / /nor bu chen po bla med dang / /

'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs/ /rang gi mtshan mas mchod pas ni/ /de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te/ badzra satwa dzaHbadzra rad na hU~M/ badzra d+harma ba~M`/ badzra kar ma hoH/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad

de/ oM pra ti badzri Ni phaT/ oM badzra prI ti hi hi/ oM tsin+tA ma Ni hoH/ oM badzra ma hA ma he ha~M/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya/ /nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs la/ /mkha' skyes la ni
mgos phyag bya/ /bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi/ /dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya/ /khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i/ /thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin/ /oM i sid d+ha b+hur b+hu ba/ sid

d+ha sid d+ha swaH/ sid d+ha ma hA badzra rad na/ ba ba tra Ta tra~M`/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang / /phun tshogs kun la shin tu ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med ces

bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so/ /de nas nor bu khu tshur gyi lcags kyus dgug par bya'o/ /oM b+hU rA ya hA dzI/ b+hu ba pra bi sha hU~M swa/ gr-i h+Na ba~M` ba ba Ta Ta sid d+ha ho tra~M`/
de nas bcom ldan myur du ni/ /byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni/ /'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la/ /don ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas slob mas phyag rgya ni/ /me tog bcas pa mchog gis
gzhug /bcug nas de nyid mchog snying po/ /bden pa lan cig brjod du gzhug /de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod pa che/ /'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams/ /bde bar

gshegs pa de bzhin thob/ /de nas de phyir bsgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis/ /dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing / /'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la/ /'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /

rin chen kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /dngos grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu

tshur gyis so/ /de bzhin du las bsgrub pa ni dngos grub bla na med pa yin no phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do/ / de nas de phyir las rnams kyi/ /rab 'byam rgyu ni dam pa dang / /dngos grub chen po kun grub

pa/ /go rims ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod

pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang rdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi

mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas so/ /dpal thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang

gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang rdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad

bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang

len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang rdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang

brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so/ /mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang

bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang rdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang

nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa
sgrub pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad bde don du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba/ /rang gi rgyal mchog lan cig bsgrub/ /yi ge tra~M` ni sbyar bar bya/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i
rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa/ /'jig
rten gsum bdag thams cad la/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgoms gyur cing / /sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /
rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin/ /mi mnyam pa yis sten gyur na/ /dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro/ /bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten gyur na/ /bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin
pa/ /zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas/ /'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas/ /chos
kyis bsten nas gsum mchog ste/ /chos min bsten pas ngan song gsum/ /'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad/ /zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad/ /gti mug reg ni sgrub byed ces/ /kun tu gsang ba'i

ming yin no/ /nga ni 'jig rten cig pu nyid/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad/ /nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin/ /de nas gsum po 'di yi mchog /sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang

'dzin pa/ /gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid/ /bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni/ /rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra/ /tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub snod
ma yin/ /de rnams sbyang phyir bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni/ /gzugs ni gsum po 'di mdzad nas/ /phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa lha sogs lha/ /'jig rten
