gsum mchog dbang phyug che/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gsang snying po/ /rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul/ /oM b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo srungs bzhis ni rab bsrungs pa/ /kha khyer gyis ni

legs bskor ba/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang ma nyid dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid/ /bsgrub pa thams cad bsgrub pa ni/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin
du/ /legs par bri 'am gzhag par bya/ /pus mo gnyis kyis bzhugs la der/ /rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas/ /zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /oM b+hUr b+hu ba swaH

swa sti nA ma swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/ /thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba/ /thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la/ /de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin/ /slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yis/ /slob ma thams

cad gzhug par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum gcig /snying po snod min la smras sam/ /ci skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni/ /gal te 'dir ni ma

spyad dam/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste/ /ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni/ /nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob/ /yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni/ /

dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ba dang / /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni/ /de la gar gyi mchod pa dang / /'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod
pa bya/ /'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu/ /slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad/ /

kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs/ /brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni/ /rab tu grags pa'i dngos grub ster/ /gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad/ /tshogs kun gyis mchod lha

mo rnams/ /zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser/ /grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad/ /phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang / /rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /de rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /dkyil 'khor de

bzhin dam tshig bshad/ /hi hU~M shI sh+ya/ dkyil 'khor bzang po sgo bzhi pa/ /srad bu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya/ /mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che/ /bzhi po dag ni rim pa bzhin/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni/ /

bzhi po dag ni de bzhin bya/ /rang gi snying po bzhi po ni/ /rang gi sgor ni phyogs par gzhag /skal bzang lag na ral gri mtshon/ /sring mo phub can zhi ba mo/ /phag mo lag na gter nyid de/ /grub pa mo ni snyems
dang bcas/ /de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni/ /sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas/ /go rim dag ni ci bzhin du/ /zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /spos la sogs

pas mchod par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas/ /kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya/ /oM sum b+ha ga ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hi b+h+'ur/ rak+Sha sa mA tiSh+Tha ma ya hi b+h+'ur b+hu ba/ ba ra hA a mir+ya ta ma ya swA hA/ /sid d+hi

ke sid d+hi sa ma ya hi I ma~M ki mu drA b+hiH hrIHhU~M shrI b+h+yo/ de nas lus ni thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bstan te/ /gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya/ /gal te gsang

nyid ma bsrungs na/ /gang zhig sems can don zhugs dang / /gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa/ /de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid/ /de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur/ /

chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid/ /chos min pas ni dug pas lhag /ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin/ /yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang / /phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod/ /sring mo
bzhi'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /sgrub pa dang ni rab sgrub nyid/ /'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang / /

kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir/ /zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ /phuH/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /srad bu thams cad yang dag bri/ /sgo khyud
klu yi gdengs ka mchog /mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdud/ /de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni/ /mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni/ /klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag /shes rab can gyis kun tu bri/ /de nas

khros nas zhugs nas ni/ /klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /sbrul gyi gdengs kas dgug par bya/ /oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pr-i thi b+hin da r-i She shA ya hi phuH/ sarba nA ga

ku lA n+yA na ya phuH/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phuH/ sarbAn sA d+ha ya phuH/ ta tas sarba nA ga pu tra ka phuH/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par

bsam par bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyas dang rtse bar byed do/ /dug thams cad sbyar ba dang / /gzhig nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par

bya ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug /gal te bden pa las 'das na/ /de dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur/ /khyod kyis glog la brnyas mi bya/ /ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing / /
gal te dngos grub la dga' na/ /ci nas sbrul ni gsad mi bya/ /klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /

gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyes byas kyis ni dug nyid 'gyur/ /gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang / /dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas gdug pa'i snying

po ni/ /ha~M/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /de dbus dang por gdon la sogs/ /cho ga rgyas pa gdon par bya/ /de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas/ /dgod cing myur bar dkyil 'khor

du/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni/ /khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye/ /de nas gdon dang rims sdig pa/ /dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /rdo rjes rab tu 'jig par 'gyur/ /zhes
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /sdug bsngal thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /sems can kun don
rab bsgrub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM AHhU~M hrIHtrA~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gzugs kun gyis ni kun

mchog gi/ dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin/ /gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni/ /gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa/ /de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin/ /de nas gang phyir dkyil 'khor che/ /dam pa yang

dag bshad bya ste/ /kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la/ /rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyi

'khor/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /kun mchog bdag po'i sku rnams so/ /rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni/ /rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba gzhag /rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i/ /gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo bsnams

pa bri/ /khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje/ /gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ /rdo rje pad byung pad ma can/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon/ /

dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad par bya ste/ /

oM badzra nA rA yan tshin da pra ti ha na badzra tsakra te na ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHbadzra d+hA ra ta~M`/ badzra ta thA ga ta hU~M/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi ni ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badzra ku lo gra pa ne ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra tsaN De shwa rA ya/ ha ha

ha ha hrIH/ badzra pad+mod b+ha ba ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra lo ke shwa re/ ma hA pra me si d+h+ya/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ swa sti na maHswA hA/ he badzra ku su mA yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma me sA d+ha ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha/ ba ba ta ta tra~M/

badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha a she Sha~M mu trA/ na mo ye na sA d+he na/ b+ha ga ba te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yu d+ha/ ts+tshin da badzra Ni tsakre Na te na sa t+ye na pA pa kan/ oM d+hIHshrI shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ badzra pa ra mi/ oM badzra gau ri ma hA bi d+ya tre lokya

bi dza ye shwa ri badzra kro d+ha ag ni sa ma ye/ badzra d+ha ri na mo te/ tad ya thA/ oM hi li mi li tA li badzra ka mu ka ye swA hA/ badzra sa ma ya na ma ye na sA d+h+ye na b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha bo d+hir bud d+ha d+ha ra/ badzra d+harma pra

yo ge na te na sa t+ye na sid+ha mA~M/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ badzra d+ha mo ta/ oM karma badzri ni sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya bi shud d+ha sA d+h+ya ba ha/ ga ga nod b+ha be/ yo ge na sid+d+ha mA~M pa ra ma ka re tad+ya thA ga ga na bi shud d+he/ sarba ma pi pra ya

pa ri p+'u ra Ni swA hA/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang phyogs gnas/ /lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid/ /'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi/ /rol mo che bcu

brdung byed pa/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer dang / /sgo dang mtshams su'ang de 'bri'o/ /sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rab tu gzhug /dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni/ /dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug

par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /dang po lcags kyu che de nyid/ /snying po 'di ni rjod byed cing / /'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa sid+hi hU~M/ /sarba ta thA ga ta na/ sa ma ya A kar

Sha ya dza/ badzra ku la d+hi pa~M/ dam ye twa pra be sha ya hU~M`/ sarba lo ke shwa ra~M pra be sh+ya sa ma ya ban d+ha na ba~M/ sa ma ya sarba rad na dI pa~M ma hA ma Ni rA dzA na~M/ ba shi ku ru hoH/ hU~M AHhU~M hrIHtrA~M/ de nas gsang ba chen po yi/ /
snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni/ /'khor lo thams cad dang bcas par/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang / /bden pas bcings te dbang du byas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog

thams cad/ /dngos grub kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas go rim ci bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang / /dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni/ /thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba thams

cad mi 'gyur gnas/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs/ /'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyi cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba/ mtha' med cing sna tshogs

pa mnyam pa med pa'i phul du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin

no/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gsang ba ras bris kyi cho ga gsungs pa ni/
sangs rgyas kun kyi gsang ba che/ /dam tshig mchog gi bsgrub pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dngos grub kun gyis lus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi/ /rin chen rgyal po
sogs kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po chags pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa/ /bla med dga' ba chen po yi/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /dga' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas/ /rang gi bzhugs
gnas mchog de la/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog /mi 'gyur mchog ni yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang / /byang chub

sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag /kun mchog chags pa chen po yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa/ /glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med/ /mchog ni

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur/ /rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che/ /rnam
rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha/ /phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste/ /sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yin te/ kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang / /dngos grub kun gyi

bde ba'i mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba 'am/ /thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che/ /dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang / /dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams/ /rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i sku yi mchog ces bya'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig gi 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam

tshig gi rdo rje kI li kI li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /

'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni/ /mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod/ /de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub kun bdag bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas gsungs

pa yin no/ /de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste/ /sdig pa che la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang / /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /de dag kyang ni myur 'grub 'gyur/ /

nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am/ /de bzhin lo ni re re la/ /ci mngon mngon 'dod 'grub par bya/ /ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas/ /ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste/ /gang zhig bris par gyur

na ni/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob/ /bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan/ /sems dpa'i dkyil mo
dkrung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje snyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba/ /g.yon pa dril bu mchog snyems pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag /de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams/ /de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor

brten/ /rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku/ /gsang ba chen po dgod par bya/ /dang po pad ma ltar dkar dmar/ /gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar/ /gzhani uta pal 'dab ltar sngo/ /rdo rje snyems ma ser po 'dzin/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag /
g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag /g.yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin/ /rdo rje kI li kI li ma/ /dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro/ /de yi logs la rdo rje che'i/ /mda'
ni gsor ba la brtson pa/ /snyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan sgreng dang bcas/ /de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas/ /mchod pas bdag po la lta ba/ /sangs rgyas

rin chen dbang bskur mtshan/ /thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs/ /rang la bdag ni thugs btad pa/ /zur du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni
brtags pa yis/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob/ /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba dag pa dam pa'i dngos
grub 'grub/ /gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams mchod pa/ /chen po yis ni dpal 'dir rol/ /'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas/ /
mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram/ /yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi/ /ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan/ /dril
bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i/ /bla re phul bas mchog gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje glu yi mchod sogs dang / /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul ba/ /me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba/ /mar me'i sbyor bas
yang dag mchod/ /khang pa sum rtsegs dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya/ /yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / /
rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas/ /rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni/ /dngos grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos/ /ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos

kyis yang dag klubs/ /phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spos dang dri snod bcas/ /rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis/ /gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang
ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /mchog tu
bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ /rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mgon la 'dud/ /g.yon pa snyems pa cung zad bzhad/ /bstod cing mdzes pa'i
mig btsums pa/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ mchog tu bde
ba'i sems ni rol par ldan/ /sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH hi hi hi hi/ /mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol/ /de nas me tog sil ma dor/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang / /ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu

gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis brgyan/ /lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ha~M/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas/ /rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

gnyis pa 'dra/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog

tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa yang / /gang gis sgrub po dam pa dang / /sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni/ /rdo rje sems
dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur/ /lugs ma 'am ni brdungs ma 'am/ /'dus byas pa 'am bris pa 'am/ /dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas/ /de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin/ /

rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin rlabs sogs bsgrub rnams so/ /de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig
gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las/ /thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag mchog gis rol bcas pas/ /gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dzaHmchog dang po rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba rab rtogs rab tu

dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs hU~M mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu mi 'gyur zad med srid pa rab bsgrub bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la deng grub mdzod/ /ba~M mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad
rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad ma'i rgyal po kye/ /hoHrab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig /rtag par bdag 'phel nam
mkha'i snying po khyod/ /hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod/ /dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /rab tu dga' ba mchog bdag po/ /de la mchog tu
gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du/ /mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyi/ /mchod de sngags pas

glu rnams kyi/ /rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa
ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin/ /bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur cig /myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab

tu 'dod pa bsgrubs/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal/ /dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du/ /phyag rgya kun gyis

byin brlabs pa/ /de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni/ /rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi/ rdo rje glu'i mchod

pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ /oM nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po

ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom
ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi

mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod/ /gang gis don dang glu yis bstod/ /de ni dngos grub

kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ /dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o/ /kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang / /so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las/ /

ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa kun gyi sna tshogs che/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyi/ /myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
sems dpa' mchog gi dang pos gsungs so/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin/ rang lha rnal
'byor ci bzhin du/ /lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /rang lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog

dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi

dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur/ /rang lha'i sbyor

ba ci bzhin du/ /dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnam sad pas/ /glu dang rol mo cho ga ni/ /dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod/ /rang lha yi sbyor ba ci bzhin du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /dam
tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya/ /'di yis rtog pa thams cad la/ /rdo rje 'bebs pas rab sad pas/ /rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni/ /thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
dpal/ /dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rjes gnas ci bzhin/ /ci snyed pa dang
ci bde bas/ /me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni/ /khang pa'am skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas/ /ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag bklubs/ /
me tog phreng bcas kha dri zhim/ /lugs ma 'am ni bsdungs pa 'am/ /'dus pa 'am ni ri mor bris/ /dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du/ /cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du/ /

rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin brlab sogs 'grub par bya/ /sngon du lan cig bsgrub byas nas/ /de nas de rjes ci 'dod par/ /ci 'dod pa dang ci smra ba/ /thams cad
bza' zhing thams cad byed/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /rab tu dgod dam smra ba 'am/ /ci bzhin de bzhin de dang der/ /ci 'dod par ni de bzhin bzhag / /gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni/ /me tog sogs

kyis mchod nas ni/ /ci bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya/ /'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na phur/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub/ /rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' grub chen po/ /phyag rgya kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin/ /mi thub pa dang mi sod cing / /thams cad byed cing kun gyi brten/ /sems can
kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod rjes su gzung bar nus/ /kun mchog rjes su chags pa che/ /'dod pa 'grub pa bde ba'i mchog /kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa
yin/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad

ma'i ra ba che/ /mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste/ /mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams
myong ba/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod
pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // gsang ba mchog ni dgyes pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas/ /
thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /'di ni rang
byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid/ /ces bya ba grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad ma ra ba che/ /mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /
mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste/ /mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid de nyams myong ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang
po las/ dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba
yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su gzung ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan gcig brjod pas skyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo ga tsid ta~M u pA da yA
mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid

du yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni/ /snying kar rdo rje rab bzhag nas/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ho/ snying pos rdo rje ci bde bsgrub/ /'di yis

rdo rje bskul ba na/ /'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid bskul bas myur du ni/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i
mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams/ /ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /

ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis/ /slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug /phyag rgya gang la de babs pa'o/ /de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol byas la/ /rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas/ /

sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /de la rdo rje chen po'i mna'i chus dbang bskur te/ /'di ltar brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na

sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ /skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas/ /dad pa med pas bzhad

rgad smod/ /zhes bya bas mna' bsgag go/ de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i

gnas su bzhag ste/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+wa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi ma hA badzra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o/ /'di n-i sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje 'chang gi

rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems chen po/ /yongs su mi spang rtag tu bsgrubs/ /shin tu gsang

bde 'di yin te/ oM badzra kar ma bA d+hi d+hi shrI badzra nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i ming de yang ci srid byang chub snying po'i mthar
thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho
na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ /'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun kyi mchog dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par
stsol bar mdzad pa ni/ srid pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag /rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i chos
nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba 'am lha bsgrub pa'i tshe dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis

sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no/ /rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya bar sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas srid

pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi/ /srid bde shin tu myur bar ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /

shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig go/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang / /'da'

ba ru ni mi mdzad pas/ /phyag rgya dam tshig ces ni bsgrags/ /yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci srid
'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ci srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin gyis brlabs

bsgrubs pa/ /rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug /sems can don ni byed pa yin/ /dam tshig 'dis ni mchog sgrub cing / /ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa/ /nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gnod
mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang / /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/ /ma lus
bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas/ /yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang / /don yod mchog tu grub pa dang / /rnal 'byor thams cad rjes bsgrub byed/ /dpal
ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas/ /dngos grub kun gyi
bde ba kun/ /phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong / /de nas thams cad gzengs stod pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /de
bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /gzengs stod pa'i gang lung bstan/ /

de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las

khyod ston/ /he badzra na maHta thA ga ta sid d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M b+h+'ur b+hu ba swaH/ gang la gzengs stod pa 'di dang phyag rgya chen por lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon
rnams dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
dngos grub gyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang sngags kyi stobs la dad pa bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba
sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ci snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su
chags pas 'dir dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bsgrub pa dang rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad brtan par gyur pa nyid kyis/ 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos
kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang

de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs
nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang / /sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing / /khyed rnams der
nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar 'chi ba ni yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog

pa ni/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par

gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /gang zhig skyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing / /nam

yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis/ /des ni rmad par mi bya'o/ /rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas/ /dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung / /'di ni ma byon

rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su spang mi bya/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yis/ /slob dpon la ni
gang smad pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang / /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad
nas sems can dmyal bar ltung / /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod

kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang / /rang srog gis rtag bsten byas na/ /longs spyod

g.yo ba smos ci dgos/ /gang gis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung / /rtag tu

de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs

las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam/ /deng khyod gyur bar the tsom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas/ /

kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de 'dir

thob par the tsom med/ /ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas
gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di

yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs bya ste zhes bya'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon
gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste/ /mkhas pas mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /zhes

bya'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ /gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su bzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi

bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing gsad par mi bya'o/ /ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i

dam tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la bde bar bzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod skyed pa yin no/ /lta

ba log pa dang phyi rol mu stegs pa dang / nyan thos pa thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no/ /ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so/ /sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so/ /

gang gis kyang khyed kyi lus ngag yid kyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'byung bar 'gyur
zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste/ /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
sems dpas mchog tu bden pas gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la dgongs pa yin no/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid

du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde gter bstan par gyis/ /de ni 'gro la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag tu nyid du rtogs par gyis/ /de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu/ /rol mo'i

mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa/ /rdo rje bla ma chen pos de phul nas/ /rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par bya/ /myos byed myos bral btung ba ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga

sogs/ /ci bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo gar rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs/ /bud med sogs dang ldan
pa 'am/ /rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa/ /ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis/ /mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la gsang ba'i
cho ga'i glu'i khyad par ni 'di yin te/ hU~M bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i 'o/ a/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ /hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ /oM pad

ma'i snying po'i 'o/ /ha nam mkha'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni/ /yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste/ /
rang gsang cho gas blangs pa 'di/ /mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi yin/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas/ /rnam par dben par rol mo dkrol/ /

rang gsang cho gas glu blangs pa/ /gsang ba'i rol mos rab tu bsgrub/ /de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni/ 'dzin pa dang bcas gzung ba che'i/ /gar ni rab tu byas nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor

'dra ba'i gar byas nas/ /yongs su bskor bas rang mchod bya/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /gtam

rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis/ /gang zhig gar de rol mo yin/ /gser ram yang na dngul dang ni/ /de bzhin shing las byas pa yi/ /rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis/ /grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya/ /dkyil 'khor

gang dang gang bsten pa/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de/ /bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug /sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /bsod nams

kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtag tu srung bar gyur pa yin/ /rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad/ /sbyar dug mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba dang / /bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams/ /'dis ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dngos
grub dag ni phun tshogs 'gyur/ /dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis

byas pa'am de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu dang rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste/ de re shig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang

po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste/ /bde ba chen po brtan

zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig /so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur sgrubs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/

rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i

mchod pa ni/ hU~M rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod 'dud/ /kha T+wA~M 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod 'dud/ /de nas pad
ma'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yid srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku/ /la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul

phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku/ /la lar pad ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste/ /la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad ma'i rgyal po bdag bsgrubs shig /de nas nor
bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las/ /yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog /kun mchog

rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba las/ /rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod gyur/ /de nas ming po gsum gyi ni b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi/ /hrI hU~M shrI b+h+yoH/ /de nas klu'i rigs thams cad

kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni/ phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ sarba ma ga maN Da la mi da~M badzra d+ha rA kra ma be mar da bi ki ra b+ha na ud sA da ya/ nA

sha ya/ ha na da ha pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru kro d+ha hU~M kA ra man tri na/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil

'khor stong gi 'od kyis sku ni rnam par mdzes/ /la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka bye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bar/ /la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /
la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa/ /la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs/ /ma lus 'dul ba mkhas

pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub gyur cig /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ /dngos

grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ /de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i

cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de

kho na nyid kyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i glu dang gar gyi cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas/ so sor rjes su bsgrubs par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na

med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa yin no zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin/ /kun
mchog sna tshogs chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub/ /zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa

gtam rgyud sna tshogs can/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan pa ste/ /gang gis sna tshogs pa yi rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan kun tu rjes bsten pa/ /mchog gi dngos grub
bde ba chen po nyid ni de yis yang dag nyams su myong / /don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan/ /cho ga mchog tu rtag pa ste/ /kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni/ /dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub byed
gang zhig grong khyer mchog dgyes par/ /zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams ni/ /shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde des thob/ /gang gis dngos grub ma thob dang / /bsod nams phun
tshogs byed pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /bsgrub po 'dir ni rab grub 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /snying po sogs kyis ma grub dang / /nye ba'i snying pos bsgrub byas
kyang / /ma grub 'dir zhugs grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du/ /de bzhin myur du grub pa yin/ /ci ltar dang po'i khyim bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad grub pa yis/ /de ltar thams cad grub pa min/ /ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /khang bzang dam pa mthong ba yis/ /dam tshig rnams la nyams pa dang / /sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs

pa dang / /bdud stsogs gdon gyis reg pa yang / /rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa 'am/ /yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa/ /slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /de dag myur du grub
par 'gyur/ /grub min yang 'dir cung zad med/ /dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin/ /dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur du/ /rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog

'dzin pa'i/ /ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya/ /go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog /go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan/ /rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang / /pad ma rin chen 'chang ba'o/ /'khor lo de ni brtags nas
su/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o/ /ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas na/ /sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos

grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di yin te/ oM b+h+'u kha~M/ khyim 'am yang na nags tshal 'am/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ /thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya/ /de nyid kyis na
bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /'di dag mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas brtan zhing nges pa'i cho ga bgos/ /
shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog /go cha la sogs bgos pa yin/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes/ /dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa yin/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa yi/ /rnam par dag pa'i dpal
mdzad mchog /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha'

la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni/

longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa/ /rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i mchog /bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o/ /

thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang / /bza' min pa yang bza' byas na/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang

ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo/ /de ltar brjod nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcug nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas rdor 'dzin slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje mchod pas
mchod nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad mchog tu gzhug /longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang / /dkon mchog gsum po la phul ba/ /'dod pas bdag dang gzhan rnams
la/ /mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni ras la
bcom ldan bri bya ste/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar/ /cho ga ci bzhin mchog tu'o/ /de yi pad 'dab cig bzhugs pa/ /de yi 'od kyis 'khor lor sten/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje
rnal 'byor che'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams logs la bri/ /dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang / /gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba/ /gsum po dkar dang lta ba ste/ /bzhi pa gser ltar dri med pa'o/ /rdo rje gtum

po'i dbang phyug grub/ /rdo rje kha T+wA~M bsgreng dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar/ /de yi logs la mtshan ma gtod/ /rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'i/ /'khor lo gtod pa de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje dril bu
ba dan ma/ /de yi logs na g.yon bsnyems ma/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yis/ /khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa/ /rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing / /sku ni zur gyi phyogs pa bzhugs/ /

de nas 'dir ni snying po ni/ /hU~M/ de nas nye ba'i snying po ni/ /rdo rje dril sogs lhan cig tu/ /rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis/ /hi yi glu dang rol mo ni/ /brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu bsgrub/ /ces bya ba ni
'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga'o/ /'khor lo der ni bstan byas nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ /cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid dang chos dang / /

dam tshig gi cho ga sbyin pa ni/ /rtag tu chags pa las byung khro/ /rdo rje me yi phung po sku/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /rab 'bar ba yi tshogs kyi sku/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams

kun tu 'bar zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o/ /de nas chos ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrub/ /nam mkha'

kun mchog sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas/ /'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang
ba'i dam tshig go/ cho ga 'di yis thams cad du/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgrubs par bya// //kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis/ /las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o zhes bya ba'o/ /de
nas ci lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dpal mchog dang po las rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o// //
de nas mchog tu phra ba dang / /shin tu bzang ba'i rdo rje yi/ /grub chen gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bshad/ /grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogs ni/ /ci lta ba bzhin rgyas
byas nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /ci bzhin du ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /yid 'ong bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ /rang gi phyag rgyas me tog gtor/ /ci lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug /g.yon pa'i kha ni
gyen du gtod/ /rdo rje drag po gzhad chen po/ /sgra sgrogs mchog gi phyag rgya yis/ /'jug ste mgon la phyag 'tshal bya/ /de la phyag ni 'di yin te/ /oM zhes bya ba brjod byas la/ /shin tu dga' ba'i

dbugs rlung gis/ /ru lu ru lu l+la~M drug ldan bar ma'i ru lu ru lu l+la~M ste/ 'di ni rdo rje drag po'i phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i mchod ces bya ba 'dir rdo rje phyag gi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang gzhan rmongs
pa dang thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /

de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas/ /me tog sil ma dor nas ni/ /rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ pad ma'i thod pa las

bya ste/ /deng yang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pas na/ /rdo rje pad ma zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar/ /kun mchog rtse mo dang bcas pa/ /mthe bo rdo rjes bkab pa

ni/ /rdo rje pad ma zhes 'grub po/ /rdo rje pad ma'i phyag rgya 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje pad ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /'dis dbang bskur ba tsam
gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu gdug pa dang drag po dang rab tu gtum pa dang ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brlag nas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum ma lus pa'i
stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu brtag pa'i bsrung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu shin tu

gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /rdo rje la sogs

thob par gzung / /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub/ /rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas/ /ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa yis/ /rdo rje

dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur/ /de la thog mar re shig rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro

bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag 'bebs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khor du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wA~M

ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges pa sbyor ba ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'bebs pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin 'tshams kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs shing 'jigs par

byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang 'bebs par nus pa'o/ /thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis
khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gdug pa dang drag po dang rab tu gtum pa dang ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / mkha'

'gro ma drag po thams cad dang gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ de dag kyang thal bar rlog par 'gyur na/ dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa

dang dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin du drag po 'di'-i man ngag gi bzlas pa ni/ sna'i dbugs phra ba nyid

kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gis grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa'i mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hU~M de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'i lha chen po

rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar re shig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang mda' stod pa'i spyan g.yon pa ste/ rdo rje spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad

pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas shing g.yo ba'i spyan gyi zur gyis gzigs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / don yod pa thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad las kyi tshogs

rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'-i rdo rje phra ma'i g.yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /

hrIHgnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste/ dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung zhig 'dzums shing / dga' ba chen po rdo rje

spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang btsum pa na dang / 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad
'joms par mdzad pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje ngag gi khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hU~M/ gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i

me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang kha T+wA~M ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang ba sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pas smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i spyan te/ rdo rje

chen po'i khro bo kI li kI la khro bo'i spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o/ /badzra zhes bya ba dang / ru lu ru lu ru lu h+ni zhes bya ba tsam gyis bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang / don yod cing thogs

pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hi/ bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa 'chi ba slong ba zhes bya ba g.yon snyems pa

g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu bskyod par mdzad pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa ste/ rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ thal lcag la sogs

dang gzhad gad dang rdeg pa dang phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'-i dril bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs thams cad la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /Sh+Ta/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing / /rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba/ /nam mkha' kun gyi gnas skabs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la rab zhugs pa/ /rdo rje mchog gi rnal

'byor gyi/ /dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'bebs/ /de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu 'god pa yin te/ zla tshes dkyil 'khor rnam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgod par
bya/ /bkod nas thams cad kun mchog gi/ dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin brlab sogs grub pa yis/ /shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ /brtag

pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje slob ma rnams gzhug bya/ /de la re shig thog ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyi byin gyi

brlobs kyis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams logs dag tu gzhag nas/ skyes pa rnams kyang gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig dang dam tshig sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o/ /

khye'u dang bu mo rnams rab tu gzhag la tshogs dang bcas pa'i rang nyid kyis zhugs te/ bsrung ba dang skyab pa dang sba ba thams cad bya'o/ /de nas 'dir slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /

mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni/ /gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub bskyed/ /slob ma me tog dor du gzhug /rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs/ /de dang
de yi lha mo 'grub/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas/ /rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /'dir mna' bsgag pa dang dbang bskur

ba ni de nyid do/ /de la 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ mi byed pa dang so sor rtogs/ /gdug pa thams cad gnon pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan/ /

mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin/ /bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ /de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin/ /de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni/ rtag tu chags

pa las byung khro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar/ /mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba mchog

gi de kho na nyid ni/ rdo rje nyi ma 'char bas byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'di/ /sprul te ma lus bdud la sogs/ /gdug pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spyod/ /ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid do/ /

de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu ni/ shin tu gdug cing drag pa dang / /bdag po drag po'i bu rnams dang / /shin tu gnyid ni log pas dag /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs/ /
zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang / rab tu grub par byed pa

dang / /thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang / /slong bar byed pa'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni/ khrag chen ga bur dang bcas pa/ /tsa dan dmar dang sbyar ba ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du rab zhugs nas/ /rdo rje dang

bcas rdo rje 'dzin/ /srin lag mthe bo rtse mo yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad sbyor mchog ldan/ /zla ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /ci

'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du/ /nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad ces brjod cing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas btab pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum

yang bza' bar bya/ /dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde/ /'di la cung zad mi 'grub med/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/ /dngos grub ma lus sgrub par 'gyur/ /don yod mchog tu grub pa dang / /gdug pa thams cad
gnon par byed/ /sdug bsngal kun 'phrog dpal dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod

pa gar dang glu/ /rol mo'i mchod pa sogs kyis mgon la mchod/ /phul ba de yis rdo rje bla ma che/ /dad pas bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya/ /myos bcas myos byed btung ba ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa

yis/ /rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar stsogs/ /ci bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang / /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang / /khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs

pa/ /bud med tshogs dang bcas pa yi/ /mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang / /ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis/ /mchod pa byas nas rab tu bsgrub ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ 'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi/ /phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa nyid/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa
ste/ /sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'o/ /gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'i/ /khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba ni/ /dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o/ /zad pa thams
cad zad 'gyur dang / /'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhing mthong bas mi snang 'gyur/ /gang nas kyang ni 'jigs med byed/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang zla/ /nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs
dkyil 'khor/ /khros nas yi ge hU~M tsam gyis/ /ma lus pa ni thal bar byed/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /mchog tu zhugs te mthong nas ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol te/ /

khyed rnams dang ni rab tu gnas/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /khyad par du ni ngan 'gro med/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing / /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams/ /ston
pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /brtag tu yang ni bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi
bya/ /dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang / /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /theg pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul ba
dag pa zhes/ /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa dang / /bdag po grogs po bu rnams kyang / /phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon spyod kyis/ /shin tu gnyid ni log tu
gzhug /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /de la phul na 'bras bu che/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin
pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /gang phyir 'di la rab tu gnas/ /dam tshig rgyal po dang
mnyam par/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /de ring khyed la dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyis ni rgyal srid che/ /stobs dpal 'khor lo
sgyur ba yin/ /rdo rje dam pa'i gsang mchog rnal 'byor ma'i/ /mchog gi dam tshig gsang ba mthong nas ni/ /bdud la sogs pa'i sha yang zos nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs sbyor thob nas khyod grub yin/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mchog tu grub pa'o// //

de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba 'gro ba 'dul ba'i cho ga ni/ ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /glog gi 'khor lo yongs 'gyur ba'i/ /

'khor ba'i rnam 'phrul gar rnams kyis/ /pad ma la sogs phyag mtshan bri/ /phyag rgya 'khor lo ltar mdzad pa/ /de yi logs ni thams cad la/ /khro gnyer ma stsogs bri bar bya/ /drag mo la sogs phyag mtshan
gzugs/ /pad ma'i lha mo pad mar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor der ni brtag byas na/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi gang gang gis/ /thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya/ /de nyid
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /'dul ba'i thabs kyis dag pa yis/ /rol pa'i gar ni mdzad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni mchog gi rdo rje ste/ /ci ltar pad ma dmar po 'di/ /
gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs kyi/ /chon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin khams gsum dag pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu'o/ /cho ga gang dang gang dag gis/ /'gro ba

rnams ni 'dul 'gyur ba/ /pad ma dag mchog rnal 'byor bdag /de dang de yis dag par bya zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig go/ de nas ci lta ba bzhin du pad ma gar gyi mchod pas mchod

la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /ras ris de ni blo gros che/ /ljang ku bai drUr+ya

ltar mtshungs/ /nam mkha'i snying po bri bar bya/ /de yi pad ma gcig la gnas/ /de yi 'od kyi 'khor lor brten/ /dbang bskur ma dang gter ma dang / /rgyal mchog mnga' bdag mchod chen po/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
dam pa de'i/ /'khor lo brtag par byas nas ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje mchog gi ni/ /nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
mthong / /nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /de nas chos kyi rin po che'i dril bu ni/ /bsam pa grub pa thams cad kyi/ /nor gyi bsam pa grub pa mchog /de
yang 'dod par rab grub phyir/ /'dod las thar pa bde ba che zhes bya ba'o/ /sbyin min rnams ni sbyin bya'o/ /'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams la/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
phyir ro/ /zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog go/ dam tshig 'di yis mchog tu ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /myur du yang dag dam pa mchog /mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par mdzod/ /de ltar gsang ba

mchog gi tshul dag ni/ /ci bzhin cho ga mchog tu rgyas pa ste/ /mchog chen de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi/ /snying po khyad par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa thams cad kyi bsgrub pa'i
cho ga'o// // de nas grub chen thams cad kyi/ /bsgrub pa'i mchog ni bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che/ /rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir/ /snod ma yin pa'i sems can ni/ /
sdig pa thams cad byed rnams la/ /mthong ba la sogs sems can don/ /sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin/ /mthong med long ba de rnams ni/ /bsod nams med stsogs rtags ldan la/ /rdo rje sems stsogs
sems dpa' mchog /mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu rnams ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems mchog gi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcing ba ste/ /dam tshig 'da' bar

dka' ba 'o/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi/ /gang phyir sku rnams brtan pa ni/ /de yi phyag rgyas grags pa ste/ /dngos grub kun phyir de dag sprul/ /gang dag bzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
la sogs mchog /mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid/ /mchog tu bsdus par gyur pa yin/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /gang phyir bsdus par 'gyur ba ste/ /rdo rje sems stsogs sems dpa'
rnams/ /nyams pas 'jigs pas grub par 'gyur/ /ci ltar rgyal po rnams kyi bka'i/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya 'da' dka' ba/ /phyag rgya gsal ba kun gyis kyang / /'da' bar nus pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas nyid

dam rdo rje 'dzin/ /de ltar bskal pa bye bas kyang / /thob par mi 'gyur myur du ni/ /ci ltar phyag rgya mchog bzung ba'o/ /ci ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni/ /de ltar dngos grub gsungs pa yin/ /de yi thabs ni phyag rgya
ste| /dngos grub thams cad mchog tu byed/ /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /'dus pa bde ba chen po rnams/ /rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis/ /byin gyis brlab pa brtan par mdzad zhes bya'o/ /de
nas 'di gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhas shing mchog tu phra ba dang / zab pa dang rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu dag pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ mi zad cing zad pa med pa/ don yod

cing thogs pa med pa/ shin tu mchog tu dga' ba ma lus pa'i bde ba chen po dang yid bde ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po mchog tu
mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje dbab pa rnams kyis rab tu sad par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod pa'i mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshon cha mchog

'di mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga rgyud phyi ma'i mchog byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa bsgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga bshad par

bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /nyin re sngon du lan cig tu/ /phyag rgya che dang snying po bzlas/ /kun gyi phyag rgya rab grub pa'i/ /bdag byin brlab pa gcig pus 'grub/ /

ces bya ba ni mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu sgrub pa'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa ni/ lan cig dam tshig gsum mchog tu/ /gsang ba dam pa'i khang par ni/ /

rdo rje la sogs thob bzung na/ /rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/ rdo rje

dril bu kun bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i skur bdag ldan/ /phyag rgya kun gyi rnal 'byor bdag /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /grub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bsdus/ /
kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po nyid byin brlabs/ /don yod rab tu bdag byin brlabs/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis thams cad du/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rang nyid bcings
nas grub par 'gyur/ /bdag byin brlabs dang don yod phyir/ /myur du 'bad med dngos grub rnams/ /las kyi tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa yis/ /dngos grub kun myur 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis cung
zad mi 'grub med/ /dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde/ /thams cad byin brlab bsgrub pa yis/ /mi 'gyur ba ni kun grub byed ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal
mchog dang po las dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o// // de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes

bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ /de la thog ma kho nar re shig don yod cher ni rnal 'byor gyi skad kyi dbyings so/ /'di yang brtson pa yin no zhes bya ba ni skad kyi dbyings kyi don to/ /gang

gir brtson pa yin zhe na/ smras pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor ro/ /slar yang gzhan ni yang dag par bsdu ba dang yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba dang yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnal

'byor brjod pa'i rnam grangs so/ /gang yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su bsgrub pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /

de la ci ltar thams cad kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na/ dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ni thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang / /'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas/ /phyag rgya dam tshig rjes

su bsgrags/ /yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi don to/ /de la rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o 'o/ /'di lta ste rdzas mang

po yang dag par sbyar bas sbyor ba zhes bya ba grub pa de bzhin du/ thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i yang dag par kun tu sbyor bas na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ro/ /

de la ci ltar na thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun bdag yang dag sbyor/ /ci lta'i dbyibs dang sku dang ldan/ /bdag nyid bdag nyid nyid la ni/ /bkod nas rjes su bsgrub par

bya zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig gi rnal 'byor thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o/ /de la rjes su bsgrub pa ni/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang 'ching ba/ /de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /

phyag rgya de dang de sbyor bya zhes bya'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rab mchog gi rjes su bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa ni/ bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /gzi brjid can ni nyid kyang yin/ /

rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /de phyir bdag nyid brtag par bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i mchog gi rjes su bsgrub

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ldan/ /phyag rgya kun bdag rnal 'byor bdag /mi 'gyur mchog tu grub par 'gyur/ /

rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor ni yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas gzhan yang slar mchog tu shin tu gsang ba mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i

khyad par mchog tu grub pa las kyang shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba'i/ /ci bzhin dbyings dang skur ldan pa/ /kun bdag phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bdag /mi 'gyur mchog
ni grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig gsal ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /rnal 'byor kun bdag grub pa ste/ /gsal zhing shin tu grub mchog yin/ /'di yis mi 'grub cung zad med/ /
dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub dang / /dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te shin tu mchog tu rab tu grub pa'o/ /

'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis/ /rnal 'byor dag ni 'di dag gis/ /rang gi bdag nyid rab mchod bya zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu gsang ba bla na
med pa theg pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gi rnal 'byor dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal
'byor thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi tshe dang

na tshod gzhon pa dang nad med pa dang gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi brjid dang stobs dang spro ba dang dngos grub mchog thams cad dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang dga' ba chen po dang shin tu bde ba dang yid bde ba

thams cad la dam pa mchog tu grub pa'o/ /ci srid ma lus shing lus pa med pa la ma lus pa'i dngos grub chen po dam pa thams cad gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la stsogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las

kyi tshogs mchog tu grub pa ste rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig gis rab tu grub pa yin no/ /de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod pa phyag rgya la rag lus/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor la gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor khyad par

gyi bsgrub bya/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig gis sgrub byed/ /sems ni stong pa sgyu mar mtshungs/ /lus dang bral bar ma grub ste/ /lus de yang ni gartsig pa 'dra/ /bya ba med cing sems dang bral/ /lus kyang sems dang

bral ba ste/ /sems kyang lus dang bral ba ni/ /grub pa ma yin de bzhin 'di/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor cho gar brjod/ /ci ltar lus ni sems kyis dang / /sems kyang lus kyis grub 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin phyag rgya rnal

'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig bsgrub pas so/ /de ltar dam tshig rnal 'byor dag /phan tshun du ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /phan tshun ni yang rtag bdag nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs par grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni

shin tu mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ci ltar phyag rgya thams cad dang rnal 'byor dag rjes su bsgrub pa yin zhe na/ phyag rgya sku ni brtan pa'i
phyir/ /de yang bde bas brtan par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /de ni rnal 'byor sems las byung / /yid bde ba yis rab tu sgrub/ /yi mi bde bas g.yo ba
'am/ /yang na 'gog pa thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor rjes grub byed/ /dka' thub med cing nges pa med/ /bde ba dga' bas bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bya ba shin tu
mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa'i bde ba gang yin zhe na/ 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /ci 'dod par ni
bsten pa yis/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya zhes bya ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po'i yang chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde ba zhes bya ba'o/ /de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa gang
