grub/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ci ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na/ ci ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang / /

ci ltar dgod pa 'gro ba dang / /'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang / /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul/ /de nas rnam par shes pa ni/ /rdo rje sems stsogs lha rnams kyi/ /'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis/ /

rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang

lhor| thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing / /sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan/ /der bdag po'i don shes pa ni

rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /

de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /pad ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa/ /thams cad dag pa bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nyid/ /de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi de kho na

nyid ni/ rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir/ /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus shes bya'o/ /de la ci ltar na nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe
na| thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang / /de nas nor bu rigs kyi ni/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni/ /rdo rje rgyal
mtshan mchod pa che/ /nor bu chen po'i rig grub pa/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la/ /spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan

gyi de kho na nyid do/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid

shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid/ /sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos/ /nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de
kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ci ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /rtogs pa thams cad gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas/ /bkug ste de
nas rjes bsgrub pa/ /dril bu nyid kyis bya ba yin/ /ci ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni/ /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul

bas| mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod/ /de la ci ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis
legs byin brlabs/ /dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis/ /rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag

nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bdag ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /de ci ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang / /rtog pa kun las

bsgrub bya gang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas thams cad rjes su bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sad cing / /rtog pa

thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas/ /mchog dang las sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la ci ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni/ /phyi nas ci ltar 'dod pa yis/ /

ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing / /thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /gang dang de ru 'chag pa 'am/ /dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am/ /gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no/ /dbang po

gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis na/ /thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas
kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni sdig kun dang bral bas/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /

zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol/ /rdo rje mchog
'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ /bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga /

de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni/ /rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so/ /bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o/ /bde chen mchog gi
mchog dang rjes su chags pa che/ /kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni/ /kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug 'di ni gso ba yin/ /mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ /
mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol/ /de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min/ /sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung

la dga'/ /dad pa med cing bslu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa/ /rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o/ /gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu

bsgrub pa 'am/ /yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed/ /so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /rdo rje 'chang stsogs sku ni gang
gis sgrub byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ci bzhin gsungs/ /des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gdon

mi nus/ /gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /ci ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed/ /rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hU~M las bris nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par
'gyur/ /rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs bar mdzad pa ni/ /gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min/ /'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin/ /rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing

byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur/ /brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin/ /rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub

par byed/ /dngos grub chen po la thams cad rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po snying po bsgrub

byed pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad/ /de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba 'ang thob/ /de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin/ /de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs/ /dam pa chos kyi bdag

nyid legs so legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlabs pa/ /rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che/ /ci ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du/ /phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar ngag chen
gsungs nas ni/ /sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi/ /gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad/ /dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs

s+ho// //thugs dam sa'i snying po tho lding du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN Di ta mkhas pa chen po man tra kA la sha dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo ts+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yis/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la/ /bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/ /bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas
bsgyur// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te Shan ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la btugs nas zhus dag/ //
lan gnyis zhus/ gsum zhus byas// //@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsA sha ti kA/ bod skad du/
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnams pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshogs
kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/

rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na/ nor bu

rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shis pa thams cad bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'
mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig ste/ yongs su
bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/
don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang

chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba

rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de mi 'di

lta ste| byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snyems

pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas

de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag

pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi

rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub

pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen

po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang /

kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa der tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga'
ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag
na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa mtha' dag
na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas

g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis

'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par

byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs

par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// //lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon

par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par
'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa don gnas 'di
nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po rab tu 'di smras so/ /a/ de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis

zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams

cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang
klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya

bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smyin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lta la pad ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba btsigs nas/ rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i

snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes
bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas
'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /shes pa thams cad rnam par

dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de
'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/
myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don
gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad ma gzugs
sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur

ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor sbyin pa ni re ba
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba
thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /trA~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos
thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// // // // //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag

rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin la thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa na lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos

grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum
tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin

pas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /aH de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams

cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge skor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /
mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams
cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so/ /a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor
lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi
mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dba' sems dba' chen po'i
'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo
thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing 'dzum dmul nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo
bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod
kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /
sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang /
mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu
'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la 'dul nus pa yang ye shes
kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro
ba mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do/ /sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do/ /sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba

rdo rje nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab

tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad
kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
mnyam pa nyid do/ /thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/ /thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/ /thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po thams
cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/ /thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no/ /
gang thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no/ /sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can

no| de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /drI/ de nas ma mo

thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshig 'thun par thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /b+h+yoH/
de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'thun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /swA/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la
phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang chos 'di mthar

thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis rlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad

zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir
lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs so legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par
smras/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med/ /gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ /bdud la sogs pa thams
cad kyis/ /de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /
de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/ /kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje don yod pa'i
chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags
chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po dngos grub
dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos
grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms
pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i
dngos grub dam pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang /
mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems
can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / /ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par

'gyur/ /chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni/ /'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang / /'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir/ /'khor ba'i srid du bdag nyid 'dul/ /ji ltar pad ma rab dmar yang / /tshos kyi nyes pas mi gos
pa| de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam par dag /bde ba che zhing nor che la/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/ /sems can

don rnams brtan par byed/ /lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang /

'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang
ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/ /oM byang chub kyi sems
rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen
po/ oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems hU~M phaT/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam
par dag pa/ oM de bzhin las rnam par sbyong ba/ hU~M oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can/ / phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM spong ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hU~M`/ thams cad 'dul
ba oM hrIH/ a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a ba~M hU~M a oM/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aH /oM a/ sdig pa'i bcings pa thams cad chom shig /ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar gyis shig /
oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/ hU~M traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs
par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am/ yi ger
bri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir gzhug pa 'am/ bklag pa 'am/ 'chang ba'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ sti stang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta

ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ba brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / sti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod
pa ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur
ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /

de la bdud sdig can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /ya nga ba ma

spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o/ /de ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta gu h+ya a la~M kA ra byU ho tan tra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi
bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam

tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che chen po'i cod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes

pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las

sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyis mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dpe med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rigs dang /

snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig pa gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i lha'i snying po mdzes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po

la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen

mo dang / nam mkha'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / a bo dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes

bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgya la'ang 'di lta ste/

mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim pa'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras shes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen du blta ba'i bzhin ras

zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brda sprod pa me zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / rol ba dang ldan

pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo
dang / brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ /gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i
rdo rje pho nya mo chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i

rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / thams cad 'phrog par zhes bya ba'i
rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bes pa zhes bya
ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / thog ma pa
zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo
rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
bran mo chen mo dang / gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / bskal par gnas
pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o/ /gzhan yang dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
rol pa chen mo dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /
gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen po dang / mkha' 'gro

yi rdo rje dbang phyug dang / dri yi dbang phyug dang / stug po bkod pa dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / 'dun pa srel dang / skye bo yongs su dor ba dang / legs par sbyangs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / gdung ba skyed pa dang / 'dul bar

byed pa dang / gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang / gnas pa po dang / brtse ba can dang / chos 'chang dang / skyong pa po dang / sbo ba po dang / 'ching ba po dang / skor ba po dang / de dag la sogs

pa rdo rje yab rnams so/ /gzhan yang mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran pho rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang / rdo rje

chu dang / gzhan yang rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang / rgyas par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen
po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi
dkyil 'khor spros/ /bcom ldan rdor 'dzin legs par gzhugs/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa thob
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par
bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ sangs rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud/ /chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud/ /chos rnams kun mchog
khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog khyod 'dud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /grags pa chen po bdag cag ni/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig /'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur

zhing rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/ mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug

bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /brjed ngas pa rnams dang / blo gros chung

ba rnams dang / khyi dang bya rog dang byi la dang phag dang stag dang glang po che dang seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dang 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i
yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag yid
dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems
can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu
bzang po chen po 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam pa
'di bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur pa/ /stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad/ /ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /sems can rnams la phan gzhed
pa/ /gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya/ /de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /des na sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa
yi/ /thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis/ /dben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni/ /yid kyi legs par 'du byas pa/ /nam
mkha' la ni thig gis gdab/ /thog mar de yis dam pas so/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig /gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mu khyud dag gi rnam mdun du/ /kun nas yongs su bskor
bar bya/ /dbus kyi cha ru dkyil 'khor ni/ /'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad ma ze 'bru ldan pa
bri/ /mtshams dang mtshams su 'dab ma ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas/ /srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /srad bu bzhi yis nye bar spras/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta babs seng ge

dag gis rgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /bla res steng du bres pa dang / /rin chen rdo rjes pad ldan sngon/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab/ /bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /rgyan phreng glang po

ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol gnas te legs par bris/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su ni/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya/ /mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis/ /sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya/ /de nas

lha mo zhal bzhi ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs ma/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /bzhi pa'i g.yas par rdo rje ste/ /g.yon pa pad mas rnam par brgyan/ /dkar dang dmar po cher

sngo ba/ /sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od/ /gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che/ /gtsug rgyan cod pan dam pa can/ /skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /gos kyis stod ni legs
bsgribs pa/ /bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing / /sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa/ /dbu ma'i zhal ras gser gyi 'od/ /zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste/ /mdun na rin chen bdun gnas

pa/ /pad ma mchog ldan seng ge'i khri/ /zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba/ /rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya/ /'di yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /dpa' bo

mtha' yas pa yi zhal/ /stong phrag du ma'i phyag ldan ma/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gis rdo rje pad ma 'chang / /sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag gzhan
dkrigs/ /gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can/ /dbu rgyan pad ma'i bzhin ras ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /dpa' bo des ni bri bar
bya/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te/ /der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya/ /dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba/ /gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la/ /mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang / /rin chen khri la
legs par bzhugs/ /bzhin ras sngo la spyan dkar ba/ /'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og pag can/ /mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog /rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can/ /sbyin pa'i
pha rol phyin dgongs ma/ /de nas blo ldan rab song ste/ /nub tu yang ni de bzhin du/ /dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri/ /chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma/ /dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma/ /gtsug na
cod pan gyis spras ma/ /sbrul rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma/ /dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma/ /pad ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /

nyi ma du ma'i snang ba can/ /ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas byang du phyin nas su/ /song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma/ /mar gad 'bar ba mtshungs pa mo/ /dkar po'i dar gyis yang

dag klubs/ /gtsug na nor bu cod pan bzang / /gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /'od kyis gtams

pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas mtshams kyi 'dab ma la/ /me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma/ /rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i/ /mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bris/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg /rang gi bdag po'i
phyogs su'o/ /'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du/ /bzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen mo/ /gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po/ /sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya/ /pad ma las skyes 'dab ma la/ /thams cad du ni
'grub pa bri/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /sgo skyong ba yi rnaM bzhi dang / /phyi rol tu yang lha la sogs/ /ming ni yang dag bri bar bya/ /de nas khrus byas la byugs lus/ /me tog bdug sogs
kyis bdugs te/ /sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la/ /me tog phreng dang gos kyis rgyan/ /gtsug phud cod pan dang ldan zhing / /mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/ /rdo rje dril bu lag par ldan/ /sbyor ba
bzang po'i rnam gzhig gis/ /de nas thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje ma mo dka' thub che/ /bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing / /
lan gsum du ni g.yas bskor bas/ /rdo rje ma ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byon/ /glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis/ /dregs pa yis ni
g.yas dang g.yon/ /'gying ba rang gi gdud pa bya/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po/ /ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang / /bde gshegs dam

pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i skyed pa po/ /pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags/ /zhes so/ /de nas de dag rang nyid kyis/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul byas byon/ /mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams/ /dkyil 'khor
dag tu blta bar bya/ /rang ngam gzhan la 'bab sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba ni/ /de tshe nges par ma mo ni/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs pa byon/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji

bzhin rab brtags te/ /de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la bri bar bya/ /gal te de ni mi smra ba na hU~M gi yi ge dang / /ldan pa'i glu dbyangs can gyis yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya'o/ /de nas shes rab
ldan ma gzhug /slob ma'i gtso bo thal sbyar te/ /mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs la/ /rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'/ /ma mo thams cad la dmigs te/ /des ni me tog dor bar bya/ /me tog gang

la lhung gyur pa/ /ma mo de ni de yis 'grub/ /de nas go rim ji bzhin du/ /sgo skyong ba nas brtsams nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar/ /slob ma la ni bshad par bya/ /dam tshig thob par gyur nas su/ /
sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya/ /ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya/ /gzhan du slob dpon blo ngan ni/ /nges par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /des kyang yang dag de 'grub

cing / /myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa 'am/ /rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis/ /gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni/ /'chi ba ru yang 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na/ /

rtag tu dmyal ba nyid tu ni/ /rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro/ /mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no/ /des na bu kye dam tshig ni/ /khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos/ /ma mo kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /theg pa chen po'i cho gas gnas/ /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ /rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis/ /rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya/ /thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /

chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /de 'dra'i dam tshig yang dag pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /lan gsum du ni bskor nas kyang / /

spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i/ /dbang bskur

ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru/ /dri yi chus ni yongs bkang la/ /dar dang ras sogs kyis g.yogs te/ /me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas/ /rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i/ /gcig lhag bcu

drug bzang po la/ /ma mo'i snying po nyid kyis ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro/ /slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis/ /thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang / /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos

btud nas/ /bdag ni che ge mo rdo rje/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa'o/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung

ba/ /dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /des ni bdag gi sems can rnams/ /don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis don bgyid pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod kyi drin/ /

de nas dbang bskur sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /slob mas ye shes rdo rje yi/ /go 'phang la ni bzhag nas su/ /bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni/ /yang na bcu drug dag gam ni/ /lnga'am yang na
bcu yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad ma bri bar bya/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /ge sar lte ba ldan par bri/ /de yi dbus su

rdo rje bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer phreng / /de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor/ /lho yi phyogs su rin po che/ /nub du pad ma nyid yin te/ /byang du ral gri chen po'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'od

zer can/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim pa/ /'od ldan pa ni skal ba che/ /sgo dang sgo ru bzhi nyid do/ /phyi rol du yang mi 'chi kun/ /gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa/ /bde byed gcer bu'i

cha lugs te/ /ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa bzhag /chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod de/ /de ring khyod ni rigs su skyes/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /rtag

pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal/ /dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje pad ma lag byin te/ /gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin/ /bu yis bya ba chen po gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas/ /

der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas su/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /'di ni mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos ci 'byor pas/ /de nas

yon ni phul byas nas/ /slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la 'dud/ /ma dang chung ma bu mo dang / /sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid dang / /rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta/ /glang

po rta dang ba glang sogs/ /ma he dang ni ma he mo/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa/ /bla ma la ni chen pos dbul/ /bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog /thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la/ /rgyan phreng rnams
dang bzhad gad dang / /sgeg dang rtse 'jo dga' ba dang / /rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang / /bza' btung bca' ba la sogs pa'i/ /rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis/ /mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /

sems can kun gyi don dang ni/ /bdag gi yang ni ched cher mdzad/ /bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der/ /ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab ldan pas yon phul te/ /slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis/ /

gar byas lag pa mgor bzhag ste/ /rim gyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya/ /de nas bzang mo rnams mnyes te/ /thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog / bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang / /rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

gsang ba'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba 'dus pa las byung ba rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so/ /shes rab ye shes mchog sgrub pa'i/ /sems dpa'

chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa/ /rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog /dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba/ /rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol/ /

thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can/ /sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / /'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che/ /dpa'

bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /las kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che/ /sems can rnams kyi yab chen po/ /sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya bas

so/ /de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas/ /gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i/ /zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal/ /'di na sgrub po gang yang med/ /dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs

kyang / /thams cad rnam par rtog las byung / /rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin/ /bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med/ /chos rnams med cing chos nyid med/ /sbyor ba med cing sems can med/ /de bzhin pha dang ma

yang med/ /byed pa med cing skyong ba med/ /'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min/ /longs spyod med cing za po med/ /shes med shes pa po yang med/ /rnam shes med cing shes bya med/ /rdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa/ /des na snang ba

thams cad ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung / /de ltar chos rnams rnam rig pa/ /grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na/ /mkhas pa

gang zhig dad gyur na/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs/ /thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i rgyan la legs bzhugs nas/ /sems

can rnams la bstan pa po/ /de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te/ /rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus/ /grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba/ /mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du ma nyams pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab

pa yi/ /phyogs kun du ni rab 'phro ba'o/ /de yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /de yi steng du sa chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa/ /de yi steng du chur shes bya/ /zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra/ /sngags pas cho ga

bzhin du bsam/ /rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang / /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /dpag tshad kyi ni tshad tsam pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /ri bo chen po cog brgyad pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog /de yi steng du rdo

rje che/ /kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom/ /sngo bsangs ma rgad ta 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam/ /dkar po shel dang 'dra ba'o/ /'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras/ /de

yi steng du rin po che/ /chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng / /phyogs bcu nam mkha' khyab pa'o/ /de yi gtsug tu pad ma che/ /nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog /lo ma stong phrag du ma can/ /lte ba dang ni

ze 'brus dkris/ /de yi mdun du nyi ma che/ /'od zer stong phrag du ma can/ /de yi steng du zla ba che/ /dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi/ /gzi brjid dkar po 'phro ba'o/ /de yi dbus su ma mo

bri/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dra ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phro ba mo/ /phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba/ /bsam gtan spyan ldan bsam gtan yid/ /bsam gtan mchog

gi phyag rgya yi/ /ser mo gzhon nu rab bzhag pa/ /dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo/ /dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs cod pan bzang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa/ /ye shes gdan la

mnyam par bzhugs/ /ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas/ /rgyal ba rab tu khros pa ste/ /byang chub pha rol son par mdzad/ /de yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa/ /yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs/ /

thams cad du ni legs 'phro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa/ /rab tu thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rig sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni/ /chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni

gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so/ /sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par/ /bcu drug po yang gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya/ /

lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min dmyal las byung / /'di rnams thams cad lhun po la/ /kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug /dri dang me tog yang dag ldan/ /gos dkar
'dzin pa dpal dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas/ /bdag dag pas ni dag par bya/ /shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas/ /

sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la/ /glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya/ /thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum/ /rang gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon/ /spyon cig spyon cig lha dang
srin por bcas mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba/ /spyon cig spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen/ /chos kyi yi ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes

bskos pa/ /mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam bca' dran par mdzod/ /ma mo rnams ni mchog gi glus bskul byon par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gi me tog gi snyim pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /oM
bdagi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di/ /ci bde ba yang bzhes su gsol/ /de nas de dang lhan cig tu/ /'dres pa ru ni gyur par bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M sa ma ya / de nas

'di yis brtan par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa la sa ma ye ma tsa la twa~M/ de nas 'dis mnyes par bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma na san tu sti sa ma ye hU~M/ e h+ye hi dzaH e h+ye hi dzaH/ de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo

mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/ oM sarba a~M ga pun d+ha re ma hA b+ha ga bAn sa le sma ra sma ra s+pha ra s+pha ra sarba a~M ga a bA yu biSh+Nu ma hA bud d+ha sa mu drA na hU~M hU~M a~M/ 'di yis ma mo bskul nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od

po che/ /dkyil 'khor nga la spro bar bya/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bsngags te me tog dor bar bya/ /oM sarba a~M ga puN+Da rI ka pra tIts+tsha d+hA~M ku su ma aM dza lim hU~M aH de nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin

du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad pa ltar legs par byin gyis brlabs la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan

pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas me tog la sogs dang / /bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis/ /mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin/ /slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rim

pa yi/ /sbyor ba yis ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin pad/ /las kyi rdo rje de bzhin no/ /zhags pa lcags kyu dril bu dang / /lcags sgrog rnga yab dang ni gdugs/ /ral gri mig sman thur ma gnyis/ /rgyal

po'i nye bar spyod pa dang / /de la rgyan rnams bstan nas su/ /dkyil 'khor der ni dbang bskur ro/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyi dbang bskur ba/ /las kun byed par rab tu bshad/ /dam tshig gam ni sdom pa yang / /rang gi
slob ma nyan du gzhug /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /dbang dang drag shul spyod pa ni/ /legs par rnam par dag sems kyis/ /ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang / /sbyor ba
'di yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos slar yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /ji lta'i gzugs kyi snod byas la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su gzhag /zho dang mar gsar 'o ma ni/ /tsan dan dmar po dang bsres te/ /ga pur dang ni ldan byas la/ /yid la byed pas bzlas te

bsgrub/ /zla ba nyi ma gzas bzung tshe/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag bya/ /thog mar me ni sbar byas nas/ /'bad pa yis ni rlung gis bus/ /gser gyi snod du bsdu bar bya/ /ba ru na yi khu bas sbyar/ /
nyi ma dang ni zla ba la/ /slar yang rdzas de bskam par bya/ /de nas de ru lha mo yi/ /khrag dang sa bon blugs par bya/ /de yis myur du rdzas dag ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /grub nas thog
mar lha mo la/ /cung zad tsam zhig dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon la/ /skal ba nyis 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /de nas grub pa gzhan rnams dang / /rang gi slob mar skal ba sbyin/ /de nas byin
brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zas kyi sa bon dang ni bza'/ /skad cig de la gzugs brjes te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur/ /gang
dang gang gi gzugs rnams su/ /bsgrub 'dod pa yi sngags pa yis/ /de dang de yi bsam gtan gyis/ /blo gros brtan pas bza' bar bya/ /de dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /gdon mi za bar brje bar
'gyur/ /gzhan pa yi ni rdzas dag kyang / /'di nyid kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mig sman gyis ni mig byugs pas/ /khor yug tu ni mi snang 'gro/ /snying la ldong ros kyis byugs na/ /yid kyi
spyod yul nyid du 'gro/ /ba bla yis ni lus byugs na/ /mkha' la nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mig sman nag po blangs nas su/ /nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya/ /de yi bshang ba'i mar khu las/ /dud
pa mkhas pas bsgrub par bya/ /de yis mig la byugs na ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs shing / /stobs ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i mtshon/ /nyid 'gyur rga dang 'chi ba med/ /mig sman dang ni ba lang
mar/ /ma he dang ni ra nyid dang / /mi yi mig sman nyid dag ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su/ /sngags pas bzung ste btso bar bya/ /mig sman chen po mchog tu bzang / /'di yis mig la byugs na ni/ /
grub pa yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /mi snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis/ /blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen po/ /nges par thob 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rdzas kyi gnas skabs le'u
'di/ /mtshungs med chen po nyer bshad do/ /gos dang gdugs sogs ral gri dang / /mtshon cha dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying po snying gar byas nas ni/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' rgyal po ches/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhin ras mchog /de yi zhal du byas nas su/ /de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /mnga' bdag gang gis dbang phyug ltar/ /skad cig de la de 'gyur ro/ /de nyid

kyi ni spyi bo'i char/ /mchog gi dam pa bsam gtan bya/ /skad cig de la mchod pa che'i/ /sangs rgyas su ni de 'gyur ro/ /de yi spyi gtsug nyid du ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de ni kun gyi rgyal

dbang po/ /las kun byed pa'i don 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying gar bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su snying po blta/ /de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub/ /rin chen chen po che
brgyad pa/ /snying ga ru ni mkhas pas bsgom/ /der ni snying po bsam pa yis/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /yid la bsgoms pas skad cig la/ /pad ma che ldan mnga'
bdag gi/ /pad ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mchog dang dman pa 'bring po yi/ /dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying gar zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor bsam/ /yi ge dam pa bsgom par bya/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /thams cad bdag tu bsgom par bya/ /de las langs te bdag zhi bas/ /zla 'od kha ba ltar bsil ba'i/ /
'od zer sprin gyis cher gtams pas/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bzhag par bya/ /skad cig de la gdug pa dang / /gza' dang dug sogs rab 'phrog cing / /nyi ma gcig gam bdun nam ni/ /bsgrub bya zhing 'gyur
gzhan du min/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /snying po'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer ser po'i phreng mdzes pa/ /bsgoms pas de ni rgyas par byed/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
par/ /mnyam par gzhag pas lha mo bsam/ /dmar po'i rang bzhin 'bar dag pa/ /bsgrub bya'i sems la 'phro bar bya/ /slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /'khor lo sgyur ba

lta bu yang / /de ni ci nas dbang du 'gro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su yi ge ni/ /ma rgad 'od 'dra bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sprin gyis yang dag
'khrugs/ /mkhas pa yis ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya la ni snying po'i 'od/ /bstims pa'i skad cig de la 'bab/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar byed cing / /phyag rgya sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor dang / /rdo rje

rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgyas thams cad ston par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma 'ongs ci 'dod pa/ /lce brkyang bas ni smra bar byed/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge/ rdo rje'i ngag gis smra bar 'gyur/ /yang na

legs par sbyar ba'am/ /grong gi'am tha mal skad dag gis/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge/ 'tsho ba 'am ni 'chi ba dang / /nyams dang mi nyams rang bzhin gyi/ /de dag thams cad de yis smra/ /de las gzhan du

de mi smra/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /dbang bdag rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /khros te lce rtser bsgoms nas su/ /lha mo yi ni snying po'i mchog /lcags kyu'i rnam pa spros nas su/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag

rgya'i lan/ /rlung la bzhag ste skad cig la/ /khrag rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /char rgyun 'bab pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi kha ru dbab par bya/ /de ni 'thungs pas sngags shes te/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje

'dzin par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun tu spyod dpal ldan/ /nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur 'gyur/ /'di nyid kyi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /'o ma zho dang mar bzang po/ /mar khu chu dang me tog kun/ /rlung gis dgug pa nyid

du bya/ /zhags pas mgrin pa bcings byas te/ /lcags kyu yis ni snying ga nas/ /rlung gis kun nas bteg nas su/ /lha mo de bzhin gnod sbyin mo/ /mi mo de bzhin lha min mo/ /brgyad brgya kho na bzlas pa yis/ /

bud med tshul du dgug par bya/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed ming spel nas/ /ka ba rtsig pa de bzhin khyim/ /dril bu rnams dang bum rnams la'ang / /lha mo yi ni snying po yi/ /brgya bzlas pas ni 'bebs par 'gyur/ /shes

rab pha rol phyin ma mchog /khro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gsal byed kyis ni gsal byas pas/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad bya/ /dur khrod ro ni ma nyams pa/ /mar ngo'i brgyad la bsdus nas su/ /byang du phyogs

te gzhag par bya/ /de yi khar ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /gsang sngags legs par bzlas nas su/ /rdzas kyi dam pa ci rigs pa/ /ba bla mig sman rdo chu dang / /ldong ros dang yang yang na btsag /dkar rtsi sol ba nyid dang ni/ /

gur gum dang ni rgya spos sam/ /ru rta shu dag ga phur dang / /tsan dan de bzhin a ka ru/ /sha dang khrag ni nyid dang yang / /de bzhin sor mo'i gdub bu ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas bzhag nas kyang / /de yi steng du bsdad la

bzla/ /nyi ma shar nas de blangs pas/ /grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dman pas dngos grub dman pa ste/ /rab kyis rab tu rnam par bstan/ /bar mas bar mar shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med na dbang du byed ces so/ /

skyes bu dag ni thams cad dang / /bud med dag ni thams cad la/ /reg pa tsam gyis dbang byed cing / /mig la byugs pa yis kyang ngo / /tsan dan gyis ni yongs byugs te/ /gur gum gyis ni thig le'o/ /la gu yis ni bdug

par bya/ /dkar rtsi sol ba btsag gis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i ming dang ni/ /yongs su spel te bris pa yis/ /dbang ma song ba dbang 'gro ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no/ /khams kyis ming ni bris pa na/ /dbang du

byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed/ /dkar rtsi yis ni dug 'joms so/ /li khris skad cig de nyid la/ /smyo bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ru rta a ga rus bdug pas/ /dbang du byed pa'i
mchog yin no/ /sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed/ /gnod sbyin mo ni nges par 'gugs/ /sha dang khrag gi bdug pa yis/ /srin mo 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /tsan dan sih+la'i bdug pa yis/ /lha ni
'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /ga pur tsan dan bdug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /ga pur gang gis zos pa yis/ /gzhan du'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /rig pa chen mo yi ge
bzhi/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khrugs pa dang ni spel ba'i dus/ /nges par shi ba bsgrub par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gang bsgo ba'i/ /bka' lung de yis myur du byed/ /phrag par khur de

bran mo des/ /lhun po'i steng du skyel bar 'gyur/ /grub pa yi ni mchog rab kyi/ /rdzas ni blangs nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gtum po yi dgas nyi ma yi/ /rgyal gyi mtshan mo sol ba bzung / /gtum mo'i me tog khu
ba yis/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos brtags nas su/ /pad ma'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /de nyid mtshan mo gcig gam gsum/ /de las blangs te sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni mar zhu bya/ /de nas lha 'am

grub pa'am/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang bsngags pa 'am/ /rig sngags grub pa'i grib ma 'am/ /gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /'gro dang mi 'gro'i skye bo rnams/ /dbang ma grub pa 'ang dbang du byed/ /rang gi

khrag gis ming bris la/ /de nyid kyi ni phye las dgang / /ji srid bskams par ma gyur par/ /de srid mi de 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gis lha dag gi/ rim pa 'di yis ming bris te/ /khro bo ldan pas bzlas
par bya/ /de 'dis skad cig de la 'grub/ /de yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / /ngang gis de ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/ /gsad pa'i don du sngags rig pas/ /'bar ba'i
phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /zhal bzhi pa la cher 'jigs pa/ /zhags pa lcags kyu thod pa can/ /bdag nyid myur du bsam par bya/ /gsang sngags dang ni spel ba yis/ /ming ni sol bas bris nas
su/ /gdug pa de ni mnan nas kyang / /rang gi gdug pa'i sems kyis bsnun/ /'di nyid kyi ni ting 'dzin gyis/ /nges pa ru 'ang nges par byed/ /khams kyi sa bon dang spel ba'i/ /khams kyis ming ni bris
nas su/ /khams de yang dag mnan nas ni/ /khang pa ru ni rgyun du bzhag /de ni myur du nges 'gyur te/ /de srid du ni mi g.yor gnas/ /rma bya'i sgro 'am gtsug phud kyis/ /yongs su blangs la
bsgrub par bya/ /rma bya zhes bya'i rtsa ba yi/ /mkhas pa yis ni yongs su gzung / /dmag la sngags rig pas bskor bas/ /de nas dmag dpung 'jig pa dang / /rmongs pa 'am ni rengs pa 'am/ /skad cig de
la 'khor bar 'gyur/ /khyi dang phag dang bya rog gi/ mig ni yongs su blangs nas su/ /mig sman dang ni mnyam por bya/ /lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis/ /sgrub pa po yi gzugs rnams kun/ /
'jig par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tsaN Di'i me tog bcud nyid kyis/ /lcags kyis g.yogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi kha ru nges bcug pas/ /rga shi med par rnam par rgyu/ /rims gtong gzugs ni
legs bris te/ /de yi kha ru gnod byed ni/ /sbyor ba yis ni bcug nas su/ /yongs su mnan la shin tu bzlas/ /rims gtong de yi gzugs kyis ni/ /rab tu 'dzin par gdon mi za/ /gza' 'am yang dag

yi dgas sam/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /gzhan pa yi ni nad rnams kyis/ /'dzin pa la ni spyad mi dgos/ /gshin rje bris te bskrad par bya/ /de yi zhal du dgra bo ste/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid mi 'gro na/ /

de ni myur du nges par 'chi/ /gsad pa la yang 'di nyid kyis/ /yongs su mnan nas nges par bzla/ /gang du gter ni yod snyam gyur/ /der ni sngags rig pas song ste/ /lce yongs bzung la bzlas pa bya/ /de yis

gsal po'i tshig gis smra/ /tshad dang yod dang med pa dang / /bgegs dang bgegs ni ji ltar gnas/ /ji srid de ni dgyes smra na/ /de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /gal te bgegs ni mi smra na/ /der ni mchod yon rab tu btag+sa/ /

pus mo gnyis btsugs bkus pa yis/ /nor 'dzin sangs rgyas yum las so/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu phur bus gdab/ /de nas gnas rnams bskrad par bya/ /de nas mtshams ni bcings bar bya/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bskor bar bya/ /sbyor ba

shes pas sngags 'di yis/ /de nas rdzas ni gdon par bya/ /oM ba su b+he sarba ar+tha sA d+ha yA yu d+ha ra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarbAr+tha ni tsa yaM traM traM tsa tsa Ta Ta ha ha swA hA/ yang na rig pa 'di yis kyang / /las rnams dag ni thams cad bya/ /phyogs bcing

ba dag de bzhin bsrung / /phur bu bskrad pa de bzhin no/ /rin chen gsum ni thog mar sbyin/ /cha gcig dag ni nor 'dzin la'o/ /sdug bsngal can la cha gcig go/ /grogs po rnams la de dang mtshungs/ /lhag ma rnams ni rigs
pas dpyad/ /dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod bya/ /gzhan du sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal po chom rkun sogs 'jigs las/ /gal te bla ma der bzhugs na/ /skal ba bzang po gnyis dbul lo/ /gzhan pa

yi ni spyan rnams la/ /rdo rje theg pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i/ /skal ba re ni sbyin par bya/ /gzhan du dam tshig gdung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rjes gsungs/ /de nas
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yum rnams kyis ni der btud nas/ /dpa' bo che la zhu ba zhus/ /rgyas pa yi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /yum rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /
rgyal po'i dbang phyug rab gsol ba/ /sems can thams cad 'dir 'byung ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngar gsungs pa/ /'on kyang seng ge'i khri dang ldan/ /de yi steng du pad ma che/ /der ni
ri bong can dkyil 'khor/ /de yi steng du nyi ma che/ /nyi ma der ni dkyil 'khor mchog /cha brgyad pa la dbus rin chen/ /de yi steng du rgyal ba'i yum/ /ser dang sngo ba'i
'od chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pas/ /phyag nyid kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /g.yas pa yis ni mchog sbyin pa/ /g.yon gyis rin chen lan bu mchod/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
brgyan/ /gos ni 'phyang zhing sna tshogs pa/ /gsug tor mu tig thor tshugs can/ /de yi mdun du rin chen bri/ /g.yon du bum pa bzang po bzhag /g.yas pa ru ni dpag bsam shing / /rgyab tu
rin chen lan bu'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni bum pa brgyad/ /gser gyi rang bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rin chen lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /dri lnga dag dang yang dag ldan/ /bza' la sogs pa'i
ros gang ba'i/ /bum pa bcu drug phyi rol tu/ /ser po'i gos kyis yongs su dkris/ /me tog ser po sogs kyis brgyan/ /de mdun blo ldan bri bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge ma/ /dmar dang ser dang

ches dkar ba/ /rin chen ldan pa'i phyag sbyin pa/ /ser po'i 'od ldan phreng mdzes ma/ /rin chen bzang po kun gyi sras/ /mkha' yi nyi zla skar ma yis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /gtsug phud cod pan gos la sogs/ /phreng ba dang ldan

dgyes pa mo/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lhor bri ba/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge ma/ /cung zad ser ba'i rin chen lus/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs gos ni yongs su gyon/ /mdzes shing phreng ba'i chun po'i gtsug /gos ldan gtsug na gtsug tor mchog /yid bzhin rin

chen dam pa'i phyag /g.yon pa'i skyil krung rin chen bzang / /cho ga ji bzhin rab tu bsam/ /rgyab tu bzod pa ma zhes bya/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing ser mdzes ma/ /dmar po'i gos ni legs par gyon/ /rin po che

yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thams cad rin chen mchog 'dri zhing / /dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba ma/ /gtsug na rin chen mchog dang ldan/ /seng ge mchog gi khri la bzhugs/ /byang du brtson 'grus chen mo ni/ /rdo rje go

chas brgyan pa la/ /dpa' mo rin chen dbyug gu'i phyag /g.yas pa sbyin pa'i pha rol song / /pri yang ku la sngo bsangs dkar/ /rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /lhag ma rnams ni gzhag bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor

byas te rin chen ldan/ /sgo dang sgo ru sgo ba ma/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de nas phyi yi phyi nyid du/ /rin chen snyim pa'i lag pa mchog /phyogs skyong ba ni thams cad ni/ /go rims bzhin du gzhag

par bya/ /de yi phyi rol thams cad du/ /mkhas pas klu dang gnod sbyin bri/ /rin chen bum pa bzang po dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lag /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /lha bshos rab tu bzang

dge ba/ /bza' dang btung ba'i re mchog dang / /mar dang ka ra nyid dang ni/ /zho dang bu ram hwags dang bcas/ /'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / /rgyal po'i bza' ba dam pa'i mchog /bza' ba la sogs rab mchog

go/ /de nas sngags pas 'jug par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas su/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin dag pa dang / /phreng ldan dri zhim ldan pa'i las/ /sgo yi char ni zhugs nas su/ /thog mar lha ni spyan drang bya/ /

phyag rgya bcings te dbyangs snyan pas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman slad du/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dran mdzod la/ /rin chen dam pa seng ge'i khrir bzhugs te/ /'khor
bcas lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyon/ /de nas de dag legs byon te/ /sras bcas 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang / /sems can rnams la dngos grub ster/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de nas thal mo legs
sbyar la/ /rin chen gyis bkang me tog bcas/ /gsang sngags brjod de gtor bar bya/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /de nas rang gis dbang bskur bya/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /sa la lag pas reg

nas su/ /snyems pa yis ni 'thon par bya/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /me tog dris ni yang dag sdud/ /ser po'i gos bzang yang dag gyon/ /lag na rin chen dri bzang po/ /dga' dang bcas te snyim pa de/ /

snga ma'i sngags kyis dor bar bya/ /gang gi drung du lhung gyur pa/ /lha de de yis 'grub pa yin/ /de nas g.yas nas rnam bskor te/ /slob ma de ni 'byung bar bya/ /bzang po'i seng ge'i khrir bzhag ste/ /dbang

bskur ba yi sbyor ba bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /mdzes pa'i rnga yab g.yob pa yis/ /de bzhin du yang dbang bskur te/ /bum pa brgyad dang bcu drug la/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /
