go rim ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas sbyor ba der 'ongs te/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rim pa yis/ /'khor lo rin chen bzang po'i lag /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sgra dge bas/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /
lte ba ru ni dbang bskur ro/ /'di bdag gter can rin chen 'dzin/ /rdo rje rin chen 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gi ni dam pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don rgyas pa/ /'bad pas de ring blangs pa yis/ /

phongs pa'i dri ma 'phrog par byed/ /de nas dpa' bo 'chi med 'dzin/ /rin chen tshogs kyis mchod par bya/ /gzhan pa yi yang du ma ni/ /rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas so/ /de bzhin dbang bskur lnga po yis/ /
skal med kyang ni bdag med 'gyur/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug dpal ldan yang / /gnod pa med par thob par 'gyur/ /gsang ba las kyang ches shin du/ /gsang ba yi ni mna' bsgags te/ /de yi bsgom dang

sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob ma la ni de nas bslab/ /gur gum dang ni tsan dan dang / /dri dang mar me bzang po la/ /dam tshig gis ni gsal byas pa/ /lan gsum du ni 'thung du gzhug /bu kye 'thung shig gsang ba

che/ /dam tshig shin du 'da' ba dka'/ /gal te 'di las 'das gyur na/ /myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas kyang ni dmyal sdug bsngal/ /rab mang ngu 'bod nyid du gnas/ /gal te mi ru skye 'dod pa'am/ /nam
zhig dngos grub thob 'dod na/ /de bzhin phongs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ /ring du nges par khyod kyis skyobs/ /'di dag legs thob slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /ji lta'i rgyal rigs bu
mo ni/ /bzung nas gsal ba'i rnal 'byor bya/ /nyi ma bdun na nges par 'grub/ /rgyal po'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsam gtan bya/ /rgyal
mo cho ga bzhin bzung ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni myur du bsgrub/ /nyi ma gsum gyis rgyal po mchog /gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i bu mo skal chen mo/ /nor chen la ni bsgrub par bya/ /rje rigs
sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /mtshungs pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /de yis dngos grub mchog rnyed de/ /rgyal po 'jig rten gsum gyis brjed/ /dmangs mo dpa' bo'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrubs na sngags
kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rgyal mchog grub pa dang / /gnod sbyin rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /dman pa'i sems su bshad pa dang / /mchog gis mchog ni chen po dang / /bar mas bar ma'i dngos

grub ni/ /skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bslab par bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang / /gzhan pa yi 'am sna tshogs ni/ /sems can rnams la dga' ba'o/ /

shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /kun da dkar po zla ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo/ /skye bo nad pa 'chi ka ma/ /de yi lus la gzhug par bya/ /de nas de ni stobs

ldan 'gyur/ /brgyad gnyis pa yi lang tshor ldan/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /bstan bcos kun gyi don rig cing / /shes rab dran pa mchog dang ldan/ /de bzhin rang 'gyur rnal

'byor pa/ /nam mkha' la ni yang dag bsgom/ /mdzes pa'i rin chen sna tshogs pa'i/ /thams cad du ni char 'bab pa/ /'di yis phongs pa rnam par sel/ /phongs pa rnams la rab tu brtag /mthe bo yi ni tshad tsam pa'i/ /

nor rgyun ma yi rnam pa bya/ /lha mo la ni mnyam par gzhag /de yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas/ /ji srid 'bum phrag kho na ste/ /de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba gang ba'am bcu bzhi 'am/ /brgyad pa
'am gzas bzung nyin par la/ /mchod pa chen po byas nas su/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas/ /de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyan te/ /gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur/ /de nas bzung ste mdor

bsdu na/ /mi yi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ /bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang byung na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nor chen 'gyur/ /bar mas gling ni thob par 'gyur/ /tha ma yis ni khor yug go/ /thams cad du ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /
longs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yin/ /rgyal po thams cad dbang 'gyur zhing / /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /snying gar rnal 'byor byas nas su/ /nor bu lag par bcangs nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
la gnas bsgom/ /myur du rin chen rgyal por 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byas gyur pas/ /rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i grub rnyed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ji bzhin no/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal to/ /de nas sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /yum de rnams ni legs byon nas/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor legs gnas pa/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /gang du rgyal ba kun bzhugs nas/ /
bla na med pa'i don mdzad pa/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /myur du las ni 'grub pa legs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su gru gsum pa/ /de yi steng du lha mo bzhag /'bar ba'i me

dang mtshungs pa la/ /zhal bzhi ma la cher 'jigs pa/ /mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa mo/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje lcags kyu thod pa dang / /zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon par 'dzin/ /lpags pa
chen po gos su gyon/ /khro mo mig 'bras rab phyung ba/ /mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo/ /de yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /mtha' ma'i zhal ni mdor bsdus pa/ /sna tshogs gtum dang drag po'i zhal/ /du ma'i
phyag gis yang dag 'khrug /zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs dang / /rdo rje can gyi sog le 'dzin/ /thod pas lus la bres gyur cing / /cod pan chen pos 'jigs byed mo/ /gshin rje dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /

mtha' gdong dam pa yi ni mchog /sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /ral gri rin chen thod pa dang / /

rin chen dbyug gu 'dzin pa'i mchog /de nas lha mo legs bri ba/ /pad ma'i zhal ma 'jigs chen mo/ /dmar mo phyag na nyi zla 'dzin/ /bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs pa mo/ /g.yon pa ru ni khro mo che/ /ma bcom
ma ni ska rags mgul/ /las kyi rdo rje dril ldan mchog /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /gtsug na thod pa 'jigs su rung / /rab gtum stobs dang gsal ba mo/ /sbyor ldan cho ga rig pas bri/ /phyi rol

du ni legs bri ba/ /khro bcas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs chen po can/ /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /phyag rgya bzang pos phyag mtshan pa'o/ /de yi phyi ru lha rnams ni/ /snyim pa rab

sbyar yi dam pa/ /thams cad du ni yongs su gzhag /'jig rten skyong ba bzhag par bya/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba yang de bzhin du/ /de nas gtor ma'i cho ga ni/ /sha bcas btung ba ro dang ldan/ /

de nas go cha bcings gyur pas/ /thod pa'i cod pan chen po dang / /khrag gam chang gis bkang ba 'am/ /thod pa ldan pas 'jug par bya/ /thams cad 'grub pa'i ma mo rnams/ /'di yis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /dkon
mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /gsad pa'i don du ma mo rnams/ /de ring nyid du dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'jigs chen ma rnams thams cad gshegs/ /'jigs pa'i sgra dang cher gtum dang / /kha nas 'od zer stong
phrag ni/ /mthong ba dang ni thos pa na/ /mtshan mar yang ni shes par bya/ /de nas de yis arga sbyin/ /ci bder bzhes shig 'jigs mdzad ma/ /gdug pa chen po gsol bar mdzod/ /gdug gtum 'jigs
par byed pa yis/ /de nas bdag la dbang bskur te/ /thod par gnas pa'i ro yis ni/ /srang tsam gyis ni sha zos nas/ /ma mo thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams kun/ /dam tshig bsrung
ba yis ni bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma rnams la 'khyal smra ba/ /rtag tu gsod par lha mo rnams/ /bgyid par bdag ni rjes su gzung / /de nas cho ga de nyid kyis/ /slob
ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya/ /khro bo'i lha la bskul nas su/ /me tog dmar po dor bar bya/ /bdag gi me tog dam pa 'di/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /bdug pa 'di ni bzung nas su/ /gsol byed
'di ni gsol bar mdzod/ /lha mo gang la lhung gyur pa/ /de yis de la mchog gsol lo/ /de nas dbang bskur byin nas su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun bzhag ste/ /thod pa ru ni gnas pa yi/ /khrag gis dbang

ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas sgo ru bos nas su/ /dam tshig 'bad pas 'dzin du gzhug /rab tu gdug pa'i snying gi khrag /bzang po 'di ni 'thung zhig bu/ /zo shig zo shig sha chen po/ /btung ba 'jigs pa chen po

'thung / /gzhan du na ni 'chi 'gyur te/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yi/ /ring por mi thogs rab tu za/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni/ /stong phrag dag ni bslab par
bya/ /de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang nyid khro bor bzung gyur pas/ /gnod byed thams cad gsad par bya/ /dgra rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /gdug pa thams cad bca' bar bya/ /srin po thams cad
gzhom par bya/ /mtha' yas zhal ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsad dang gzung ba de yis bya/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam pa'ang yin/ /mkha' gdong ma yis thams cad du/ /
rin po che yi tshogs 'byung ngo / /pad ma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /chang gi dam pa btung bar bya/ /ma bcom ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sha ni 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /nam mkha' rengs pa chen po ste/ /

dmag dpung 'byor pa'i dam pa'o/ /rmugs dang rmongs pa thams cad du/ /dpyad pa ru ni mi bya'o/ /sngar bshad pa yi las rnams dang / /ma bshad pa la ci 'dod pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis kun bya ste/ /thams cad du ni the tshom

med/ /dur khrod kyi ni thal ba la/ /dgra bo'i gzugs ni 'bad pas bya/ /ming dang spel bar byas nas su/ /ma mo'i ral gris gtub par bya/ /de nas nyi ma bdun na ni/ /brlag par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /gang lus
ji ltar bcad gyur pa/ /de dang de yi yan lag 'chad/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pas bcad/ /de yi mgrin par zhags pa ni/ /mkhas pas spros te bcing bar bya/ /lcags

kyus snying gar phug nas su/ /rlung gis bskyod de drang bar bya/ /de nas de yi ming bskul nas/ /de ni shes rab ldan pas dgug /dman dang mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /'di yi 'bras bu nga yis bshad/ /mdor bsdus
pas ni shes par bya/ /sngags pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba yis shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ de yis dngos grub gsol mi 'gyur/ /nye bar 'tshe ba 'jigs rnams
dang / /gdon dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas/ /mi bzad nad kyis btab nas su/ /shi nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyi/ /dkyil 'khor la bzhag yum rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur
gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs nyan du gzhug /rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis/ /rang gi rnam rtog bdag yum min/ /lta bus yab gyur bsgrubs na ni/ /nyi ma bdun na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi yab ston pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul te/ /drag po kun dang bde chen po/ /ye shes kun gyi mchog gi mchog /shes rab kyis ni thams cad bsgrub/ /las rgyas pa yi dam pa'i mchog /bye brag
tu ni bsgul nas su/ /byang chub kyi ni yon tan gyi/ /thams cad du ni 'od gsal ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab kyi ni las dbye bas/ /gzugs dang dbyibs nyid dag gis so/ /phyag

rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / /bza' ba dang ni nyer spyod pa/ /gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni/ /shin du bde ba'i stan nyid dang / /de dang de ni nges par sbyar/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan sa bon

ni/ /rang gi lus khyab pa nyid do/ /gsang sngags dag ni thams cad las/ /gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bsngags/ /tshe 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing / /gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje/ /ye
shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsung / /las kun gyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni sgyu mas 'gro la bzhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge/ ye shes chen pos gsung du gsol/ /gang gis mngon par rgyas btab kun/ /mnga' bdag dus mi ring bar 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya rtags su yang dag bshad/ /tha snyad tsam du rnam par btags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis kla klo'i skad/ /
phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bshad/ /'on kyang mgon po mchog gis brtags/ /lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshan ma nyid/ /gang gis yid ches legs skye rnams/ /dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams ni/ /
sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na/ /grub pa'i dam pa rab tu stsol/ /dus las thams cad byon nas su/ /slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /lag pa zla ba nyi mar bya/ /shes rab
thabs su rab tu brtag /de nas sngags pas yongs su sbyar/ /rang gi sa bon dag gis mtshan/ /oM pradz+nyo pA ya sa mA yo ga /de nas thal mo nges par sbyar/ /phan tshun rjes su rtogs
chen po/ /khu tshur shin du gzhag par bya/ /khu tshur bsdam pa lta bur bcing / /so so ru ni sbyor bar bya/ /snying gi dbus su nges par gzung / /g.yon pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas/ /bzhag ste sor
mo so sor bya/ /lag g.yas bsgreng nas phyogs kun tu/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lta bur bskum/ /sor mo thams cad rtsibs su bya/ /oM sarba d+harma tsakra sa mA ye/

de bzhin g.yon pa yongs su spro/ /sor mo rtsibs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab steng du bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /rtse mo cung zad sbyar bar bya/ /chos kyi las ni chen po byed/ /de nyid
mnyam du bskums pa ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes su grags/ /de bzhin ming med byas nas su/ /lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen po shin du ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol/ /phyag
rgya 'di rnams bsdams nas ni/ /rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur/ /kun tu bzang po rgyal po che/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod ce'o/ /de nas ma mo de rnams kun/ /slar yang gtso bo la bstod nas/ /
shes rab chen po rnam bzhi yi/ /phyag rgya zhu ba rnam par byas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rab kyi mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig /gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yal ga mchog /shes rab thabs kyi lus

bzang ba/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ni/ /gang gis rnal 'byor pa bde ba/ /rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang yang dag pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul skye ba 'dir rnyed pa/ /bcom ldan ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i phyag
rgya rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /gang gis myur du sgrub po kun/ /rab tu bde bar gnas pas 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mnyes te gsang ba'i dam pa gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /bde ba

chen po rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje thal mo dam pas bsdams/ /rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub/ /de nyid rdo rje lta bur bya/ /bskyod pas bde
ba skyed par byed/ /'di ni chos 'dzin zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa'o/ /g.yon par thabs ni bskums nas su/ /bskyod pas bde ba 'gugs par byed/ /dag pa'i las zhes rab tu grags/ /bde ba

thams cad rab stsol byed/ /de nyid kha dang rkan la ni/ /sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad/ /rdo rje phan tshun yang dag sbyar/ /lcags kyu'i kha ni bskyod par bya/ /kha ni phan tshun yongs sbyar ba/ /gsang ba'i zhags pa zhes
su grags/ /de bzhin bskum par byas nas su/ /dam du bsdams te bcing bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba bsdams pa'i rgya/ /ye shes bsdams pa rab tu 'grub/ /thams cad rdo rje ltar rdo rje/ /de bzhin bskyod cing

bskor bar bya/ /de 'di gsang ba rab tshim pa/ /tshim pa'i don ni ster bar byed/ /lhag ma phyag rgya chen po ru/ /shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de nyid las n-i phyag rgya mchog /las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya zhes
so/ /de nas ma mo de rnams kun/ /yid ni tshim zhing mgu ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpar mtshan yangs pa'i/ /legs so ba ni nges par phul/ /legs so legs so gsang chen po/ /legs so legs so mchod chen po/ /
legs so legs so rnal 'byor che/ /legs so legs so rab tshim mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba

bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud/ /spyod pa rin chen khyod la 'dud/ /dam pa'i rgyur gyur khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud/ /dpa' bo 'dul ba khyod la 'dud/ /
gsang ba'i chos ldan khyod la 'dud/ /zhi ba'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mgon po khyod la bdag cag zhu/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i phyir/ /mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod/ /d+hi zhes bya ba shes rab can/ /thabs
dang ldan pas gsal byas pa/ /'di yis sngags pa 'jigs med par/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'gyur/ /rig pa 'di yis de yi ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dang / /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /
tshim dang 'phrog dang 'bras chen po/ /zhi bas zhi ba zhes su bshad/ /brnyes ma zhes pas rgyas par bshad/ /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba la/ /byed ma'o dbang la drag mo yin/ /sha yi mtha' ru bdud gsod

ma/ /gsod pa dang ni spel bar bya/ /'gro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya/ /thams cad du ni drag po dgug /drag po drag po'i go 'phang gnas/ /'di yi cho ga ldan pa yis/ /las kyi
tshogs kyi mchog kun bya/ /sems la rnal 'byor legs bsams te/ /brgyad brgya kho na bzlas pa yis/ /dbang bcas nyid dam dbang chen po/ /stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su/ /ma mo'i tshogs kun de
yis bzla/ /dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid chen pos bka' bzhin du/ /mgo bos nye bar phyag 'tshal te/ /'di yi ma mo thams cad kun/ /gzi brjid kyi ni gzi ldan pa/ /sngags kyi

rgyal po 'od ldan pas/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed/ /grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /'di ni ston pa
chen pos gsungs/ /ma skyes skye ba med la bzhugs/ /rtag pa ston pa thams cad pa/ /nam mkha' nyi zla dri ma med/ /de dag thams cad rab dga' ste/ /dngos po spangs pa'i btsun mo yis/ /gar dang glu dang

sil snyan mchog /bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bud med sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang / /gling bu pi bang rdza rnga sogs/ /ting ting shag dang dung sgra dang / /ro dang reg pa dri chen po/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs bde
ldan pas/ /dpa' chen la ni mchod byas nas/ /snyems dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ /slar yang mgon po la gsol btab/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /mgon po ci yi phyir mi gsung / /yab
rnams kyi ni thams cad dang / /yum rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus pa/ /mchod pa yang ni thams cad de/ /bran bcas pho nya pho nya mo/ /'jig rten pa ni mtha' dag gi/ gtso bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de dag nyid

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa bsgyings pa dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs
so/ /de nas yang bde ba yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhan cig bskyod pa dang bcas pa bran dang bcas pas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon po dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ /
rdo rje snang ba mdzes pa'i sku/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba kun bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

zhu ba rab tu zhus pa ni/ /gang phyir nga la dngos med kyang / /zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos/ /gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang / /de bzhin snying rje'i pha rol phyin/ /dran pa med las dran pa yang / /dran 'gyur
dran po bzhin gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /brjod du med pa bshad par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi

bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal pa'i phyir slar yang glu'i dbyangs 'dis zhu ba zhus pa/ chos dbyings mi g.yo bde la legs
bzhugs dam pa'i thugs/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa/ /bde mchog lha yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba mchog la bzhugs gsol bde chen gyi/ /
sa gnyis gtsug gis phyag byas bde ldan pad ma'i gtsug tor gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gar mdzad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shig kye/ /'gro kun phan dgongs rab tu bzhugs gsol mchod pa chen po
kye/ /cha lugs rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa ste/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bskul ba'i tshig nyid kyi thugs la bzhag nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab tu tshim pa bde ba la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ bde ba chen po 'khor los sgyur ba la rab tu gnas nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la rab tu phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /de yi lte
bar 'di dgod do/ /rdo rje chen po bsam ldan pa/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab/ /kun gyi thog mthar rab byung ba/ /de la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /thams
cad kun du brtag par bya/ /pad ma'i lo ma rtsibs la ni/ /rang gi chos dang rab tu spel/ /ma mo rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag /sgo ru sgo ba yongs su brtag /sgo yi

phyi ru sgo skyong ba/ /btsun mo lhan cig spyod bcas pa/ /kun nas lha rnams bzhag par bya/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin 'phar ma gzhan/ /dri za rnams dang mi 'am ci/ /lha min mkha'

lding de bzhin no/ /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad ni/ /sgo ru gnyis gnyis bzhag par bya/ /gdon dang dug dang rims dang nad/ /yi dgas sha za srin po dang / /dmyal ba brgyad po phyogs brgyad kyi/ /'khor lo'i

phyi ru bzhag par bya/ /de nas 'khor lo'i mu khyud bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /de yi sgo ru bri bya ba/ /shar du 'dod chags skye gnas lag /zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa/ /byang du legs par bri bar bya/ /

gti mug nub du bri bar bya/ /lho ru nga rgyal nyid yin no/ /sog le dang ni gos nag po/ /de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar brtags pa'o/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin 'jug /de nas gsang ba

rdo rje'i phyag rgya nges par bcings pa'i lag par gyur pas rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran pas phyag rgya de nyid kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang rdo rje'i glu 'dis bskul te dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /'dir
gshegs 'dir gshegs sangs rgyas zhal ras sangs rgyas dpal/ /bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor te/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs pad ma'i spyan ras pad las 'khrungs/ /
dam tshig rnam dag rnams kyi dpa' bos dam pa'i phyag /glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul/ /byon 'gyur song shig song shig ces/ /'khod cig 'khod cig 'khod par bya/ /
tshim zhing tshim la rab tu tshim/ /zhugs shig zhugs shig 'jug par bya/ /kwa kye zhes brjod bskul ba yis/ /sa la gnas kun rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas me tog dor bar bya/ /bcom ldan bde bar bzhes su

gsol/ /lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung / /de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /yang na yid la gang 'dod pa'i/ /sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas byed/ /de nyid du ni dbang bskur ba/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas

pas blang / /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dar la sogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag bzang pos/ /de bzhin du ni me tog dor/ /sa ma ya s+t+wam

bdag gis brjod/ /me tog gang la lhung gyur pa/ /de yi sbyor bas dbang bskur bya/ /yang na gang 'dod rnal 'byor gyis/ /sbyor ba bsgoms te dbang bskur bya/ /yang na bdag po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gal te de ni

sbyor ldan gyur/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla re sogs/ /b+h+ring ga ra yi bum pa dang / /rnga yab rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /seng ge'i khri ni bzang po dang / /gser dang dngul gyi dbyug gu dang / /rin chen dbyug gu du ma ni/ /dgyes

pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag /dbang bskur spro ba chen po yis/ /de yi stan la bzhag nas su/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ji ltar rigs pa yis/ /gsang ba'i sbyor bas dbang bskur ro/ /

thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis/ /de ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /'dir ni nga yi dam tshig zung / /phyi dang gsang ba rnam pa bzhi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed/ /gdug pa thams cad

gsad par bya/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor dbrog bya/ /lta ba ngan la brdzun du smra/ /srog chags gsod la smra bar bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon bgrod par/ /ci bde bar ni phrogs shig bu/ /gzhan rdzas 'phrog par byed rnams

dang / /dkon mchog gsum la 'gal byed pa/ /gsad dang gzhom par bya ba dang / /de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru/ /'bad pa yis ni thams cad byos/ /dam tshig rnam pa gsum po yis/ /de nas yon ni phul nas su/ /bla ma

la ni gus pa yis/ /zhabs la mgo bos nges gtugs te/ /rang lus rgyal po'i longs spyod dang / /chung ma'am yang na bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bran nyid dang / /sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang / /grong dang yul gyi

longs spyod dang / /shing rta 'gro dang glang po dang / /rnam par bkra ba'i rta rnams dang / /nor gyis gang ba'i grong rnams dang / /ba lang ma he ra rnams dang / /lug rgod rnams dang gzhan rnams dang / /rnga mo mdzes ma'i rnga mo mo/ /gzhan yang gzhan

yang gang 'dod pa/ /ji ltar rigs pas mchod par bya/ /rim bzhin rang gi slob ma'i tshogs/ /mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol/ /gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang / /de nas sgrub thabs dam pa bslab/ /srog dang thur sel sbyor ba yis/ /

sems kyi brtan pa nyid du bya/ /zla ba nya ba lta bur dgang / /cha shas dag ni bcu drug kyang / /de yi dbus su rnam bsam pa/ /gtso chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go/ /mdor bsdus nas ni spro bar bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rang lus bsam/ /bdag

nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal/ /'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su/ /rnal 'byor can bdag dpal ldan 'grub/ /lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing / /nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /zla ba

gcig tsam bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bos las kun byed par 'gyur/ /zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang / /drag shul spyod pa'i rim pa yis/ /dgug dang dbab pa'i las rnams ni/ /skad cig tsam zhig bskul ba yis/ /sngags pas

thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags zlos pas/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung / /yan lag lnga las skyes pa gzung / /'byung po'i nyi ma mtshan mo gung / /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas la/ /rang gi

kha ru gzhug par bya/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas/ /de ni nang par mthong mi 'gyur/ /lhar bcas grub pa'i sems can gyis/ /thams cad rnam pa kun tu'o/ /bskal par gnas shing shes rab che/ /bstan bcos thams

cad rab tu mkhas/ /gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag 'gyur/ /bcu bzhi'i nyin par shi ba yi/ /rdol pa'i g.yon gyi rtsib logs ni/ /sbyor bas bzung ste 'phur 'gro mi/ /gzugs

brnyan lag pa bzhi pa bya/ /zhags pa lcags kyu rtse gsum mtshan/ /g.yon par thod pa 'dzin pa po/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /spyan gsum rnam par gtsigs pa po/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /gtum ldan sta

zur chen po pa/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhag ste/ /cho ga ji bzhin mchod par bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /khrag dang sha dang mar khu yis/ /

de nas lha mo de 'grub bo/ /mtshan ma yang ni blta bar bya/ /mtshan ma yis ni dngos grub che/ /dus mi ring bar bzang po 'thob/ /dman pas dman pa'i dngos grub ste/ /bar ma yis ni bar ma'o/ /mtshan ma med na chung ngu ni/ /

rab tu 'grub par dpyad mi dgos/ /lha min bzang po dgug par bya/ /mi dang mda' ni bskul ba yis/ /de yi skad cig nyid la byed/ /khrag nyid kyis ni bris pa yi/ /dbang du bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyis/ /de bzhin bud med

thams cad dgug /'grub pa'i rdzas kyang ming nyid kyis/ /dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya/ /dmag dpung rnam par bzlog pa ni/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam bzhag go/ /rengs dang rmugs par byed pa dang / /rmongs dang 'ching ba

de bzhin du/ /gyib dang gsad pa thams cad ni/ /cho ga dag dang ldan pas byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams dang yab rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis zhu ba

chen po 'di zhus pa dang / gang la bzhugs nas rgyal ba kun/ /yum dang yab rnams de bzhin du/ /de yi sbyor bas sbyor bdag nyid/ /sems can rnams ni snod du mdzod/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rnal 'byor

chen po'i rnam dbye ba/ /gang gis ma 'ongs mi rnams ni/ /bde bas sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pa/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gsang ba chen po

bka' stsal pa/ /gang phyir bdag nyid dkyil 'khor bshad/ /sems can dag pa'i rdo rje can/ /bdag nyid gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags nyid de/ /bdag nyid rig sngags dam tshig kyang / /
gang phyir bdag nyid sdom pa ste/ /bdag nyid bshad dang 'chad pa'o/ /pha dang ma rnams de bzhin te/ /dngos grub sgrub po las kyi mchog /bde dang sdug bsngal khams gsum pa zhes so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de phyir gsungs shig bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi/ /phan dang

bde ba thob pa'i phyir zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab nye bar longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las

'di byung ngo / /sngon bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas su/ /de yi dbus su bdag bsam bya/ /dkar dang dmar dang 'od chen po/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus la spras/ /dmar po'i phreng ba gtsug tor can/ /sna tshogs

gos ni legs mnabs pa/ /dmar po'i 'od kyi bla gos can/ /phyag bzang g.yon na dril bu ste/ /bsnyems bcas 'dzum bag ldan pa'i zhal/ /phyag gzhan na ni rdo rje can/ /snying kar rab tu gsor mdzad pa/ /pad ma rgyas 'dra'i

spyan mnga' ba/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nyi shar mtshungs/ /rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba po/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bri bar bya/ /g.yon du shes rab yongs su bri/ /sngon bshad pa yi gzugs can la/ /

g.yas pa'i phyag ni 'phyang ba'o/ /lho ru sbyin pa chen mo ni/ /phyag rab rin chen stsol ba mo/ /byang du bzod pa chen mo ni/ /byams pa'i ya lad 'dzin pa mo/ /mdun du brtson 'grus chen mo ni/ /rdo rje'i lag pa cher bzang ba/ /shar dang lho yi

mtshams su ni/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin ma bri/ /bsam gtan phyag can spyan yangs ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bzang ba'o/ /bden bral du ni 'phel ma bri/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /nor gyi rgyan ni stong phrag gis/ /sems

can mang po bde bar byed/ /smon lam bri bya rlung gi ni/ /mtshams su yang dag mtshon par bya/ /dbyangs snyan pa yi ngag brjod pas/ /sems can thams cad skul bar byed/ /blo gros ldan pas dbang ldan du/ /thabs kyi ye shes slob pa mo/ /

lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed pa/ /sgeg dang dga' bas 'khrugs pa bri/ /dpa' bos shar sgor bri bya ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma/ /ye shes lcags kyu mdzes pa'i phyag /dmar po'i dar gyis mngon par mdzes/ /dbang ni nub

kyi sgo ru ni/ /'ching ba'i bdag nyid bri bar bya/ /shin tu byi ru dang mtshungs pa/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa mo/ /byang gi sgo ru bri bya ba/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma mchog /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /dril

bu bzang po 'khrol ba'i bdag /gshin rje cho 'phrul bri bar bya/ /'bar ba'i sprin gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyag na rdo rje zhags bkra ba/ /rdo rje'i glog phreng dang mtshungs ma'o/ /nga yi mdun du shes ldan gyis/ /'dod

pa'i dbang phyug brgyan pa bri/ /pad ma rA ga'i 'od gsal ba/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /de yi mdun du dkar po bri/ /zla ba'i 'od 'dra grags chen po/ /zla ba shar ka'i 'od mdzes pa/ /'dzum bag can

la gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /rdo rje 'dun pa cher dmar ba/ /mda' lnga dang ni gzhu 'dzin pa/ /skye ba 'joms pa dpa' bo ni/ /lag na 'khor lo gzi brjid mchog /de yi g.yon du bri bya ba/ /dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od chen po/ /rdo rje

dzang sgrogs rgyal po ni/ /dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa/ /de yi rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /gser dang gur gum dang 'dra ba'o/ /lho yi phyogs su bri bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /sngon po char sprin dang 'dra ba/ /

lag na ral gri rin chen ldan/ /de mdun dpa' chen 'dod pa yi/ /rgyal po bdag nyid chen po bri/ /'od zer dmar po lag na gzhu/ /rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lho ru bri bya ba/ /rdo rje rnam par smod pa

mchog /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pa can/ /rab tu rno ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng / /rdo rje dam pa 'dul mdzad dpal/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog gi tog /kha dog dkar po cher spro ba/ /gos sngon rnam par 'phyang ba po/ /rdo rje DA ki'i

dbang phyug rigs/ /lag na rin chen shin tu mdzes/ /de yi rgyab tu bri bya ba/ /dgod dang bcas pa'i bzhin ras mchog /nga yi rgyab tu bri bya ba/ /dri yi dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /lag na pad ma snying kar 'chang / /ban du'i me tog rnam pa

'dra/ /de la mngon par phyogs pa yi/ /rdo rje sgrol ba spyan mdzes bri/ /dkar ser bzang po sna tshogs pa/ /lag na uta pal sngon po bzang / /de yi g.yon du dag pa yis/ /lag na 'khor lo ches dkar bri/ /sngon pos

legs pa'i gnas thob pa/ /mchog tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ /lo ma'i rtse mo rgyab tu bri/ /lag na yid bzhin nor bu mchog /kha dog sngo bsangs dpa' chen po/ /sems dpa' ldan pa'i thugs chen po/ /de yi lho

yi cha ru ni/ /chos 'chad mchog ni bri bar bya/ /rgyu mtshan phyag ldan rab dkar ba/ /nyi ma shar ka'i snang ba 'dra/ /nga yi byang du bri bya ba/ /stug po bkod pa grags chen po/ /shin tu ljang ba'i ma rgad mtshungs/ /las kyi

rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa'o/ /de yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /rdo rje skyong ba yid 'phrog bkra/ /bzhad bcas rdo rje'i lag pa can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lho ru bri bya ba/ /'gro ba'i rtse mo legs brgyan

pa/ /lhang tsher nag po bung ba 'dra/ /rdo rje'i gsal shing 'dzin pa po/ /rgyab tu rdo rje 'ching ba bri/ /lag pa yang dag sbyar bsdams pa/ /rin chen kun gyi 'od dag cing / /'dzum bcas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba/ /

'khor byed g.yon du bri bar bya/ /lag na mgal me'i 'khor lo can/ /legs sngo dar la bab pa po/ /rab rgyas pad ma lta bu'i zhal/ /de nas sgo yi cha dag tu/ /sgo ba rnam pa bzhi po bri/ /shar du rdo rje mi

g.yo ba/ /lag na rdo rje lcags kyu che/ /lho yi sgo ru rdo rje me/ /lag na rdo rje zhags pa 'bar/ /nub tu rlung ni sngon po ste/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /lus ngan du ni chu bri ste/ /zhags pa ldan pa'i dril bu

'dzin/ /de nas sbyor ldan 'ongs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar du bri/ /shar du mda' yi mtshon cha lag /rab 'bar pad ma ltar 'bar ba/ /lho ru chen po dbang phyug can/ /sngon mo dbang phyug rdo rje ma/ /lag na rin chen snye ma can/ /rin po che yi rgyan

gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje nyer zhi dkar mdzes ma/ /rgyab tu rtag tu bri bar bya/ /lag na pad+ma bzang po 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje steng zhal mdzes ma ni/ /sngo bsangs kun gyi yon tan ldan/ /

lus ngan du ni shes ldan gyis/ /g.yas su rdo rje rtse gcig bri/ /shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje ni/ /dus tshigs zhes bya bzang mo bri/ /dbyar gyi sprin ltar mdzes pa mo/ /lag na bdug spos grags chen mo/ /nub kyi mtshams

su ri ri ta/ /lag na me tog phreng ba 'bar/ /cung zad dmar la dkar ba mo/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nub byang du ni bri bya ba/ /lag na yi ge sna tshogs bri/ /lag na sgron me rab dmar ba/ /cung zad sngo ba'i

gos gyon pa/ /dri yi glang po ltar 'gying ba'i/ /rol pa ldan ma mkhas pas bri/ /sngo bsangs dmar po mthon mthing 'dra/ /rab tu dgod cing mig mdzes ma/ /rdo rje'i lag pa mig mdzes ma'o/ /de yi shar du bri

bya ba/ /rdo rje mchog gi 'od ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje dbang phyug bde ba ma'o/ /de bzhin lho ru bri bya ba/ /gser sogs dang ni mthon mthing 'dra/ /rin chen sgron ma rin chen lag /'od mchog ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag

la bri/ /'od kyis snang zhing mdzes pa la/ /lag na 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o/ /rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag na sna tshogs gos ldan pa/ /byang du rtag tu bri bar bya/ /de bzhin

sbyor bas bris nas su/ /pho nya mo yang legs par bri/ /snying skul byed pa mdzes ma ni/ /shar du legs par bri bar bya/ /rdo rje myu gu mnga' ldan dmar/ /mig gnyis dang ni gos sngon po'o/ /de dang nye bar dpa' mo ni/ /lag

na lcags kyu zhags pa mchog /gdug pa 'gugs pa'i lha mo bri/ /sngo bsangs dmar la legs brjod pa'o/ /rjes su mnyes ma'i pho nya che/ /nub tu rtag tu bri bar bya/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed ma/ /lpags pa'i

zhags pas lag pa mdzes/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi pho nya mo/ /byang du gnas pa bri bar bya/ /mdog gnag pa la cher za ba/ /lag na thod pa legs mdzad pa'o/ /thams cad 'phrog pa'i pho nya mo/ /me yi mtshams su bri

bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa mchog /dmar gnag dka' thub chen po ma'o/ /de yi byang du dpa' bo yis/ /sgo skyong stobs chen bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs ma legs dmar ba/ /lag mthil dril bu dang ldan pa'o/ /
dam tshig gsum ldan spyan gsum ma/ /rtse gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mo/ /'jigs pa'i lus can cher gsal ma/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khrugs/ /'bar ba'i me lce'i lag pa can/ /me yi phyogs su yang dag
rten/ /lha mo chen mo thog ma ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i gtsub shing can/ /dmar zhing sngo ba bri bya ste/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas so/ /gdul dka' 'dul ba'i lha mo ni/ /sgo skyong ba yi gnas na gnas/ /dpa'

mo rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag /byin za 'bar ba dang mtshungs ma'o/ /de nas bran mo bri bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas lag pa mtshan/ /'jig rten gsum 'ching bran mo ni/ /nub tu yang dag bri bar bya/ /'ching ba chen po'i lag

pa can/ /rab dmar gur gum 'od zer can/ /bran mo 'jigs pa'i me gdong ma/ /sgron bcas lag pa'i rtse mo mchog /rab gnag pa la lus chen mo/ /cho ga ji bzhin rtag tu bri/ /bran mo gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur gdong / /

'khrug pa'i tshul la rab 'jigs ma/ /lag na thod pa rlon pa can/ /shin tu dmar zhing 'od chen mo/ /sku gsung thugs 'ching bran ma ni/ /shar du yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la lus che ba/ /zhags pa lcags

kyu'i lag pa mchog /de nas rol pa mo bri bya/ /go rims ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes ma ni/ /mdzes shing rin chen gyis nyer brgyan/ /mda' gzhu'i lag can dmar ba mo/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'dzin/ /
byang du sngags pas bri bya ba/ /kun nas 'bebs ma che ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i lag pa 'dzin pa mo/ /bde ba 'bebs la legs par gnas/ /'jig rten gsum 'joms khro mo ni/ /rdo rje rol pa mo

zhes bya/ /drag shul chen pos sdigs par byed/ /mnyam par bzhag pas shar du bri/ /rab tu dga' ba rjes rtog ma/ /sngags pa spro bas rgyab tu bri/ /'dod chags phyag rgya'i lag pa ma/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo mnyes par

mdzad/ /dga' byed ces bya bri bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje rol pa mo/ /dga' bo'i rtse 'jo'i lag can bkra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni/ /sngags pa cho ga shes pas bri/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad legs gnas pas/ /phyi rol

rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas/ /dbang por mig gsum bri bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyi rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rang gi chung ma sogs pas bskor/ /chu lhar tshangs pa chen po

ni/ /gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya/ /sgo ru sgo ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/ /kun nas dmar zhing cher gtum pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /lho ru legs par gnas pa'i mchog /lag na zhags pa

dam pa bri/ /sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug par byed/ /'ching byed drag po chen po ni/ /brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bal po se 'u'i me tog mtshungs/ /rags shing stan las mi g.yo

ba'o/ /ne tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa'i/ /mnyes byed mchog ni bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams kyang / /rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag pa mdzes/ /zhi ba sogs kyis yongs su bskor/ /

gshin rje 'khor lo'i lag pa ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rdo rjes mtshan/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin gnag pa po/ /mtshon cha sogs pas yongs su bskor/ /lus ngan du ni dbang po bri/ /rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /de nas

mchod pa'i rnam pa bri/ /rdo rje me tog chen po'i gzugs/ /lag na me tog snyim pa mdzes/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sngags pas rdo rje bdug pa bri/ /yid sim byed pa'i dam pa ni/ /lag na bdug pa mig yangs

ma/ /'khur tshos cung zad dkar ba ma'o/ /lha mo rdo rje snang byed ma/ /gser bsregs pa yi mdog 'dra la/ /lag na sgron ma mkhas pas bri/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dri zhim lus la cha lugs
bzang / /lag na dri yi snod mdzes ma/ /ud pal sngon po'i lo ma mtshungs/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs la yid 'phrog ma'o/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /

lag na rdo rje me long 'dzin/ /'dzum bcas dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /sgra yi rdo rje sna tshogs lus/ /dkar dang sngo ba'i lus dang ldan/ /pi wang gling bu ting ting sogs/ /sgrogs pa shes rab can gyis bri/ /

ro yi rdo rje skal chen mo/ /lag na ro yi snod 'dzin pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje reg bya sngo bsangs che/ /chu skyes sngon po 'dab 'dra'i mig /rnam par gsal

zhing cher dgod pa/ /rang gi dpung pa bsdams pa mo/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje bod bcas pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni mdor bsdus te/ /bri bya sna tshogs gos 'dzin dkar/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa ma'o/ /rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo

che/ /sgeg dang bcas shing yid du 'ong / /rked par khu tshur gnyis bzhag cing / /mdzes pa'i phreng ba'i chun po btsugs/ /rdo rje glu mkhan legs dmar lus/ /glu len pa la rab tu brtson/ /chu skyes dmar po rgyas 'dra'i

bzhin/ /glu len lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /rdo rje gar ma mkhas pas bri/ /gar dang bcas pa'i lag pa can/ /sngo bsangs dkar po cher dkar ba/ /mig che ba la 'dzum bcas mchog /rdo rje sil snyan drag mo che/ /dur du ra

yi rnga mdzes rdung / /rdo rje rnga chen lha mo che/ /rnga chen rdung ba bri bar bya/ /rdza rnga ma ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdza rnga rdung bar byed pa mo/ /lha mo mu kuN Da rdung ma/ /mu kuN Da ma bzhin mdzes ma'o/ /pa Ta ha ni

rdung byed ma/ /rdo rje pa Ta ha zhes bya/ /rdza rnga chen po rdung byed ma/ /rdo rje rdza rnga mdzes ma bri/ /guny+tsa rdung byed dga' ba mo/ /dgod bcas pad ma'i mig can ma/ /rdo rje gun dza dpa' bos bri/ /las kun gyi ni dam pa 'grub/ /lag

na rdo rje ting ting shag /rdo rje ting ting shag bri bya/ /lag na rdo rje cang te ma/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od zer che/ /'khar rnga rdung ba'i lag pa can/ /rdo rje 'khar rnga ma bri bya/ /rgyud gcig pi wang sbreng ba bri/ /rdo rje pi wang sbreng ba mo/ /

pi wang rgyud gsum sbreng ba'i rgya/ /pi wang rgyud gsum sbreng ba bri/ /rdo rje 'khar khrol lha mo che/ /dmar po yi ni gos bgos pa'o/ /rdo rje gling bu rnal 'byor pas/ /gling bu 'bud pa ldan pa bri/ /rdo rje pi wang skal chen ma/ /pi

wang sbreng la rab spro ba'o/ /rdo rje 'bud dung 'bad pas bri/ /dung dkar 'bud pa'i rang bzhin can/ /dung ma lag na zangs dung 'dzin/ /'dod pa'i gzugs mchog 'dzin pa mo/ /rgyal ba'i dril bus lag pa mdzes/ /khrol ba

yang dag bri bar bya/ /legs spro ba la gzi brjid che/ /rnam par rgyal la spro byed ma'o/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar/ /pad ma dmar po kha 'byed ma/ /gar gyi sgyu mas rab gnas pa'i/ /lag pa stong ldan bri bar bya/ /

rin chen gar ma lha mo che/ /gar gyi bdag nyid legs par bri/ /lag na rin chen snye ma can/ /lag pa du ma gdong brgya pa'o/ /rdo rje gar ma bsnyems bcas ma/ /lus mchu ba dan dang ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni cho ga bzhin/ /

rdo rje sbyor bas rab gnas bri/ /sna tshogs gar ma skal chen mo/ /rdo rje thal mo spyi bor 'jog /'dzum bcas pa la mig mdzes ma'o/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma legs sems ma/ /smin ma sgyur ba'i mig mdzes ma/ /spros

bcas gdong gi rnam 'gyur can/ /mthong na dga' ma 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /gdong gi dkyil 'khor sngo bsangs mchog /rdo rje mthong ma skal chen mo/ /rab tu dgod cing mig rgyas ma'o/ /rnal 'byor chen pos bri bya ba/ /
rnal 'byor mig gis lta ba mo/ /rab tu gsal bas 'khrugs pa can/ /'khor lo skor ba ltar byed ma/ /snying kar lag pa 'jog pa ni/ /sdig pa ma lus 'joms par byed/ /rdzi mar bcas pa'i mig gnyis ni/ /

steng dang 'og tu 'phags pa yis/ /mthong ba 'gugs byed bde chen gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ /sgo ru sgo ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/ /thams cad srung zhing cher gtum pa/ /

sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o/ /sgo ru legs par gnas pa'i mchog /lag na zhag+sa pa dam pa bri/ /sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug par byed/ /'ching byed drag po chen

po ni/ /brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bal po se 'u'i me tog mtshungs/ /rags shing rnam par g.yo ba'i gdong / /ne tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa'i/ /mnyes byed mchog ni bri bar bya/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin

rnams dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /dbang por gzhon nu bri bar bya/ /gshin rjer gshin rje nyid yin no/ /chu lhar chu lha bri bar bya/ /lus ngan po ni byang phyogs su/ /'di dag bsdus te bri bar bya/ /'khor

gyis mdun du bdar ba'o/ /phyi ru dmyal ba brgyad po bri/ /yi dgas kyang ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad la gnas pa/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin bris te/ /phyi yi rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas/ /dang

por mig gsum legs par bri/ /rdo rje can gyi rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rang gi chung ma sogs pas bskor/ /chu lhar tshangs pa chen po ni/ /gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyug gu'i

lag pa mchog /zhi ba la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /gshin rjer 'khor lo'i lag pa can/ /rdo rjes mtshan cing rab tu mdzes/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin gnag pa po/ /dpal mo la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /lus ngan du ni

dbang po bri/ /rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /mig stong pa ni che ba'i lus/ /bde sogs sogs kyis mdun du bdar/ /dbang ldan du ni dbang ldan bri/ /me yi phyogs su me lha'o/ /bden bral du ni bden bral grags/ /rlung

du rlung lha nyid yin no/ /shar gyi sgo ru dpung bzang bri/ /muN Da Ta ni nub du'o/ /lus ngan du ni grub pa bri/ /lho ru bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /cho ga 'dis ni sngags shes pas/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bris nas su/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /yab yum gtso bo dam pa rnams/ /cho ga ji bzhin sngags pas gzhug /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bdag /rdo rje lcags kyu'i lag pa yis/ /cho ga ji bzhin bdag brgyan te/ /rdo rje sems
dpar bsnyems byas nas/ /snyems dang bcas pas langs nas su/ /gsang ba'i sems dpa' dbang bskur te/ /'di yis spyan ni myur du drang / /yab dang yum bcas sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /bran dang gnyen bcas

nye du dang bcas shing / /dpal mchog rdo rje sems dpa' yongs mnyes pa'i/ /lha dang lha mos legs bskor 'dir gshegs shig /glu 'di yis ni bskul ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon/ /byon nas dngos

grub chen po ni/ /sgrub pa po la stsol bar 'gyur/ /yang na mtshan ma gnang 'gyur te/ /'bab pa'am snang ba blta bar bya/ /gal te bsod nams rab dman na/ /de yis ci yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas slar yang

gsol ba gdab/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor de nyid kyis/ /nga rgyal yang dang yang byas te/ /mchod pa shin tu chen po bya/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil yang / /gsang ba'i de nyid kyis bskul te/ /

sngags kyi de nyid rig pas dbul/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag phyag na rdo rje ni/ /mdzes pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud sbyor ldan pas/ /yab yum sras bcas 'khor bcas pho nya sogs/ /bran bcas skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor
nas byon/ /sems can kun la phan dgyes pa/ /khyod la bdag nyid zhu ba bgyid/ /'di ni khyod kyi dus lags pas/ /sems can don mchog mdzad du gsol/ /gsol ba btab cing bskul bas kyang / /gal te mtshan ma

byung gyur na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /de tshe slob ma 'bad pas bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i yan lag bcing / /sbyor bas dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhug /de nas sgo ru mkhas pas bzhag /dam tshig dam pa nyan

du gzhug /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /de bzhin bu mo dag kyang ni/ /som nyi rnam par bral sems kyis/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /sems can thams cad gsad bya zhing / /brtul zhugs spyod pa bskyang

bar bya/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor phrogs te/ /skye bo sdug bsngal can la sbyin/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mi sbyor bas/ /yang na bdag nyid kyis kyang spyad/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod bya zhing / /bla ma la ni gus par

bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra mi bya/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dus ni ma gtogs shing / /byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig dang / /gzhan yang bde bar bya phyir dang / /slob dpon mnyes par bya don dang / /

dkon mchog gsum la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni rtag tu smros/ /gzhan gyi bud med bgrod par bya/ /dam tshig don du sbyor ldan pas/ /gzhan pa yang ni thams cad kyang / /sems can don la brtson pas bya/ /

gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di dag ni/ /blo gros ldan pas bsgrag mi bya/ /dam tshig ldan pa ma gtogs pa/ /bla ma'i bka' gnang sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pa/ /

gal te rmongs pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /dam tshig dam pa 'di 'das na/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i mnga' bdag che/ /rgyal po 'dis ni nges par gsod/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i rdo rje yis/ /lus kyi spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur/ /

de nas 'di yis me tog gi/ phreng ba bzang po dor bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mA tA pi tring ba ti ma hA su kha sa man ta b+ha dra pra tIts+tsha dam puSh+pa any+dza li mamr-i du dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH b+ha ga wAn ma hA su kha sa man ta b+ha dra sa ma ya sta~M sa

ma yo\u0f85ha~M/ 'di yis bzung ste myur ba ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/ /de ni blangs te spyi gtsug tu/ /blo gros bzang pos bcing bar bya/ /sngags pa'i rgyal pos sngags 'di yis/ /de nas mig ni rab tu dbye/ /

oM badzra dz+nyA na ma hA ne tra ud g+haT ya ti tsak+Shu ShiH mgon po chen po ltos shig bu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /ye shes chen po kun gyi mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /rim pa ji
bzhin legs bstan te/ /dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab/ /dbang bskur ba ni yid 'ong ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la gsol/ /gsang ba yi ni rgyan zhes par/ /rgyal bas gang sngon bka' stsal pa/ /

gsang ba'i sbyor de bdag la ni/ /rgyal ba kun dngos stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bum pa yis/ /de bzhin dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /slob ma chen po rnam pa lnga/ /der ni sbyor bas bos nas su/ /

gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba yis/ /dngos grub shes pas dbang bskur ro/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /der ni mchu yis legs bzung ste/ /lce yi rtse mo mkhas pas sbyar/ /rdo rje'am yang na chu skyes kyis/ /

phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /de nas 'dzin ma rnam par sbyin/ /de nyid la yang mkhas pas sbyin/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos

bka' stsal to/ /de nas yon ni dbul bar bya/ /bla mar phyag 'tshal mchod byas nas/ /ma dang bu mo nyid dang yang / /sring mo yi ni bu mo dang / /sring mo'am yang na chung ma dang / /rgyal po longs spyod skye bo'i tshogs/ /

grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang / /nor dang rin chen la sogs dang / /gzhan yang ci dang ci 'dod pa/ /mkho ba'i longs spyod gus pa yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /

dkyil 'khor pa yang legs par mchod/ /pha dang spun yang mchod par bya/ /de bzhin spun zla'i bu yang mchod/ /bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang / /gos dang rgyan dang me tog dang / /de bzhin dri dang bdug pa sogs/ /
ji ltar bdog pa thams cad kyis/ /mchod par byas te gtang bar bya/ /lha rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin du ni mchod par bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ /badzra muMHzhes brjod pas
gshegs/ /de nas sngags pas slob ma'i mchog de la/ /gsang ba rnam par 'dzin la gsang ba yi/ /rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i gsang bdag gis/ /gsang ba mtha' dag legs par bslab par bya/ /
gsang ba'i phyag rgya mig yangs ma/ /blo gros brtan pas bsgrub par bya/ /rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa yis/ /shes rab kyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /bdag nyid sems dpar legs bsgoms te/ /gsang

ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /nyi ma bdun gyis legs 'grub par/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /lha mo shes rab che de yang / /rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gtso ste/ /nam mkha' kun gyi mchog dpa' bo/ /rga dang 'chi ba
med par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid 'dod par bsgom pa yis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug gtso bo ste/ /de yang 'dod pa'i dbang lha mor/ /
'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug kun/ /bran dang 'dra bar 'khol bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bar/ /mkha' 'gro'i sa bon bsgom par bya/ /de ni

sbyor bas spros nas su/ /rang gi snying kar gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas rin chen chen po ni/ /srid pa 'joms par bsgom par bya/ /yid bzhin rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/ /nyi ma bdun na de 'gyur ro/ /'dam skyes dmar po'i

dbus su ni/ /'bad pas kun nas dri yis dgang / /dri yi dbang phyug rgyal po che/ /bdag nyid sems dpa' yid ches bsgom/ /de nas myur du blo ldan te/ /dri za'i bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur/ /dri yis myur ba nyid du

ni/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug 'gugs byed/ /don yod kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /snying po snying gi sbyor ba bsam/ /yid la bsams pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs/ /rin chen gyi yang rin chen

che/ /rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal/ /de bzhin dri dang ldan pa ni/ /sgrub pa po yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lha gzhan dag kyang rig par bya/ /dkyil 'khor ram ni dam tshig kyang / /

bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /rig sngags kyi yang sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams kyis ni de nyid ni/ /bsgoms na myur du nges par 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor
can/ /gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / yum de rnams
kyis gsol pa/ myur du sbyor ba mchog bsgrubs pas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ji ltar 'grub/ /de dag thams cad myur du gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /
rig sngags kyang ni legs par sgrub/ /btsun mo mchog gi gnas dbang phyug /dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug

tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang yum rnams kyi zhu ba'i tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams

las rnam par phyung ngo / /lha rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs par bshad/ /ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
slar yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/ /sems can rnams la phan bde'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang / /mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams/ /de nas bcom ldan

kun du bzang / /rdo rje dam pa gsor mdzad nas/ /lag pa'i mtshan ma bka' stsal pa/ /gang gis lha rnams mtshon 'gyur ba'o/ /lag pa zla ba nyi ma ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi sa

bon ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu spro/ /slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pad+mar rnam bsam bya/ /de nas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sor mo'i rtse mor dgod par bya/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsdus nas su/ /phan tshun

nges par sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /bde ba myangs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'ching ba chen pos bcings nas su/ /lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas/ /

yang dang yang du byin gyis brlab/ /bcangs te 'od ldan rnam pa gnyis/ /brkyangs nas rtse mo sbyar bar bya/ /de 'di snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /gnyis pa grags pa ldan pa yin/ /snying po yis ni mtshan byas nas/ /
rim gyis snying kar bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje mnyam par sbyar byas te/ /der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya/ /'di ni dam tshig nges bya ste/ /dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed/ /'di yis lha mo mtha'
yas zhal/ /thams cad du ni nges par 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad ma yi/ /sbyor bar bstan pa mchog tu rmad/ /de las phyi rol bskums

pa ni/ /gsum pa ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /snying ga ru ni snying po bsam/ /snying dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod/ /rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig bdag byed nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas

gsal/ /chen po'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nyid mdzod spur sbyar ba'i brjid/ /phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/ /de nyid chu skyes rnam pa ru/ /snying kar bzhag pa snying po mchog /de bzhin rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba/ /

dam tshig bdag nyid dag tu 'gyur/ /snying kar kun bsdigs sbyor ba yis/ /rab rgyas pa yi bzhin ras mchog / bsnyems pa byed pa thams cad kyang / /'dis ni las byed 'grub pa yin/ /de nyid kha ru sbyar bas ni/ /

phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub/ /de nyid 'od ldan rtse mo ni/ /thur du bstan te snying kar gzhag /'di ni 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /snying po'i snying po'i chos sgrub byed/ /de nyid snying kar yongs su bskor/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor

nyid du bzung / /'di ni dam tshig dngos grub che/ /bdag nyid chen pos bslab par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /dbab dang 'khor ba nyid dang ni/ /gar byed chen po de bzhin

du/ /de bzhin thal mo sbyar nas su/ /snying kar bzhag pa snying por bshad/ /spyi bor bskor bar byas pa ni/ /dam tshig ces bya bdag nyid che/ /steng du bsdigs pa las su 'gyur/ /mchod pa ma lus rab sgrub byed/ /

snying po la sogs 'og tu gzung / /chos la sogs par yongs su brtag /de nyid brkyang ste snying kar bzhag /snying po zhes su legs par bshad/ /bskor ba dam tshig zhes bya ste/ /las kyang thams cad de bzhin no/ /
de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis/ /steng bsgreng snying po la sogs bzhin/ /sngon bshad lha mo thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags rig par shes par bya/ /gnyis su byas la g.yas min pas/ /bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa

bzung nas su/ /mngon par phyogs te bzhag par bya/ /gzugs kyi snying po ches che ba'o/ /de nyid kha yi phyogs bzhag pa/ /sgra yi snying po yid 'phrog pa'o/ /de nyid cung zad bskums nas su/ /lce yi rnam pas kha ru

bzhag /ro myang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi/ /phyag rgya sngags pas shes par bya/ /ro 'phrog pa yi las rnams so/ /de ni gnyis su byas nas su/ /g.yas pa 'am ni g.yon pa yis/ /snying kar

legs sbyar sbyor bdag gis/ /reg pa'i phyag rgya ngo mtshar che/ /'di yis chos dang dam tshig dang / /las kyang rab tu skye ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas rnal 'byor sbyar/ /reg pas 'bebs pa'i mchog yin no/ /de bzhin

sbyar ba so sor bya/ /g.yon pa rked par bzhag par bya/ /g.yas pa kha yi phyogs su bzung / /khro bo'i tshul gyis de bzhin du/ /'di ni bzhad ldan zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /de'am bkrol

te snga ma bzhin/ /rked pa ru ni legs par gzhag /de las langs te slar yang khar/ /mkhas pas dal gyis bskyod par bya/ /de gnyis snying kar yongs su sbyar/ /bsnyems pas sdud dang 'gyed par bya/ /ji srid
spyi bor gtugs pa yis/ /chos dang la sogs kun du 'gyur/ /snying po la sogs sngags rig pas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no/ /
thal mo mnyam por legs par sbyar/ /g.yon pa'i steng du de bzhin gzhan/ /de dag snying kar bsgreng bar bya/ /de ni phan tshun shes rab yin/ /sngags pa chen pos sbyar

bar bya/ /gzhan ni sbyor bas rnam par spro/ /'di ni chos kyi pha rol tu/ /'gro ba'i chos kyi mchog tu bshad/ /de bzhin thal mo mnyam por sbyar/ /snying kar g.yon par bzhag par bya/ /'od ldan rdo rje'i gdong pa

dang / /mdor bsdus nas ni sbyar nas su/ /g.yas pa thur du 'phyang bar bya/ /de bzhin steng bstan mchog sbyin no/ /me tog snyim pa yang dag sbyar/ /rdo rje gnyis ni dbus su bzhag /bzod pa gnyis po de la

sbyar/ /sbyin pa dag ni phyi ru bskum/ /de ni steng du legs par bzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin rgyal po'i 'bras bu ster/ /de ni sbyor bas so sor bya/ /g.yon pa snying kar yongs su bzhag /

g.yas pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /yongs su bskor zhing bskor nas su/ /g.yas pa ru ni bzhag par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas su/ /rdo rje'i steng du 'od mdzes ma/ /phyi rol skul ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni steng

du gdong pa bzhag /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin dge ma'o/ /de bzhin lag pa steng du sbyar/ /rtsibs mchog rin chen ma ru 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i bya ba de nyid kyis/ /de bzhin zhag gcig

bsam par bya/ /sbyor ba de yis bcing ba ru/ /sngags shes gtso bo sngags pas bya/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar/ /khro mo rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying kar blo gros ldan pas bzungs/ /de ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa

yis/ /bltas nas lus can 'gugs par byed/ /de las sor mo'i rtse mo rnams/ /cung zad bsnol te brkyang bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba lta bur bsgreng / /kha sbyar sgrol byed ngo mtshar che/ /rgya 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na/ /

las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de las thal mo sbyar nas su/ /gzi brjid rdo rje de bzhin no/ /de ltar lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ /de yi mtha' gdong zhags pa'o/ /sog le'i thal mo nges par ni/ /'dir ni

thod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /las kun gyi ni dam pa sgrub/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs bcings nas/ /rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya/ /g.yas pa steng du byas nas su/ /bsad pa lta bur

bcing bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje mdung thung ste/ /srin po thams cad phye mar byed/ /'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang yang / /sog le dang ni gri thung ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i cho gas bya/ /rdo rje thal

mo so so bya/ /lag pa g.yas pa steng du ni/ /rin chen lta bur byas la gzung / /sor mo thams cad spro bar bya/ /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin spro bar bya/ /de dag nyi zlar shes par bya/ /thal mo bsgreng ste shes rab dang / /

las kyi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar/ /'dir ni las rnams thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs las mchog sgrub par byed/ /de bzhin dgug dang zhags pa dang / /thod pa rdo rje nyid yin no/ /de las thal mo thod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i

dbus su bu ga ni/ /sgron ma can zhes legs bshad de/ /'di ni rdo rje ngo mtshar che/ /zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin du/ /slob dpon blo gros ldan pas shes/ /gzungs rnams dang ni thams cad kyi/ /sngar bshad pa

yi phyag rgya nyid/ /thod pa rdo rje'ang shes par bya/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig tu ni/ /thams cad gzungs kyi phyag rgya ru/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni rtag

pa ru/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ste/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung / /kun bzang bdag nyid chen po pa/ /sems can kun mchog las kyi mchog /sangs rgyas mchog gtso
mnga' bdag che zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de dag thams cad
la yang dang yang du gzigs te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus zhan pa spobs pa dman pa la mos par gzigs nas de rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ dbang po'i ma mo rnams kyis shod/ /rang rang gi ni

sgrub sna tshogs/ /de nas de rnams legs tshim nas/ /rdo rje can la gsol ba ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rdo rje la ni dang po mchog /
nyi ma gser mdog dang mtshungs par/ /gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya/ /rang gi lus las spros nas su/ /rang gi rnam par bsam par bya/ /de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi de nyid bdag
po cher/ /kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba gzhan/ /gnyis pa'i de nyid bsgom pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad ma las byung ba/ /dmar po'i gos la gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba dag ni me dang

mtshungs/ /rang las spro bya thams cad du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lta bur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbang chen bzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la ni cher dge ma/ /dang po'i lha mo drod dang ldan/ /rang gi lus la nges
par khyab/ /bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag /yid bzhin nor bu'i snang bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /'gro ba'i sgo gtan lha mo ni/ /rang lus lus ldan thams cad du/ /ljang khu
dang ni ljang ser ma/ /las kun sgrub pa'i dam pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur/ /ma mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /shes rab ye shes dam pa gnas/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa ru/ /mkhas pa yis

ni bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /kun bzang mnga' bdag chen por 'gyur/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /chos kyi yi ge yang dag sbyar/ /lha min

bdag por bdag 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog
gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar
yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la glu dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes che/ /mkha' la rlung ltar cher gshegs pa/ /yab kyi phyag

rgya'i ye shes bzang / /kun mchog dam pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo / /dbus su nyi ma chen po ni/ /hU~M yig sbyor bas bsam par bya/ /sor mo kun gyi rtse gnas su/ /

sa bon lnga yi yab dgod bya/ /tshigs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bsam/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /bzang po thams cad rnam bsam bya/ /'khor lo chen po phyag rgya'i tshul/ /lag

pa g.yon par bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su shes rab che/ /de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya/ /de nas spro ba'i de nyid ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /oM pradz+nyA+o bA ya sa ma yo ge hU~M a/ de nas phan tshun

sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje thal mor rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su/ /rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam/ /de nas shes rab che bsgreng ste/ /rtse mo cung zad bskum par bya/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug

snying por 'gyur/ /snying kar bzhag na snying po 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid snying kar bsdams pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags/ /thams cad kyis

kyang mdor bsdus pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /de bzhin legs par bcing bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis/ /phyi yi rgyab tu bskum par bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o/ /shes
rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig ces par rab tu grags/ /lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya/ /las kyi gnas 'khod chen por grags/ /shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis/ /dri yi dbang phyug rab dgyes pa'o/ /

bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong pa gnyis/ /lo ma'i tshul du brkyang bar bya/ /dam tshig sgrub pa ster bar bshad/ /'di las rtse mo rnam phye ba/ /las kun byed pa zhes bshad de/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /

de nyid rtse mor snying kar sbyar/ /bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya mchog /rgyal po mchog lta'i rgyal po ru/ /'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pas shes rab mgo/ /dril bu'i dam pa snying po mchog /

bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong sbyar ba/ /dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /cung zad gdong pa bskum par bya/ /las byed pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /gdong pa legs par brkyang nas su/ /steng du shes rab rtse mo

gcig /'di ni chen por shes bya ste/ /dbang phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog /'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi bsdams las shes rab bsgreng / /rdo rje sra ba'i

chos dang ldan/ /gdong pa phye ste rin po che/ /'di ni dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog /de gnyis de bzhin rnam par gzhag /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge dag /rab brkyang bzhi yi sems dpa' yi/ /las rnams thams cad byed

par bshad/ /de bzhin tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /'di ni chen po dam pa'o/ /bsdams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag /legs par brkyang ste bstod pa ni/ /snying po'i zla ba ltar bcings pa/ /dam tshig 'od zer 'phro

ba'o/ /phan tshun gyi ni gdong sbyar ba/ /'di ni las byed dam pa ste/ /lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas pa/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcing / /rtse mo'i rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /shes

rab 'ba' zhig rtse mor bya/ /lhag ma dag ni de bzhin no/ /lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya/ /snying po chos ni byed pa'i mchog /khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du bzung / /rdo rje rdo rje can gyis brkyang / /g.yas pa'i sbyin

pa brkyang nas ni/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar dgug par bya/ /'di ni las byed shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas su/ /snying kar 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /g.yas pa'i rtse mo
lcags kyur bya/ /sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol son/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdam bya/ /gnyis ka de bzhin lcags kyu ste/ /de ltar 'og ma bcug nas su/ /snying kar bzhag pa las rjes 'brang / /de nyid

dgug par sbyor ba ni/ /thams cad dgug pa rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin sbyin pa bskums nas su/ /yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya/ /snying kar bskor ba zhes su bshad/ /de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni/ /dam tshig can zhes rab
tu grags/ /rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/ /kha ru g.yo bar byed pa mchog /las las rnam par tshim zhes bya/ /las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster/ /lag pa bcings pa las bkrol te/ /shes rab mdzod du rab tu
brtag /'di ni dam tshig cher mdzes pa/ /de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do/ /g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni/ /mi snang mdzod de des na las/ /rin chen pad ma ldan pa'i gdong / /snying kar bzhag pa snying
por 'gyur/ /bsdams nas go char byas nas su/ /bskor ba dam tshig ces su 'dod/ /'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags/ /bsnun pa las byed pa ru brjod/ /bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro/ /bskor ba dam tshig

mchog yin no/ /lag pa'i mtha' ma chos chen po/ /kun sdud las kun byed pa'o/ /bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o/ /de nyid steng du bskor nas su/ /spros pas chos sgrub

byed pa'o/ /rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las/ /dbang bskur dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nyid steng du spro ba ni/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /snying kar legs bzung snying po ste/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog /

khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /re ba kun rdzogs mdzad pas gsungs/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rnam par bcings/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya/ /

ster byed pa ni mig ltar bya/ /snying kar bzhag pa kun mchog 'grub/ /de nyid mig bzhag las yin no/ /bzhad pas chos de dam pa'i chos/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te/ /pad+ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas/ /

thal mo yang dag sbyar ba ni/ /snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /kha ni cung zad phye ba ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no/ /snying kar shin tu gsal phye ba/ /ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad ma ni/ /chos
te mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste/ /sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so/ /de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te/ /snying kar 'khor lo nyid du bya/ /'khor lo gsum pa nyid du

'gyur/ /rtsibs bzhis legs brgyan chos su blta/ /bskor ba las kyi rdo rje'o/ /'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na/ /grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs bsgreng ste/ /shes rab myu gu dag tu bya/ /

sbyin pa rin chen ltar byas pa/ /sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /snying kar chos kyi dam tshig dang / /snying po rig sngags legs par

sbyar/ /de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng / /'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin no/ /mthe chung bzang po'i kha sbyar ba/ /kun gong rdo rje ldan par bya/ /gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub/ /spyi bor las

su bshad pa ste/ /snying kar snying po brtag par bya/ /bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste/ /ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /bcings nas shes rab dag ni bsgreng / /'od ldan dag
ni rtsa bar sbyar/ /'di ni dang por shes par bya/ /thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro/ /bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig /rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog /de bzhin du ni 'di sbyar bas/ /las rnams thams

cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te/ /rdo rje nang du de bzhin no/ /snying kar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar/ /ji snyed las kyi ming bzang po/ /rdo rje rab brkyang mgrin par gzung / /kun tu bskor ba rab

tu bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur bsrung sogs go 'phang bzang / /lhag ma cho ga bzhin rnal 'byor/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni/ /lha rnams kun la
sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'i/ /dbang phyug dpal rdor sems dpas gsungs/ /de nas de rnams legs tshim nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar te/ /zhu ba rdo rje bla na med/ /dpa' bo

rjo rje can la zhus/ /yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la/ /yab dang yum ni bla na med/ /ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa lags/ /'khor ba las ni legs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas ji ltar
'byung ba lags/ /grong gi chos ni bsten pa las/ /ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /gang du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur/ /gang na 'chi ba rab tu gnas/ /gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub/ /gang las rnal
'byor pa zhes bgyi/ /gsang sngags ji ltar gsang sngags lags/ /snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang / /phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /rig sngags rig pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar lha rnams dgug
pa dang / /gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yis bgyid/ /rnam par grol rnams bcing ba dang / /mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du/ /ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing / /tsum pa 'khyud pa nyid dang yang / /mthong nas

rjes su chags pa dang / /lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas/ /phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa/ /sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /gtso bo ro
dang reg par 'gyur/ /me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri/ /mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags/ /mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas zhu ba 'di dag gis/ /

phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba rgyas pa 'di dag phyung ngo / /shes rab yum du legs bshad de/ /yab ni thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni/ /grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /bag chags

sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ /gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin te/ /grol dang ma grol zhes su bshad/ /de ni rnal 'byor pa ru rjod/ /gsang sngags yid du bshad pa ste/ /snying po yang ni de bzhin no/ /yid la rnam par gzhag na

ni/ /gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /thar pa chos kyi rgya mtsho yin/ /lha rnams gang la rgyas btab pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos grub bde ba bla na med/ /rig sngags ye shes
ma lus te/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad/ /de shes pa ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /grub nas bde ba rnam pa gsum/ /shes rab la ni shes rab ni/ /gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no/ /gshegs su gsol ba
btang bar shes/ /bcings pa brtan par byed pa'o/ /mnyes pa yis ni legs tshim yin/ /bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad/ /bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags/ /ro gcig

de nyid bshad pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod/ /tsum pa rdo rje rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes su bshad/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bshad do/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam
sbyor bas/ /tsum pa nA zhes nges par bshad/ /gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste/ /rtags ni lus zhes brjod pa yin/ /de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes/ /chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa'i

'od rnams lha mo ste/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam bgrod pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste/ /lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas so/ /gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni/ /lha rnams thams cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di rnams
kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa
zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang mchod pa'i lan dang / phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang / gar dang gar gyi lan dang / glu dang glu'i lan dang / sil snyan dang sil snyan gyi lan dang / rnam 'gyur dang rnam 'gyur gyi lan

dang / dbrog pa dang dgug pa'i lan dang / brda dang brda'i lan dang / bri ba dang bri ba'i lan dang / blta ba dang blta ba'i lan dang / dam tshig dang dam tshig gi lan dang / dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi lan dang / gsang ba dang gsang ba'i

lan dang / gsang chen dang gsang chen gyi lan dang / de kho na nyid dang de kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs pa rnams dang / glu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don/ /ye shes kun don
thams cad mdzad/ /thams cad khyab pa sems can don/ /gnyis dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas/ /sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba/ /
gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim dang / /gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang / /btung dang ro dang sgron ma gsal/ /mal khri stan dag yid 'ong ba/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /yid ni

bde bar gnas par byed/ /slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni/ /khyad par du ni sgrub pos bya/ /dgod dang sgeg dang de bzhin glu/ /sil snyan gar ni rab dga' ba/ /mchod pa'i lan te shin du ni/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgyas

'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba/ /'di ni mchod pa'i lan du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che/ /phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs

te/ /gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can/ /phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag ni/ /dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya zhes so/ /gar ni

gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gar gyi lan ni gar mkhan ma'o/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang / /dbye ba bzhi ru brtag par bya/ /kun tu bzang po la brten nas/ /ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o/ /las kyi sbyor la yang dag

brten/ /ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o/ /bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa yis/ /gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba/ /rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsung / /ji lta'i sil snyan rdung spyang ni/ /

rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol/ /de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan/ /gsil bas sil snyan nyid du brjod/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar/ /ji srid las mchog spyod yul ba/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /

kun tu bzang por 'gro bar bya/ /sgrogs pas grub ces brjod pa ste/ /'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung / /dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya/ /glu yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /

ji srid mgo dang snying kar son/ /mgrin pa sna yi sbyor ba dang / /mgul pa g.yo ba nyid kyis so/ /'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /lan dang gtong ba'i cho ga rim/ /chos rnams thams cad blang ba dang / /gdon gyi

tshogs rnams zlog pa ste/ /rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir/ /sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o/ /ji srid las ni rjes sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang / /sems dang lus kyi rnam bsgyings pas/ /gdug
pa thams cad bzlog par bya/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun/ /rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no/ /dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste/ /gtong ba dag ni dbrog pa'i lan/ /dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba/ /bgegs

kyi gnas ni rab gnon pa'o/ /dbrog pa'i lan ni rab bzlog ste/ /bsdigs pa'i rkang pa dgod par shes/ /brda ni dran pa'i don du ste/ /phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis/ /'grub dang mi 'grub sbyor ba rnams/ /slob dpon slob

ma sogs pas bsgrub/ /brda lan lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o/ /dri ba smra dang 'dri ba ste/ /mthong nas 'dri ba 'dri ba'i lan/ /legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste/ /lha yi ye shes spyod yul

lo/ /blta ba'i lan ni de las slar/ /sbyor ba mchog gis sbyor ba'o/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni/ /g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste/ /ji snyed blta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub par byed pa'i lan yin no/ /dam tshig

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bka' rtags byas pa nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub po lan du shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /ye shes lnga yis byin brlab pa'o/ /dkyil
'khor lan ni lha mo rnams/ /gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o/ /gsang ba sbas par bshad pa ste/ /gsang ba'i lan ni legs sbas pa'o/ /gsang chen sems kyi 'du shes te/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /so

sor rtog pa lha mo dang / /lha yi bde ba bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyis/ /gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas de rnams slar yang 'dus
par gyur te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la legs par bskul ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde rab mchog /shes rab mchog rab grol ba'o/ /mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i/ /gsang ba chen po gsung du gsol/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang gsang ba chen po mchod pa cher gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ga ga ri ga ga ri

ga ga ga ga ri ga ri/ ra ra ra/ ga ri ga ga /te te te te/ he te te te te te/ na te te teN+NA te te/ na te te dzA tet+te/ dzA te tat+ta/ dza te/ ri ti rA/ te ta te dzA te tI ri ra te/ ta ri ta ri/ te ta ri hU~M/ ri ri hU~M/

te dzA te te hU~M/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi rje/ /glu yi phyag rgya rab gsal ba'o/ /de nas rol mo'i phyag rgya yi/ /

rnal 'byor chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gsungs pa/ lha dang lha mo rgyal bdag dang / /gang gis myur du mtshungs 'gyur ba/ /oM hU~M b+h+yo g+he Ta hU~M/ oM hU~M b+h+yo g+he Ta hU~M/ g+he Ta hU~M/ g+he Ta hU~M/ ru lu ru lu/ g+he Tu

g+he Tu~M/ g+he Tu g+he Tu~M/ /g+he Ta g+he Ta/ hU~M Ta nA Da yo/ hU~M Ta nA Da yo/ hU~M Ta nA Da yo/ Ta ra NA~M/ Ta ra NA~M/ TA Na TA Na/ TA~M Ta/ TA~M Ta/ TA Na Ta Na Ta~M TA/ TA TAM/ NaT+Ta NaT+Ta NiT+Ta/ oM duHduHduHduH/ oM duHduH dUHdUHdUHdUHdUHduHduHduH
