duH Ta~M Ta~M/ Da d+hA~M d+hA~M/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+hA~M/ d+ha d+ha d+ha/ dz+ha dz+hA~M/ dz+ha dz+hA~M/ dz+hi dz+hA~M/ dz+hA dz+hA dz+ya dz+hA/ /dz+hi dz+ha/ dz+hi dz+hA~M dz+hA~M dz+hA~M/ dz+hI dz+hA~M dz+hA~M dz+hA~M/ sna yi sbubs su dkrol ba dang / /lag pa'i mthil dang kha dag gis/ /sil snyan sbyor bas bsil bar bya/ /nges

par myur du rab tu 'grub/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba dang / /chang zung lta ba'i rim pa yis/ /sgeg cing dpa' ba mi sdug pa/ /dgod dang drag shul 'jigs su rung / /snying rje rngam dang zhi sogs kyi/ /nyams kyi ngo bo

legs bslab pa'i/ /gang gis rnal 'byor can 'grub 'gyur/ /gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che/ /bcud ni zla ba sogs mdzes pa/ /sha sogs bza' ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /tsan dan la sogs byug pa dang / /me tog la sogs

phreng mdzes dang / /bud med bzang mo'i rigs rnams kyis/ /dam tshig byin brlabs sbyor ba las/ /rdzas rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phaT yig hU~M dang bcas pas shes/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos

bka' stsal to/ /sbyor ldan kun la gnas nas su/ /g.yas pa yi yang gar sbyor las/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying kar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya/ /yang ni gnyis pa nyid kyang ste/ /shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya/ /

skar ma lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir/ /'dir ni bsnyems bcas rjes su chags/ /de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar/ /yang dang yang du dgrol bar bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za/ /de nyid snying

kar khu tshur te/ /rdo rje gdong pa skar ma'i kha/ /rang gi gnas su bzhag pa de/ /dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan te/ /yang dang yang du yongs su bskyod/ /de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru/ /thams cad du ni spro

bar bya/ /de nyid kha ru bstan pa ni/ /rdo rje bshad par rnam par bshad/ /'di rnams kyis ni don rnams kun/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid pad+ma'i sbyor ba dang / /mig gis sbyor ba gnyis pa'o/ /shes rab skar ma de nas

bsgreng / /lte bar byas pa 'khor lo can/ /rdo rje smra ba lce yi rtser/ /ro rnams ma lus 'phrog par byed/ /'di dag gis ni las rnams kun/ /pad+ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bya/ /de bzhin khu tshur legs par sbyar/ /shes rab kyis ni snying

kar bsnun/ /de las gnyis pa sna tshogs che/ /snying kar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog /bzod dang gzi brjid mche ba mdzes/ /de nyid dam du bsdams pa ni/ /'ching ba'i las ni byed pa'i mchog /

'di rnams kyis ni thams cad sgrub/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan sna

tshogs che/ /pad+ma rin chen rdor mchog 'dzin/ /gsang ba rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dpal chen la ni zhu ba zhus/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang / /ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni/ /yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog

dam pa'i gsang / /dkyil 'khor thams cad brgyan pa yis/ /mdzes pas bcom ldan gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa

dang / /drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor go rim gyis/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod/ /dkar dang ser po ches dmar ba/ /sngon po'i 'od zer

glog las byung / /tha ma kun gyi thog ma ru/ /'od zer bzang po sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la/ /gnas nas bsgom dang bzlas pa sbyar/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor ming yin te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten/ /brten pas sgrub po

shin du yang / /dus mi ring bar sa stengs 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /skye dang 'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs/ /de nas rgyal ba thams cad dang / /sbyor ba'i ma dang yum

rnams ni/ /legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /bde ba che la legs zhes gsol/ /rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas/ /rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yis/ /dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso/ /dpal

ldan sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bdag po tshul/ /sangs rgyas nas ni rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /sbyor bas blo gros sbyin rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa/ /

dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes rdor/ /rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa/ /bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs bton te/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje/ /dpal gyi rin
chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin/ /rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen mdzes/ /mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi/ /skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang
sdig pa rnams bcom nas/ /dpal gyi pad+ma pad ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems dpal/ /pad mas rab dgyes pad ma las 'khrungs pad ma yi/ /dra bas pad ma mtha' dag nges par rgyal mdzad de/ /
pad ma'i rigs la 'jog par mdzad pa'i pad bzang po/ /sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yum gyis ma gos pa/ /sems
can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam pa gnang du gsol zhes so/ /de nas de rnams kyis slar yang sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i
don du 'di skad ces bstod pa/ sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid
phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs/ /sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal
'dud/ /phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gtsug na rin chen gzi brjid can/ /sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad grub la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chos
kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud/ /pad ma dag pa rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod
la 'dud/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs bde ldan phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /chos
dang ldan pa thams cad du/ /nyin re zhing ni stod byed na/ /bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi chos shes rab dang ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /gsang ba rgyan ces bya ba ni/ /sems dpa' chen po legs par zung / /sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dpa' bo chen po ci gsung ba/ /rang byung ye
shes pha rol son/ /chos kun dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'joms pas/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin snying la ni/ /legs gzung dri med ye shes bzang / /
rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /bde ba chen po bdag gis bzung zhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' yab dang yum gyi tshogs dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje la legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur to/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra'i gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal
sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur// //mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gyi/ /dreg+sa pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir/ /rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di/ /bsgyur la
'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la bstun pa'i bu las zhus// zhus dag / //
ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wa he dun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha e wa~M bA dI mahA shra ma NaH //
